Question: byk prwpyghyshn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh ghhary asaby nyt wrks ki trbyt main kis tarah astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: byk prwpyghyshn ayk aysa tarykha hay jo ghhary asaby nyt wrks ki trbyt main astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk alghwrthm hay jo nyt wrk 123 kay wzan aur tasab kay slslay main nksaan kay fnkshn kay mylan ki ghnty krta haay۔as kay bad mylan ko nksaan kay fnkshn ko kam sy kam karnay aur nyt wrk 13 ki drstghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye nyt wrk kay wzan aur tasab ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔bykprwpyghyshn alghwrthm nyt wrk kay zaryaay aaؤt pt prt sy ghltay ko un pt prt tak phylatay hoey kam krta hay ، aur way 145 kay sath sath hr wzan aur tasab kay slslay main nksaan kay fnkshn kay mylan ki kmpywtngh krta haay۔as kay bad alghwrthm is tdryjy ko nyt wrk kay wzan aur tasab ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal krta hay jesay ayk asalaha alghwrthm jesay astakstk mylan dasnt 135 ka astamal karty hawiay۔byk prwpyghyshn alghwrthm ayk tkrary aml hay jo kiy bar dharaya jata hay jab tak keh nyt wrk kam sy kam nksaan ki tkryb 136 main nah aajaiay۔byk prwpyghyshn ghhary aasaaby nyt wrks ki trbyt ka ayk klydy jzaw hay aur bohat sy mshyn lrnngh tasks 23.1 nywrl nyt wrksynda day ay py ayl aar ayn 2 jaywat pwaint 3 jywrw 994 bltyn 5 wkypydayasdaastysysys main aaly drstghy kay hasawl kay liye zurwry haay۔

Question: ghhary aasaaby nyt wrks main tdryjy ghaib hony aur phtnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: trbyt kay doran ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks main mt janay aur phtnay waly tdryj aam msail ka samna karna prata haay۔yha msail is wkt pysh aatay hain jab nyt wrk kay wzan aur tasab kay slslay main nksaan kay tdryj baltrtyb 123 main bohat chhwtay ya bohat braay hawjatay hayn۔mylan ka astamal byk prwpyghyshn kay doran nyt wrk kay wzan aur tasab ko ap dayt karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jo nyt wrk 123 kay wzan aur tasab kay slslay main nksaan kay fnkshn kay mylan ki kmpywtngh ka aml haay۔jb tdryjy bohat kam hawjatay hain tou ، nyt wrk ki trbyt karna mshkl hawjata hay ، aur nyt wrk ki drstghy ko tklyf hawskty haay۔asay ghaib hony waly tdryjy msilha 123 kay nam sy jana jata haay۔dwsry taraf ، jab tdryjy bohat braay hawjatay hain tou ، nyt wrk ghair msthakm hawskta hay ، aur wzan aur tasabat bohat zayada ap dayt hawsktay hain ، js ki wjha sy nyt wrk ko hatanay ka sbb bnta haay۔asay phtnay waly tdryjy msilha 1234 kay nam sy jana jata haay۔yha msail bohat sy thawn kay sath ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks main paiay janay ka zayada amkan rkhtay hain ، kywnkha tdryj ayk sath kiy ghna brah jatay hain kywnkha woh prtwn kay zaryaay phyltay hain ، js ki wjha sy ya tou bohat chhwty ya bohat bray kdryn hawty hayn۔an msail ko door karnay kay l several ، mtadd tknyk tyar ki gain hain ، jn main wzan ki abtda ، tdryjy trashna ، aur ayktywyshn afaal ka astamal karna shaml hay jo ghaib hony waly tdryjy msilay sy dwchar nahin hawtay hain ، jesay asalahay lkyry ywnt (rylw) fnkshn 1234.1towardsdatacience2numpyninja3nepune4machinelearningmastry

Question: mjaza aasaaby nyt wrk (CNNs) kya hain aur woh aam tawr par kis kay liye astamal hawtay hayn؟

Question: sy ayn ayn main prtwn ko pwlngh karnay kay tsawr aur khsawsayt nkalnay main un kay krdar ki wzuahat kryn۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main astamal hawty hay takha zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwka jaskay aur madal ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnaya jaskay jab msilay kay dawmyn 12 sy niay dayta ka samna karna prata haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn madal trynngh 23 kay doran ayk aasaaby nyt wrk main tsaadfy tawr par mtadd nywran chhwra kar kam krty haay۔as ka mtalb hay keh ghraiay hoey nywran ki shrakt ko aarzuy tawr par hata diya gaya hay ، aur un ka madal ki karkrdghy 2 par asar nahin prata haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ko aasany sy nwdas ko mntkhb krkay hr wzan ki tazaha kary saiykl 3 main dyiay gaye amkanat kay sath chhwra diya jata haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ka bnyady mksad nyt wrk main nywrwn kay bahamy mwafkt ko kam karna aur nyt wrk ko mazeed mzubwta khsawsayat ko sykhnay par mjbwr karna haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ayk kmpywtyshnl tawr par ssta aur kabl zakr mwsar bakaadghy ka tarykha hay takha zurwrt sy zayada ftngh ko kam kya jaskay aur hr ksm kay ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks main amwmy hony ki ghltay ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ko bakaadghy ki dyghr aksam kay sath mil kar astamal kya jaskta hay takha mazeed bhatry haasal ki jaskay۔

Question: bar bar aasaaby nyt wrks (RNNs) kay fn tamyr aur mksad ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: bar bar aasaaby nyt wrk (aar ayn ayn) ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay kay alghwrthm hain jo trtyb war dayta par karrwaiy kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، jesay taim syryza ka dayta aur kdrty zaban prwsysngh 1234۔aar ayn ayn ays ka fn tamyr dusray aasaaby nyt wrks sy mkhtlf hay ، kywnkha un ki ayk pwshydha haalt hay jo trtyb 5 kay baray main kuch malwmat ko yad krty haay۔aar ayn ayn ays ka bnyady mksad yeh hay keh pchhlay un pt 1235 kay baray main malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye pwshydha ryast ka astamal krkay un pt dayta aur aaؤt pt dayta kay mabyn dnyawy anhasaar haasal karna haay۔aar ayn ayn ko bar bar kaha jata hay kywnkha woh trtyb kay hr ansar kay liye ayk hi kam anjam dytay hain ، js main aaؤt pt pchhlay kmpywtyshn 6 par mnhasar hawta haay۔aar ayn ayn ays ki aham aur sab sy aham khsawsayt pwshydha ryast hay ، jo is kay baray main tamam malwmat ko yad krty hay jo hasab ktab ki hogi haay۔RNNs hr un pt kay liye ayk hi pyramytrza ka astamal karty hain kywnkha yeh aaؤt pt tyar karnay kay liye tamam un pt ya pwshydha prtwn par ayk hi kam anjam dyta hay ، jo dusray aasaaby nyt wrks 5 kay braks pyramytrza ki pychydghy ko kam krta haay۔RNNs tkryr ki phachan ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur taim syryza tjzayha 1234 jesay kamwn kay liye mnasb hayn۔aar ayn ayn ays main mazuy kay aadanwn ki yaddasht sy woh un pt tslsl kay syak wa sbak kay baray main malwmat haasal karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy woh zaban jesay kamwn kay l useful mfyd bntay hayn۔

Question: RNNs main LSTM aur GRU khlywn main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayl ays ty aym (tawyl klyl mdty mymwry) aur ghrw (ghytda bar bar ywnt) khlyat do ksm kay bar bar aanay waly nywrl nyt wrk (aar ayn ayn) khlyat hain jo trtyb war dayta par karrwaiy karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، jesay taim syryza dayta aur kdrty zaban prwsysngh 1234۔LSTM aur GRU dono khlywn ko RNNs main ghaib hony waly tdryjy msilay ko hal karnay aur un pt trtyb 135 main tawyl mdty anhasaar par kbzuha karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔LSTM aur GRU khlywn kay darmiyan bnyady frk nyt wrk 1235 main malwmat kay bhaaؤ ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal karnay waly drwazawn ki tadad haay۔ayl ays ty aym syl tyn drwazaay astamal karty hayn: un pt ghyt ، framwsh ghyt ، aur aaؤt pt ghyt ، jo syl astyt 123 main aur bahar malwmat kay bhaaؤ ko kntrwl krta haay۔dwsry taraf ، ghrw kay khlyat do drwazaay astamal kryn: ry syt ghyt aur ap dayt ghyt ، jo nyt wrk 123 main malwmat kay bhaaؤ ko kntrwl karty hayn۔GRU khlyat LSTM khlywn kay mkablay main kmpywtyshnl tawr par kam mhanghay hawtay hain aur un ki zurwrt kam pyramytrza ki zurwrt hawty hay ، js ki wjha sy woh trbyt kay l and tyza tr aur chhwtay daytasyts 136 kay liye zayada mwzawn hawjatay hayn۔taham ، LSTM khlyat zayada azahaar psnd hain aur mtghyr lmbaiy kay slslay ko snbhal saktay hain ، js sy woh pychydha tasks 16 kay l more zayada mwzawn hayn۔amly tawr par ، LSTM aur GRU khlywn kay mabyn antkhab mkhsawsa kam aur daytasyt 136.1 twaardasdaasty sains 2thaisummer3plurluralsight4sha5aitechtrend6linkedin kay saiza par mnhasar hawta hay

Question: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GANs) kya hain aur woh kesay kam karty hayn؟
Answer: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GANs) ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay kay alghwrthm hain jo do aasaaby nyt wrk par mushtamil hain jo ayk dusray kay khlaf ayk safr kay khyl kay frym wrk 123 main mkablha karty hayn۔GANs ka hadf nya ، msanway aadad wa shmar tyar karna hay jo kuch marwf dayta ki tksym 456 sy mshabhat rkhta haay۔GANs do zayly madalza kay sath zayr nghrany sykhnay kay msilay kay tawr par msilay ko tyar krkay jnrytr madal ki trbyt ka ayk chalak tarykha haay: jnrytr madal js ki hum niy msaalwn ko tyar karnay ki trbyt dytay hain ، aur amtyazay slwk madal jo msaalwn ki drjha bndy karnay ki kwshsh krta hay (yadawmyn) ya jaly (pyda shdha) 2۔dwnwn madalza ko ayk safr kay khyl kay khyl main ayk sath trbyt di jati hay ، jab tak keh amtyazay slwk kay madal ko aadhay wkt main bay wkwf bnaya jata hay ، yany jnrytr madal kabl aml msaalyn tyar krrhaa haay۔GANs ko wsya pymanay par ayply kyshnza kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، bshmwl: msanway dayta jnryshn: GANs nya ، msanway aadad wa shmar tyar krsktay hain jo kuch malwm aadad wa shmar ki tksym sy mshabhat rkhtay hain ، jo aadad wa shmar ko brahanay ، bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay ، ya tkhlyky ayply kyshnza kay liye mfyd saabt hawsktay hayn۔ aaly mayar kay ntaij:GANs amyj aur wydayw jnryshn main aaly mayar kay ntaij pyda krsktay hain ، aur amyj tw amyj translyshn ، astail ki mntkly ، aur spr ryzawlwshn jesay kamwn kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ dayta praiywysy: GANs msanway aadad wa shmar tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jo is ko mhafwza rkhta haay۔asal aadad wa shmar ki razadary ، jo mydaykl rysrch aur fnanshl tjzayha jesay ayply kyshnza kay liye karaamd saabt hawskty haay۔ jy aay ayn ayk taaktwr mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay js nay jnrytw madalngh kay tarykay main anklab laya hay aur dayta ki nsl aur razadary kay thafza kay liye niay amkanat khwl dyiay hayn۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main twjha kay tarykha kar kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: pysh ghwiy karty wkt un pt kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn par madal ki twjha main mdd kay liye ghhary sykhnay main twjha kay tarykha kar ka astamal kya jata haay۔twjha kay tarykha kar madal ko un pt kay un hasawn par mntkhb tawr par twjha denay ki ajazat dytay hain jo pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye sab sy aham hain ، aur kam mtalkha hasawn ko nzarandaza krsktay hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main twjha kay tarykha kar kay bnyady fwaid tyza tr trbyt ، bhatr karkrdghy ، aur andrwny kwwyrt shft ko kam karna hayn۔amyj ki drjha bndy ، aabjykt ka ptha lghanay ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur mshyn translyshn jesay kamwn kay liye ghhary sykhnay main twjha kay tarykha kar ko wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata haay۔twjha ka tarykha kar tslsl kay madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye ayk taaktwr twl haay۔twjha ka tarykha kar daykwdar ko lchkdar andaza main un pt trtyb kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dy kar kam krta haay۔twjha ka tarykha kar un pt trtyb kay anthaaiy mtalkha hasawn par daykwdar ki twjha ko lchkdar tarykay sy mrkwza karnay kay liye tamam ankwdar pwshydha ryastwn ka wzan wala mjmwaha astamal krta haay۔twjha kay tarykha kar ko un kamwn kay liye aam kya jaskta hay jahan malwmat ko lazmi tawr par trtyb war fyshn main nahin rakha jaskta haay۔

Question: "ghyr nghrany ، nghrany aur nym nghrany ki talym main kya frk haay؟"
Answer: zayr nghrany ، ghair nghrany aur nym nghrany sykhnay mshyn sykhnay ki tknyk ki tyn aksam hayn۔an kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: nghrany sykhna: madal ko trbyt denay kay liye lybl laga hoa un pt aur aaؤt pt dayta astamal krta haay۔ madal un pt dayta sy aaؤt pt ki pysh ghwiy karna sykhta haay۔ nghrany ki talym kay msaalwn main tsawyry drjha bndy ، tkryr ki phachan ، aur jzabat ka tjzayha shaml haay۔sykhna: madal ko trbyt denay kay liye baghair lybl laga hoa un pt dayta astamal krta haay۔ madal un pt dayta main nmwnwn aur dahanchay ko tlash karna sykhta haay۔ ghair mnkwlha sykhnay kay msaalwn main klstrngh ، bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay ، aur tawl wa arzu main kami shaml haay۔ symy sy chlnay wali talym: lybl laga hoa aur ghair mnkwlha sykhnay ka ayk mjmwaha astamal krta haay۔madal ko trbyt denay kay liye un pt dayta۔ madal un pt dayta sy aaؤt pt ki pysh ghwiy karna sykhta hay ، lekin lybl laga hoa aadad wa shmar ki ayk chhwty sy mkdar kay sath۔ nym nghrany ki talym kay msaalwn main amyj aur tkryr ki phachan ، aur kdrty zaban ki prwsysngh shaml hayn۔ khlasaha ، nghrany sykhnay myn۔as wkt astamal hawta hay jab lybl laga hoa dayta dstyab hawta hay ، ghair mnkwlha sykhnay ka astamal is wkt hawta hay jab koi lybl laga hoa dayta dstyab nahin hawta hay ، aur jab lybl laga hoa aur baghair lybl waly aadad wa shmar ka mjmwaha hawta hay tou nym nghrany sykhnay ka astamal kya jata haay۔har ksm ki talym ki apni apni taakt aur kmzawry hawty hay ، aur kis ksm ka astamal karnay ka antkhab mkhsawsa msilay aur dstyab aadad wa shmar par mnhasar hawta haay۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main lfza srayt karnay ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: lfza aymbydangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main astamal hawty hay takha kam jhaty jghha 1234 main addy wyktr ki haysayt sy alfaza ki nmaindghy ki jaskay۔lfza aymbydangh ka mksad alfaza ki manwy aur nhawy khsawsayat ko haasal karna aur isi tarah kay many waly alfaza ko isi tarah kay wyktr ki nmaindghy 1234 rkhnay ki ajazat dena haay۔alfaza ki srayt mkhtlf ksm kay NLP kamwn main astamal ki jati hay ، js main jzabat ka tjzayha ، mshyn trjmha ، aur mtn ki drjha bndy 1234 shaml hayn۔ayn ayl py kay kamwn main lfza aymbydangh kay astamal kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: alfaza ki srayt karnay sy alfaza ki symntk aur nhawy khsawsayat ko haasal krkay ayn ayl py madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta hay aur madal ko tykst 1234 kay many ko bhatr tawr par smjhnay ki ajazat di jaskty haay۔aymbydanghza un pt dayta ki jhat ko kam krskty hain ، js sy ayn ayl py madalza ki trbyt karna aur un ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana aasan hawskta haay۔alfaza 1234. khlasaha main ، lfza aymbydangh ayn ayl py main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo kam jhaty jghha main addy wyktr ki haysayt sy alfaza ki nmaindghy krkay ayn ayl py madalza ki karkrdghy ، karkrdghy aur amwmy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: jab braay daytasyts par ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt karty ho tou chylnjwn aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: braay daytasyts par ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kiy chylnjwn aur thafzaat ko pysh krskty hay ، bshmwl: trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ki kmy: braay daytasyts ki dstyaby kay bawjwd ، abhi bhi mkhsawsa kamwn kay liye trbyty aadad wa shmar ki kami hawskty hay ، jo madal 1 ki karkrdghy ko mhadwd krskty haay۔mtwazan aadad wa shmar: braay daytasyts main adm twazan waly aadad wa shmar shaml hawsktay hain ، jahan kuch klaswn main dwsrwn kay mkablay main nmayan tawr par zayada nmwnay hawtay hain ، jo mtasab madalza 1 ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔madal 1. uncertiantientaine askylngh: jesay jesay daytasyt ka saiza brahta hay ، isi tarah madal main ghair ykyny sawrthaal pyda hawty hay ، jo aam tawr par karkrdghy ki karkrdghy ka sbb bn sakti haay۔ kytastrwfk bhwl jana: braay daytasyts madal ko pehlay sy sykhy hui malwmat ko framwsh karnay ka sbb bn saktay hain ، jo khrab karkrdghy ka baasa bn sakta hay ، jo khrab karkrdghy ka sbb bn sakta haay۔niay dayta 1۔mwdal kmpryshn pr: braay madal kmpywtyshnl mhangha hawsktay hain aur is ki trbyt aur taynaty kay liye aham wsail ki zurwrt praskty hay ، jo un kay amly astamal ko mhadwd krskty haay۔dayta 1 par dayta aur khrab karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krta haay۔mylan bohat braay hawjatay hain aur madal pyramytrza ko mwranay ka sbb bntay hayn۔braay daytasyts par ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt un chylnjwn aur tknykwn par ahatyata sy ghwr karna zurwry hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh madal drst ، mwsar aur amly hayn۔

Answer: dayta ko brahana ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mwjwdha dayta 123456 sy niay dayta pwaints tyar krkay msanway tawr par dayta ki mkdar ko brahanay kay liye ghhary sykhnay main astamal ki jati haay۔dayta ko brahawa denay ka mksad daytasyts 2 ki trbyt kay l new niy aur mtnwa msaalwn ko tyar krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur ntaij ko bhatr bnana haay۔dayta ko brahawa denay ki tknykwn main dayta main mamwly tbdylywn ko shaml karna ya mshyn lrnngh madal ka astamal karna shaml hay takha daytasyt 2 ko brahanay kay liye asal dayta ki awykt jghha main niay dayta pwaints tyar ki jaskay۔ghhary sykhnay main aadad wa shmar ko brahawa denay kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: dayta brahanay sy daytasyts 256 ki trbyt kay l new niay aur mtnwa wakaat pyda krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔madal jo kuch dykhta hay aur js main 123456 sy sykhta hay is main mazeed mkhtlf ksmwn ka taarf krana: aadad wa shmar ko brahanay sy un ko tksym sy bahar tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123456 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kar ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki amwmy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ taham ، kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi hayn۔jb ghhary sykhnay main aadad wa shmar ko brahawa denay ka astamal karty hain ، jesay tasab mtaarf kranay ka khtarha aur aadad wa shmar ko brahanay ki tknyk 123456 kay mhatata antkhab ki zurwrt۔khlasaha yeh keh ، aadad wa shmar ko brahana ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo trbyt kay liye niy aur mtnwa msaalwn ko tyar krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaskty haay۔

Answer: wn shat sykhnay ki ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay ki tknyk hay js ka mksad ashyaa ko ayk ya sirf chnd msaalwn sy drjha bndy karna haay۔wn shat sykhnay ka tsawr is hakykt sy mtasar hawta hay keh ansan bohat kam msaalwn 1 sy niy aabjykt kay zamray sykh sakta haay۔ayk shat sykhna ghhary sykhnay main ayk mshkl msilha hay kywnkha zayada tr mshyn lrnngh par mbny aabjykt ki drjha bndy alghwrthm ko sykrawn ya hazaarwn msaalwn ki trbyt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ghhary sykhnay main wn shat sykhnay ki aham drkhwastwn main chharay ki phachan ، tsawyry drjha bndy ، aur aabjykt ka ptha lghanay 34 shaml hayn۔wn shat sykhnay sy mtalk hay lekin kuch shat sykhnay sy mkhtlf hay ، js sy mrad drjha bndy kay kamwn sy mrad hay jahan hr klas 5 ki ayk ya kuch msaalwn kay liye bohat sy pysh ghwiyan drkar hawty hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main wn shat sykhnay ki ahamyt is hakykt main mzumr hay keh yeh ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko bohat kam msaalwn kay sath ashyaa ki drjha bndy karnay kay kabl bna sakta hay ، jo bohat sy hakyky dnya ki ayply kyshnza 34 main karaamd saabt hawskta haay۔wn shat sykhnay kay hasawl kay liye ، mhakkyn nay mkhtlf tknykwn jesay symy nywrl nyt wrks ، mmasal nyt wrks ، aur mymwry sy haasal krdha asaby nyt wrks 34.1 wakypydaya 2 bydaytk talks 3 aymchyn lylrnngh mastrysyl 5 wkypydaya ki tjwyza pysh ki haay۔

Question: jnrytw madalza kay tsawr aur amyj trkyb main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jnrytw madal ayk ksm kay shmaryaty madal hain jo trbyt syt 12345 ki hakyky dayta ki tksym ko sykh kar niay dayta msaal tyar krsktay hayn۔jnrytw madal aam tawr par aasaaby nyt wrks par chlaiay jatay hain aur mshahadha shuda mzaahar ya hadf mtghyrat ki nmaindghy ya khlasaha pyda karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay js ka mshahadat 1 sy hasab kya jaskta haay۔jnrytw madal amtyazay madal sy mkhtlf hain ، jo mwjwdha dayta ki nshandhay karty hain aur dayta 14 ki drjha bndy karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main jnrytw madalza ka bnyady mksad kuch mkhtlf haaltwn kay sath niay dayta pwaints tyar karna aur trynngh syt 23645 ki hakyky dayta ki tksym ko sykhna haay۔jnrytw madalza main ghhary sykhnay main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main tsawyry trkyb ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki shnakht 23645 shaml hayn۔tsawyry trkyb main ، jnrytw madalza ko niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jo trynngh syt 6 sy mltay jltay hayn۔tsawyry trkyb kay liye sab sy mshhawr jnrytw madal hain mtghyrat aatw ankwdarza (VAEs) aur jnrytry aydawrysyryl nyt wrks (GANS) 65۔VAEs un pt dayta ko nchly jhaty jghha main ankwda karnay aur phir isy asal jghha main daykwda karnay kay khyal par mbny hain ، jabky GANs niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye do aasaaby nyt wrks ، ayk jnrytr aur ayk amtyazay slwk ki trbyt kay khyal par mbny hayn۔jw trynngh syt 65 sy mltay jltay hayn۔khlasaha yeh keh ، jnrytw madal ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hain jo aadad wa shmar kay niay wakaat pyda krskty hain aur trbyt kay syt ki hakyky dayta ki tksym sykh sakti hayn۔jnrytw madalza main ghhary sykhnay main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main tsawyry trkyb ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki phachan shaml haay۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay main jy py yw aykslryshn kay astamal kay fwaid aur nksaanat kya hayn؟
Answer: ghhary lrnngh main jy py yw aykslryshn kay astamal kay fwaid: tyza tr trbyt: jy py yw mtwazay ghnty anjam dy sakta hay ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza 123456 ki trbyt kay aml ko tyza krskta haay۔tyza rftar 25. dastrybytda trynngh: jy py yw ko tksym ki trbyt kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur askyl ayblty ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔haarda wyir kay akhrajat main kmy: jy py yw klaؤda kmpywtngh mhanghay haarda wyir ap ghryda ki zurwrt kay baghair aaly karkrdghy waly kmpywtngh wsail tak rsaiy fraham krkay haarda wyir kay akhrajat ko kam krskty haay۔askyl jy py yw sstm sykrawn hazaarwn daalr kay akhrajat tak phanch sakta haay۔zurwrt sy zayada mnasb hony ka khtarha ، jahan madal trbyt kay aadad wa shmar main bohat mhaart haasal krta hay aur niay dayta 6 par khrab karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krta haay۔mymwry byndawth ، tksym shuda trbyt ، bhatr karkrdghy ، aur haarda wyir kay akhrajat ko kam krna۔taham ، kuch nksaanat bhi hain ، jesay laght ، mlty taskngh ki hadwd ، aur zayada sy zayada mnasb hony ka khtarha۔

Question: twjha par mbny trtyb sy trtyb madal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: twjha par mbny tslsl sy trtyb madal ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay kay fn tamyr ki ayk ksm hay jo mkhtlf lmbaiy 123456 kay un pt slslwn ko dykhtay hoey aaؤt pt tslsl pyda karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔twjha par mbny madalza kay pychhay mrkzay khyal yeh hay keh pysh ghwiy 345 bnatay wkt madal ko un pt kay kuch hasawn par mntkhb tawr par twjha mrkwza karnay ki ajazat di jaiay۔twjha par mbny madal do aham ajzaaa par mushtamil hayn: ayk ankwdar aur ayk daykwdar 123456۔ankwdar un pt trtyb par karrwaiy krta hay aur pwshydha ryastwn ka ayk tslsl tyar krta hay ، jabky daykwdar ankwdar kay zaryaha tyar krdha pwshydha ryastwn ko la jata hay aur aaؤt pt trtyb 123456 tyar krta haay۔twjha par mbny madal rwayty tslsl sy trtyb madal sy mkhtlf hain keh woh un pt trtyb kay hr hasaay ki ahamyt ko mkhtlf andaza main 123456 par wzan karnay kay liye ayk twjha ka tarykha kar astamal karty hayn۔as sy madal ko anthaaiy mtalkha malwmat par twjha denay aur zayada drst pysh ghwiyan pyda karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ۔123456۔twjha par mbny trtyb sy trtyb madalza main ghhary sykhnay main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main mshyn trjmha ، tkryr ki phachan ، mtn ka khlasaha ، aur tsawyry anwan 123456 shaml hayn۔twjha par mbny madalza kay bnyady fwaid bhatr drstghy ، bhatr amwmyizayshn ، aur un pt trtyb 123456.1 krntnyja 2 twaardasdaassyins 3scaler4Arize5machinelearningmastery6bdtechtalks ki zayada mwsar prwsysngh hayn۔

Question: ghair mnkwlha pysh ksh kay tsawr aur ghhary sykhnay main is kay krdar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghair srway shuda prytrynngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo ghhary sykhnay main astamal ki jati hay takha madalza ko bray mkdar main baghair lybl waly dayta par trbyt di jaskay takha un ko chhwtay lybl laga hoa daytasyts 123456 par thyk tn karnay sy phalay۔ghyr mnkwlha pysh ksh kay pychhay bnyady khyal yeh hay keh un pt dayta ki achhy nmaindghy sykhyn jo mkhtlf ksm kay tasks 123456 kay liye astamal ki jaskty haay۔ghyr mnkwlha prytrynngh khasa tawr par mfyd hay jab lybl laga hoa aadad wa shmar ki ayk mhadwd mkdar dstyab ho ، kywnkha yeh wzan 456 kay liye ayk achha abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd fraham krskta haay۔ghyr nghrany shuda prytrynngh mkhtlf tknykwn jesay aatw ankwdarza ، mhadwd bwltzaman mshynyn ، aur ghhary akydha nyt wrks 123456 ka astamal karty hoey ki jaskty haay۔ghhary sykhnay main ghair mnkwlha pysh ksh kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: ghair nghrany shuda prytrynngh wzan kay l a ayk achh initially y abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta 123456 ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnanay kay zaryaha un ko bhatr tawr par tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123456 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kr۔. bharhaal ، ghhary sykhnay main ghair mnkwlha prytrynngh ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، jesay bray mkdar main baghair lybl waly aadad wa shmar ki zurwrt aur ghair zayrkyadt task 123456 par zayada mnasb hony ka khtarha۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ghair mnkwlha prytrynngh ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo wzan kay l a ayk achh initially y abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: mhadwd aadad wa shmar kay sath ghharay aasaaby nyt wrk ki trbyt kay chylnjza kya hayn؟
Answer: mhadwd aadad wa shmar kay sath ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks ki trbyt kay chylnjwn main shaml hayn: trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ki kmy: mhadwd aadad wa shmar ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks ki naksa karkrdghy ka baasa bn saktay hain ، kywnkha pychydha nmwnwn ko sykhnay kay liye inhain bray mkdar main dayta ki zurwrt hawty haay۔had sy zayada mnasb hony ka khtarha ، jahan madal trbyt kay aadad wa shmar main bohat mhaart haasal krta hay aur niay dayta 123456 par khrab karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krta haay۔ by aai aay: mhadwd dayta mtasab madal ka baasa bn sakta hay ، jahan madal dayta kay mhadwd sab syt sy sykhta hay aur niay dayta 123456 ko aam karnay main nakam rhata haay۔amwmy bnana: mhadwd aadad wa shmar kay sath ، madal ko niay aadad wa shmar main aam karna mshkl hawskta hay ، kywnkha madal nay dayta 123456 main tamam mtalkha nmwnwn ko nahin sykha hawskta haay۔ dayta kwalty: mhadwd dayta khrab dayta kay mayar ka baasa bn sakta hay ، jo mnfy tawr par asar andaza hawskta haay۔ghhary asaby nyt wrks 123456.computational wsail ki karkrdghy: mhadwd aadad wa shmar kay sath ghhary aasaaby nyt wrk ki trbyt hasaby tawr par mhangha praskty hay ، kywnkha is main mazeed tkrar ki zurwrt hawskty haay۔transfr lrnngh main madal kay wzan ko shrwa karnay kay liye braay daytasyts par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madalza ka astamal shaml hay ، jabky dayta ko brahanay main mwjwdha dayta sy niay dayta pwaints tyar karna shaml hayn۔L1 aur L2 ko bakaadghy sy bakaadha bnanay ki tknyk zayada ftngh ko rwknay main maawn saabt hawskty haay۔khlasaha yeh hay keh ، mhadwd aadad wa shmar kay sath ghharay aasaaby nyt wrk ki trbyt kiy chylnjwn ko pysh krskty hay ، jn main trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ki kami ، zurwrt sy zayada ftngh ، tasab ، amwmy kary ، dayta ka mayar ، aur kmpywtyshnl wsail shaml hayn۔mhakkyn nay un chylnjwn par kabw panay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tjwyza pysh ki hay ، jesay mntkly lrnngh ، dayta brahaw ، aur bakaadha۔

Question: amyj prwsysngh main astail ki mntkly aur is ki ayply kyshnza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: astail ki mntkly ayk kmpywtr wzen ki tknyk hay js main ayk tsawyr kay mwad ko dusray amyj kay andaza kay sath mlawt karna shaml hay takha ayk niy shbyhaha tyar ki jaskay jo mwad ki shbyhaha kay bnyady anasar ko brkrar rkhty hay lekin aysa lghta hay keh astail ryfrns amyj 12 kay andaza main pynt kya gaya haay۔as tknyk main kesi shbyhaha kay andaza ko sykhnay aur isy kesi aur amyj 3425 par laghw karnay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay alghwrthm ka astamal kya gaya haay۔amyj prwsysngh main astail ki mntkly ki aham ayply kyshnza main shaml hayn: aartstk ryndarngh: astail ki mntkly ko aam tsaawyr main mshhawr fnkarwn kay andaza ko laghw krkay tsawyrwn kay fnkaranha andaza ko bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ aaiymj aydaytngh: astail ki mntkly ko un kay tbdyl krkay tsaawyr main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔astail un kay mshmwlat ko mhafwza karty wkt۔ amyj jnryshn: astail ki mntkly ko ayk shbyhaha kay mwad ko dusray 3425 kay andaza kay sath jwra kar niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ amyj prwsysngh main astail ki mntkly kay aham fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr jmalyat: astail ki mntkly ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔aam tsaawyr main mshhawr fnkarwn ya dyghr tsaawyr kay andaza ko aam tsaawyr main laghw krkay tsaawyr ki jmalyat۔trynngh syt 3425 sy mlty jlty niy tsaawyr tyar krkay tsawyry phachan ko bhatr bnanay kay l .۔ taham ، tsawyry prwsysngh main astail ki mntkly ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، jesay keh bray mkdar main dayta aur kmpywtyshnl wsail ki zurwrt ، zayada mnasb hony ka khtarha۔، aur pyda shuda tsaawyr 341265 kay mayar ka andazaha karnay main dshwary۔khlasaha yeh keh ، astail ki mntkly amyj prwsysngh main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jsay amyjza kay fnkaranha andaza ko bnanay ، tsaawyr main trmym karnay aur niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as tknyk main kesi shbyhaha kay andaza ko sykhnay aur isy kesi aur shbyhaha par laghw karnay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay alghwrthm ka astamal kya gaya hay ، aur mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hayn۔

Question: khud sakhtha sykhnay kay tsawr aur ghhary sykhnay main is kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: khud sakhtha sykhna ayk ghair mnkwlha sykhnay ki tknyk hay js main ghair lybl waly un pt dayta 12345 sy nghrany ka sykhnay ka kam bnana shaml haay۔khwd sakhtha sykhnay kay pychhay bnyady khyal yeh hay keh aadad wa shmar ki sakht ya khsawsayat ko khud lybl pyda karnay kay liye astamal karna hay ، bjaiay is kay keh woh ansany tshryhaat 612345 par bhrwsha kryn۔khwd sakhtha sykhnay ka astamal ghair lybl waly aadad wa shmar sy dayta ki mfyd nmaindghy sykhnay kay liye kya jaskta hay ، js kay bad nghrany shuda daawn astrym task 12345 kay liye kuch lyblwn kay sath thyk sy kam kya jaskta haay۔ghhary sykhnay main khud sakhtha sykhnay kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: khud sakhtha sykhnay sy wzan kay l a ayk achh initially y abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta 12345 ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔: khud sakhtha sykhnay sy ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko aam karnay main bhatry aaskty hay js sy inhain tksym sy bahar kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 12345 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat di jaskty haay۔an pt dayta 12345 ki achhy nmaindghy sykhna۔ taham ، ghhary sykhnay main khud sakhtha sykhnay ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، jesay bray mkdar main baghair lybl waly aadad wa shmar ki zurwrt aur achhay khud sakhtha tasks 12345 ko dayzaain karnay main dshwary۔khlasaha yeh hay keh ، khud sakhtha sykhna ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo wzan kay l a ayk achh initious a abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaskty haay۔khwd sakhtha sykhnay main mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ، bshmwl kmpywtr wzen ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki phachan۔

Question: ghhary kmk lghanay waly sykhnay kay alghwrthm kay klydy ajzaaa kya hayn؟
Answer: ghhary kmk lghanay waly sykhnay kay alghwrthm kay klydy ajzaaa yeh hayn: ayjnt: ayjnt woh hasty hay jo mahawl kay sath taaml krty hay aur mahawlyat ki mwjwdha haalt ki bnyad par akdamat krty haay۔123456. pwlysy sy raiay: palysy woh hakmt amly hay jsay ayjnt mahawlyat ki mwjwdha haalt par mbny karrwaiywn ka antkhab karnay kay liye astamal krta haay۔fnkshn ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo ayk ryast aur aykshn 123456 dyiay janay waly ayjnt ki mtwka wapsy ka tkhmynha lghata haay۔ mahawlyaty madal: mahawlyaty madal ayk aysa madal hay jo mwjwdha haalt aur aykshn 123456 kay pysh nzar mahawl ki aghly haalt ki pysh ghwiy krta haay۔ghhary aasaaby nyt wrks kay sath yeh sykhnay kay liye keh aml anjam dy kar aur ntaij ko dykh kar mahawl main kis tarah brtaؤ kya jaiay۔alghwrthm ko anaamat kay zaryaha hawsalha afzaaiy ki jati hay jab woh sahayha fysalay karty hain aur jab woh ghalat afrad ko 245 bnatay hain tou jrmanha karty hayn۔ghhary kmk anfwrsmnt lrnngh alghwrthm mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sy ayply kyshnza rkhtay hain ، jn main rwbwtks ، ghym playngh ، aur sanaty aatwmyshn 3456 shaml hayn۔ghhary kmk sykhnay kay bnyady fwaid bhatr karkrdghy ، bhatr amwmyizayshn ، aur zayada sy zayada ftngh 123456.1 daydaychyks 2 pِta mynda 3 twaardasdaasty sains 4 hajnghfysysysfystyjnghfysys fyss 6 wkypydaya hayn۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay tnazar main mntkly kay sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: transfr lrnngh ghhary sykhnay main ayk tknyk hay js main chhwtay daytasyts 123456 par madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye braay daytasyts par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal astamal karna shaml haay۔kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main ، mntkly ki talym main mkhsawsa ayn ayl py tasks 23456 par madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye tykst dayta ki bray mkdar main pehlay sy trbyt yaftha zaban kay madal astamal karna shaml hayn۔ayn ayl py main mntkly ki talym kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: mntkly sykhnay sy wzan kay l a ayk achh initious a abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta 23456 ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar ayn ayl py madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ayn ayl py madalza ko aam karna un ko tksym sy bahar tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 23456 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kr۔، mntkly lrnngh aam tawr par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal kay awpry hasaay main azuafy prtwn ki trbyt krkay mkhsawsa bhaaw waly kamwn par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madalza ko thyk twnngh kay zaryaha haasal ki jati hay jabky pehlay sy trbyt yaftha wzan ko fksda 23456 ko brkrar rkhtay hawiay۔phalay sy trbyt yaftha zaban kay madalza kay sath mntkly ki talym kay fwaid bay shmar hain ، aur is ka atalak ayn ayl py kay wsya rynj par kya jaskta hay ، js main zaban ka trjmha ، jzabat ka tjzayha ، aur mtn ki drjha bndy 23456 shaml hayn۔khlasaha yeh keh ، mntkly lrnngh ayn ayl py main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo wzan kay l a ayk achh initious a abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar NLP madal ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: mtghyr aatw ankwdarza (VAEs) kay tsawr aur jnrytw madalngh main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mtghyr aatw aynkwdarza (VAEs) ayk ksm kay asaby nyt wrk hain jo is kay un pt ko dwbarha pysh karna sykh saktay hain aur dayta ko awykt aspys 12 main nkshha bhi bna saktay hayn۔VAEs kay pychhay bnyady khyal yeh hay keh awykt jghha par amkany tksym ko sykhna hay jo niay dayta pwaints 341562 pyda karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔VAEs ayk ksm ka aatw ankwdar hay jsay trbyt kay doran bakaadha bnaya jata hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh is ki dyrpa jghha main achhy khsawsayat hain jo hamain nya dayta 3 tyar karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔"mtghyr" ki asatalaha aadadwshmar 3 main bakaadghy aur mtghyr tshkhysay tarykha kay mabyn kryby talkat sy aaty haay۔VAE kay klydy ajzaaa yeh hayn: ankwdar: ankwdar un pt dayta ko ayk awykt aspys dastry bywshn 341562 par nkshha bnata haay۔ daykwdar: daykwdar awykt aspys ki tksym ko aaؤt pt dayta 341562 par nkshha bnata haay۔an pt dayta 341562۔lws fnkshn: nksaan ka fnkshn un pt dayta aur tamyr nw dayta 341562 kay mabyn frk ko kam sy kam krkay VAE ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ VAEs main jnrytw madalngh main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main amyj jnryshn ، tykst jnryshn ، aur mywzak jnryshn 341562 shaml hayn۔jnrytw madalngh main VAEs kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: VAEs wzan kay l a ayk achh initially y abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta 341562 ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar jnrytw madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔jnrytw madalza inhain tksym sy bahar kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 341562 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ayk ksm ka asaby nyt wrk jo is kay un pt ko dwbarha tyar karna sykh sakta hay aur dayta ko kesi dyrpa jghha par nkshha bhi bna sakta haay۔VAEs main jnrytw madalngh main bohat sari ayply kyshnza hain aur jnrytw madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti hayn۔

Question: ghhary kmk sykhnay main chalw karnay kay afaal ka kya krdar haay؟
Answer: chalw karnay kay afaal nywrwn 12 ki pydawar main adm khtaatay ko mtaarf kratay hoey ghhary kmk sykhnay main aham krdar ada karty hayn۔ghhary kmk sykhnay main ، aasaaby nyt wrk fn tamyr main ayktywyshn kay afaal ka astamal ayjnt ko dayta main pychydha nmwnay sykhnay aur bhatr fysalay karnay main mdd kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ghhary kmk anfwrsmnt lrnngh main ayktywyshn kay afaal kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: ayktywyshn afaal daypda 13456 main ayjnt ko pychydha nmwnwn ko sykhnay ki ajazat dy kar ghhary kmk anfykshn lrnngh madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔sykhnay kay madalza ko un ko bhatr tawr par tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 13456 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kr۔dayta 13456. ghhary kmk sykhnay main ayktywyshn kay mtadd aksam astamal kyay jatay hain ، jn main sghmaida ، TANH ، RELU ، aur saft myks 12 shaml hayn۔ayktywyshn fnkshn ka antkhab mkhsawsa msilay aur aasaaby nyt wrk 12 kay fn tamyr par mnhasar haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ayktywyshn afaal ghhary kmk sykhnay ka ayk aham jzaw hain jo nywran ki pydawar main adm khtaatay ko mtaarf kratay hoey aur ayjnt ko dayta main pychydha nmwnwn ko sykhnay ki ajazat dy kar ghhary kmk sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔nmbr

Question: ghhary sykhnay aur is kay astamal main dawmyn mwafkt kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: dawmyn mwafkt ghhary sykhnay ki ayk tknyk hay js main kesi makhza dawmyn par madal ki trbyt aur is sy mtalkha hadf dawmyn 12345 main dahalna shaml haay۔dawmyn mwafkt kay pychhay mrkzay khyal yeh hay keh kesi madal kay zaryaha sykhay gaye alm ko kesi makhza task par kesi niay mtalkha hadf task 245 main mntkl karna haay۔dawmyn mwafkt main ، makhza aur targht dawmynza main ayk hi khsawsayt ki jghha hay lekin mkhtlf tksym 35۔makhza aur hadf waly dawmynza kay mabyn wabstghy ki staha yeh taay krty hay keh mwafkt kis had tak kamyab hawghy۔dawmyn mwafkt kay mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main kmpywtr wzen ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki shnakht 1245 shaml hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main dawmyn mwafkt kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: dawmyn mwafkt wzan kay l a ayk achh initially a abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta 12345 ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnanay kay zaryaha un ko bhatr tawr par tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 12345 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kr۔. ghhary sykhnay main ، dawmyn mwafkt aam tawr par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal kay awpry hasaay main azuafy prtwn ki trbyt kay zaryaha mkhsawsa bhaaw kay kamwn par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madalza kay zaryaha haasal kya jata hay jabky pehlay sy trbyt yaftha wzan ko fksda 12345 ko brkrar rkhtay hawiay۔phalay sy trbyt yaftha madalza kay sath dawmyn mwafkt kay fwaid bay shmar hain ، aur is ka atalak wsya pymanay par kamwn par kya jaskta hay ، js main tsawyry drjha bndy ، aabjykt ka ptha lghanay ، aur kdrty zaban prwsysngh 1245 shaml hayn۔khlasaha yeh keh ، dawmyn mwafkt ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo wzan kay l a ayk achh initious y abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay main nsaab sykhnay aur is kay fwaid kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: nsaab sykhna ghhary sykhnay ki ayk tknyk hay js main sykhnay kay aml ko is tarah mnzam karna shaml hay js sy aahastha aahastha kamwn ki pychydghy ya trbyt kay nmwnay 123456 main azuafha hawta haay۔khyal yeh hay keh ayk "nsaab" bnana hay jo madal ko zayada sy zayada mshkl kamwn sy haasal shuda alm ko zayada sy zayada mshkl kamwn sy faidha athanay kay liye mazeed mwsar andaza main sykhnay kay kabl bnata haay۔nsaab talym js tarah sy ansanwn aur janwrwn kay sykhnay sy mtasar hawty hay ، jahan woh aasan kamwn sy shrwa karty hain aur phir un ki mhaart ki trky kay sath sath zayada pychydha afrad main trky karty hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main nsaab sykhnay kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: nsaab sykhnay sy wzan kay l a ayk achh initious a abtdaiy nktaha fraham krkay aur un pt dayta 123456 ki achhy nmaindghy sykh kar ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnanay kay zaryaha un ko bhatr tawr par tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123456 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kr۔.kwrykwlm lrnngh main mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main kmpywtr wzen ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki shnakht 12456 shaml hayn۔ghhary kmk sykhnay main ، nsaab sykhnay ka astamal sykhnay kay aml ko is tarah mnzam karnay kay liye kya jata hay js sy aahastha aahastha kamwn ki pychydghy ya trbyt kay nmwnay 2456 ko brahata haay۔aasan kamwn sy shrwa krkay ، ayjnt zayada pychydha tasks 2456 ko hal karnay kay liye drkar bnyady mhaartyn sykh sakta haay۔ghhary kmk sykhnay main nsaab sykhnay kay fwaid bay shmar hain ، aur is ka atalak wsya pymanay par kamwn par kya jaskta hay ، js main rwbwtks ، ghym playngh ، aur sanaty aatwmyshn 2456 shaml hayn۔khlasaha yeh keh ، nsaab sykhna ghhary talym ki ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo sykhnay kay aml ko is tarah mnzam krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaskty hay js sy aahastha aahastha kamwn ya trbyt kay nmwnwn ki pychydghy main azuafha hawta haay۔

Question: taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjza aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: wkt ki syryza kay aadad wa shmar kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjza aur thafzaat main shaml hayn: mhadwd dayta: taim syryza ka dayta aksar mhadwd hawta hay ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko mؤsar tarykay sy trbyt dena mshkl bna sakta haay۔، mwsmy ، aur bay zuabtaghyan ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay l learn sykhnay kay liye mshkl hawskty hayn۔sykhnay kay madal jo taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، aur sahayha ko mntkhb karna 243 ko chylnj kya jaskta haay۔taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy main zabrdst wadha zaahar kya hay ، aur ayply kyshnza 235 ki ayk wsya rynj par kamyaby kay sath is ka atalak kya gaya haay۔taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr drstghy: dayp sykhnay kay madal dayta 235 main pychydha nmwnwn ko sykh kar taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy main aaly drstghy haasal krsktay hayn۔nayab aadad wa shmar ، jo un ki amwmy karkrdghy 235 ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔mtadd chylnjza pysh krsktay hain ، jn main mhadwd aadad wa shmar ، pychydha nmwnay ، zayada ftngh ، madal ka antkhab ، aur pry prwsysngh shaml hayn۔taham ، ghhary sykhnay kay madalza nay taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy main zabrdst wadha zaahar kya hay aur ayply kyshnza ki ayk wsya rynj main drstghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔

Question: madal kmpryshn main alm kay aaswn aur is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: nalj aastghy ghhary sykhnay ki ayk tknyk hay js main alm ko ayk braay ، pychydha madal sy chhwtay ، aasan madal main mntkl karna shaml hay js main karkrdghy 12345 main nmayan nksaan hawta haay۔alm ki aaswn kay pychhay bnyady khyal yeh hay keh ayk chhwtay madal ko trbyt dena hay takha is ki pysh ghwiyan 12345 sy sykh kar braay madal ki pydawar ki nkaly ki jaskay۔alm ki aaswn kay aml main mndrjha zayl akdamat shaml hayn: ayk braay ، pychydha madal (asatzaha madal) ko ayk braay daytasyt par trbyt dyn۔ asatzaha kay madal ko chhwtay ، aasan madal (talbaa madal) kay liye nrm ahadaf pyda karnay kay liye astamal kryn۔ talbaa madal ko tryn kryn۔asatzaha kay madal kay zaryaha pyda hony waly nrm ahadaf ki nkaly karnay kay liay۔ asatzaha madal kay zaryaha pyda hony waly nrm ahadaf aam tawr par haarda lybl 12345 kay bjaiay aaؤt pt klaswn main mmknha tawr par amkany tksym hawtay hayn۔nrm ahadaf ka astamal karty hoey ، talbaa ka madal asatzaha kay madal kay alm sy sykh sakta hay aur niay dayta 12345 ko bhatr tawr par aam krskta haay۔ ghhary sykhnay main alm kay aas pas kay aham fwaid yeh hayn: madal kmpryshn: alm ki aaswn braay ، pychydha madalza ko chhwtay ، aasan madal main skyra sakta hay khazayadha mwsar hain aur mhadwd mymwry aur kmpywtyshnl salahayt 12345 kay sath ayj daywaisza par taynat kya jaskta haay۔ pysh krdha karkrdghy: alm aaswn braay madalza 12345 kay zaryaha sykhay gaye alm ka faidha atha kar chhwtay madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔anhayn tksym sy bahar kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 12345 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kr۔khlasaha yeh keh ، alm ki khdaiy ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo braay ، pychydha madalza ko chhwtay ، aasan madal main kmprys krskty hay jo zayada mwsar hawty hay aur mhadwd mymwry aur kmpywtyshnl salahayt kay sath ayj daywaisza par taynat ki jaskty haay۔alm ki aaswn braay madalza kay zaryaha sykhay gaye alm ka faidha atha kar chhwtay madalza ki karkrdghy aur amwmy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: transfarmr madalza main khud sakhtha mykanzam kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: khud sakhtha mykanzam ghhary sykhnay main transfarmr madalza ka ayk klydy jzaw hain ، jo trtyb war un pt dayta jesay kdrty zaban 123456 par karrwaiy kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔khwd sakhtha mykanzam kay pychhay bnyady khyal yeh hay keh jab tslsl 123456 kay hr ansar par karrwaiy karty ho tou madal ko un pt trtyb kay mkhtlf hasawn par twjha denay ki ajazat di jaiay۔yha un pt anasar kay wzan kay hasab sy haasal kya jata hay ، jahan wzan ka tayn hr un pt ansar aur mwjwdha ansar kay darmiyan mmasalt sy hawta hay js par amldraamd hawta hay 123456۔khwd sakhtha tarykha kar madal ko un pt tslsl main tawyl fasalay par anhasaar par kbzuha karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jo dyghr aksam kay madalza jesay bar bar hony waly aasaaby nyt wrks (aar ayn ayn) 123456 kay liye mshkl hawskta haay۔ transfarmr madalza main khud sakhtha mykanzam kay aham fwaid hayn۔: bhatr karkrdghy: khud sakhtha mykanzam un pt trtyb 123456 main tawyl fasalay par anhasaar par kbzuha karnay ki ajazat dy kar transfarmr madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔ bytr amwmy bnana: khud sakhtha tarykha kar un ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kar transfarmr madalza ki amwmy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123456۔flysyblty: khud sakhtha mykanzam ka atalak kdrty zaban ، tkryr ، aur taim syryza dayta 123456 smyt mtadd trtyb waly un pt dayta par lghaya jaskta haay۔kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، tkryr ki phachan ، aur tsawyry prwsysngh 123456۔khlasaha yeh keh ، khud sakhtha mykanzam ghhary talym ki ayk taaktwr tknyk hain jo un pt trtyb main tawyl fasalay par anhasaar karnay ki ajazat dy kar transfarmr madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaskty hayn۔

Question: wsail sy mtasarha mahawl main ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kay chylnjza kya hayn؟
Answer: wsail sy mtasarha mahawl main ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kiy chylnjwn ka baasa bn sakti hay ، jn main shaml hayn: mhadwd kmpywtyshn pawr aur wsail: wsail sy chlnay waly mahawl main aksar mhadwd ghnty taakt aur wsail hawtay hain ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko mؤsar tarykay sy trbyt denay kay liye mshkl bna saktay hayn۔-mnzam mahawl main mhadwd aadad wa shmar mwjwd hawsktay hain ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko mؤsar tarykay sy trbyt dena mshkl bna sakta haay۔asparsyty: wsail sy mtasarha mahawl main wyrl dayta hawskta hay ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko mؤsar tarykay sy trbyt dena mshkl bna sakta haay۔tknyky msail: wsail sy chlnay waly mahawl main taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar par ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt sy mnfrd tknyky msail pyda hawsktay hayn۔ un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye ، mhakkyn wsail sy chlnay waly mahawl main ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، bshmwl madal kmpryshn ، transfr lrnngh ، transfr lrnngh ،awr alm aastghy 1245۔an tknykwn ka mksad ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki kmpywtyshnl tkazuwn ko kam karna aur wsail sy mtasarha mahawl 1245 main un ki amwmy karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، wsail sy wabstha mahawl main ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kiy chylnjwn ka samna kar sakti hay ، js main mhadwd ghnty taakt aur wsail ، mhadwd aadad wa shmar ، naksa amwmy ، dayta asparsyty ، ghair nmaindghy waly aadad wa shmar ، aur tknyky msail shaml hayn۔taham ، mhakkyn un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain aur wsail sy chlnay waly mahawl main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna rahay hayn۔

Question: myta lrnngh kay tsawr aur is kay atalak ko ghhary sykhnay main byan kryn۔
Answer: myta lrnngh ، jsay "sykhna sykhna" bhi kaha jata hay ، mshyn lrnngh ka ayk zayly fylda hay js main dusray madalza 1234 sy sykhnay kay liye trbyty madal shaml hayn۔myta lrnngh ka hadf tjrbha kay ntaij 235 par mbny sykhnay kay alghwrthm kay kuch phalwؤn ko tbdyl krkay alghwrthm sykhnay ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔myta sykhnay sy mhakkyn ko yeh smjhnay main mdd mil sakti hay keh kon sy alghwrthm daytasyts 25 sy bhatryn pysh ghwiyan tyar karty hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main myta lrnngh kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: myta lrnngh sykhnay kay alghwrthm ko bhatr bnanay aur sykhnay kay alghwrthm tlash krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti hay jo bhatr 2354 anjam dytay hayn۔ bytr jnrlaizayshn: myta lrnngh ghhary ki amwm ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔madal sykhnay kay zaryaha inhain tksym sy bahar kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 2354 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kr۔kmpywtr wzen ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur rwbwtks 2354 smyt mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main ، myta lrnngh ka astamal mkhtlf ksm kay sykhnay kay kamwn par madalza ki trbyt kay liye kya jata hay ، jesay woh trbyt kay nmwnay 64 ki ayk chhwty sy tadad ka astamal karty hoey sykhnay kay niay kamwn ko hal krsktay hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main myta lrnngh kay fwaid bay shmar hain ، aur is ka atalak wsya pymanay par kamwn par kya jaskta hay ، js main drjha bndy ، rjat ، aur kmk sykhnay kay msail 64 shaml hayn۔khlasaha yeh keh ، myta lrnngh ghhary sykhnay ki ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo sykhnay kay alghwrthm ko bhatr bnatay hoey aur sykhnay kay alghwrthm tlash krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: fydarytda lrnngh kay tsawr aur dayta ki razadary kay thafza main is kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: fydarytda lrnngh ayk mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay jo mtadd adarwn ko kesi mrkzay srwr ya srws fraham karnay waly 123 kay hum aahanghy kay that ، mshyn lrnngh kay msilay ko hal karnay main taawn karnay kay kabl bnaty haay۔har adarha ka kham dayta mkamy tawr par mhafwza kya jata hay aur is ka tbadlha ya mntkl nahin hawta haay۔as kay bjaiay ، fwry jma karnay kay liye tyar krdha twjha mrkwza tazaha karywn ka astamal sykhnay ka mksad 1 ko haasal karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔fydarytda lrnngh kay mtadd fwaid hain ، jn main bhatr karkrdghy ، bhatr amwmy kary ، aur lchkdar 123 shaml hayn۔taham ، fydarytda lrnngh ka ayk sab sy aham faidha yeh hay keh dayta praiywysy 123456 ko mhafwza rkhnay ki salahayt haay۔dayta ko mkamy rkhnay aur isy mrkzay srwr main mntkl nah karnay sy ، fydarytda lrnngh hasas aadad wa shmar ko ghair mjaza rsaiy 123456 kay samnay aanay sy bchanay main mdd fraham krskty haay۔ dayta ki razadary kay thafza main fydarytda sykhnay kay fwaid main shaml hayn: dayta ki razadary: fydarytda lrnngh hasas dayta ko wjwd sy bchanay main mdd fraham krskty haay۔dayta ko mkamy rkhnay aur isy mrkzay srwr 123456 main mntkl nah krkay ghair mjaza rsaiy kay samnay، jesay jnrl dayta prwtykshn ryghwlyshn (jy day py aar) 5. dayta ki mlkyt: fydarytda lrnngh adarwn ko apnay aadad wa shmar ki mlkyt brkrar rkhnay ki ajazat dyty hay ، jo un tnzaymwn kay liye ayk aham ghwr hawskty hay jo un ki danshwranha amlak ki hafazat karna chahti hayn۔fyldaza ، bshmwl kmpywtr wzen ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki shnakht 123456۔khlasaha yeh keh ، fydarytda lrnngh ghhary sykhnay ki ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo dayta ki razadary ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey mshyn lrnngh madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks main bkaya rabtawn ka mksad kya haay؟

aham fwaid yeh hayn: dayta ki bhatr karkrdghy: kuch shat sykhnay sy dayta ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔har ayk task 123 kay liye alyhadha madalza ki trbyt kay bjaiay ayk hi madal ko byk wkt mtadd kamwn ko sykhnay ki ajazat dy kar astadad۔ kam laght aur kwshsh: kuch shat sykhnay sy mshyn sykhnay kay madalza ko trbyt denay kay liye drkar laght aur kwshsh ko nmayan tawr par kam kya jaskta hay ، khasa tawr par hakyky dnya kay mnzarnamwn myn۔jhaan ayk braay daytasyt ko haasal karna chylnjngh 123 hawskta haay۔ tal .k: tsawyr ki drjha bndy ، kdrty zaban ki prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki shnakht 123 smyt ، mkhtlf shabwn main mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sy ayply kyshnza shaml hain ، js main kuch shat sykhnay ka atalak bohat sy ghhary sykhnay kay kamwn par kya jaskta haay۔bshmwl kmpywtr wzen ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur tkryr ki shnakht 123۔kmpywtr wzen main ، kuch shat sykhnay ko sirf chnd msaalwn kay sath niy ashyaa ko phachannay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo khud mkhtar daraiywngh aur rwbwtks 45 jesay ayply kyshnza main khasa tawr par karaamd saabt hawsktay hayn۔kdrty zaban prwsysngh main ، kuch shat sykhnay ka astamal sirf chnd msaalwn kay sath nya mtn tyar karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay ، jo chyt bwts aur zaban trjmha 45 jesay ayply kyshnza main karaamd saabt hawsktay hayn۔tkryr ki phachan main ، kuch shat sykhnay ko sirf chnd msaalwn kay sath niay alfaza ya fkray ko phachannay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo aawaza kay maawnyn aur tkryr sy tykst transkrpshn 45 jesay ayply kyshnza main karaamd saabt hawsktay hayn۔، mhakkyn mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain ، jn main myta lrnngh ، dayta brahaw ، aur transfr lrnngh 123 shaml hayn۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 123 main chnd shat sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ghhary sykhnay main kuch shat lrnngh ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo aadad wa shmar ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti hay ، laght aur kwshsh ko kam krskty hay ، aur ayk hi madal ko byk wkt sirf chnd msaalwn kay sath ayk sy zayada kamwn ko sykhnay ki ajazat dy kar tyza tr sykhnay ko ahal bna sakti haay۔

Question: aadayw dayta kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjwn aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: aadayw dayta kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjza aur thafzaat main shaml hayn: nakafy aadad wa shmar: nakafy aadayw dayta ghhary aasaaby nyt wrks ki trbyt karna mshkl bnata hay ، kywnkha aadayw/saؤnda sstm ki mwsar trbyt aur tshkhysa sirf bray trbyt kay aadad wa shmar par mnhasar hawta haay۔ dayta ko brahawa: dayta main azuafha: daytaaghmnttyshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aadayw dayta main tbdylywn ka atalak krkay trbyty daytasyt kay saiza ko msanway tawr par brahanay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، jesay shwr ko shaml karna ، pch ko tbdyl karna ، aur wkt khynchna 2۔taham ، mnasb aadad wa shmar ko brahanay ki tknykwn ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 2 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔ dawmyn shft aur klas adm twazan: aadayw dayta ko adm twazan bnaya jaskta hay ، js main kuch klaswn main dwsrwn kay mkablay main nmayan tawr par zayada msaalyn mwjwd hain ، jo mtasab madalza 2 ka baasa bn sakti hayn۔dawmyn shft bhi is wkt hawskta hay jab trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ki tksym tyst kay aadad wa shmar ki tksym sy mkhtlf ho ، jo aam tawr par amwmy karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krskty haay۔ tshryhaat: aadayw dayta kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trjmany karna mshkl hawskta hay ، js sy yeh smjhna mshkl hawskta hay keh yeh kis tarah mshkl hay keh yeh kis tarah mshkl haaymadal apni pysh ghwiyan bna raha haay۔mntkly lrnngh ، dayta brahaw ، aur bakaadha 12۔an tknykwn ka mksad aadayw dayta ayply kyshnza 12 main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، aadayw dayta kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kiy chylnjwn ko pysh krskty hay ، jn main nakafy aadad wa shmar ، dayta brahaw ، dawmyn shft aur klas adm twazan ، tshryha aur pychydghy shaml hayn۔taham ، mhakkyn un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain aur aadayw dayta ayply kyshnza main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna rahay hayn۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay main myta haywrystk asalaha kay alghwrthm kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: myta haywrystk aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm asalaha kay alghwrthm ka ayk tabkha hay jo kdrty aml aur mzaahar sy mtasar hawta hay ، jesay jynyatyat ، bhyra slwk ، aur artkaa 1234۔yha alghwrthm ayk wsya tlash ki jghha tlash karnay aur kesi dyiay gaye msilay ka zayada sy zayada hal tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔myta haywrystk asalaha kay alghwrthm khasa tawr par ghhary sykhnay main karaamd hain kywnkha woh ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks kay pyramytrza ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krsktay hain ، jo pyramytr aspys 1 ki aaly jhaty ki wjha sy chylnj hawskta haay۔ kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly myta haywrystk asalaha alghwrthm main sy kchh۔ghhary sykhnay main shaml hayn: jynyaty alghwrthm (jy aay): jy aay twlydy aml ki madalngh par mbny hay aur kras awwr aur atprywrtn aapryshnza 13 kay zaryaay niay amydwarwn kay hal pyda krkay tlash ki jghha ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ftart main prndwn aur mchhlywn ki bhyra ki nkl wa harkt aur zarat 13.ant kalwny aaptymaizayshn (aay sy aw) ki pwzayshn aur rftar ko tkrary tawr par ap dayt krkay tlash ki jghha ko dryaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay: aay sy aw chywntywn kay tarza aml ko madalngh par mbny hay aur tlash ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔fyrwmwn tryls ko tkrary tawr par ap dayt krkay aspys jo chywnty ayk dusray kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye astamal krty hayn۔khanay pynay kay zaraia main sy woh 13.myta haywrystk aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm mkhtlf ghhary sykhnay ki ayply kyshnza main astamal kyay gaye hain ، jn main tsawyry drjha bndy ، aabjykt ka ptha lghanay ، aur kdrty zaban ki prwsysngh 153 shaml hayn۔ghhary sykhnay main myta haywrystk aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: myta haywrystk aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm madal kay pyramytrza ko zayada mwsar andaza main bhatr bna kar ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko aam karnay ki ajazat dy kar inhain bhatr tawr par tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 153 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat di jaiay۔zaban prwsysngh 153. bhar haal ، myta haywrystk aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm bhi kiy chylnjwn ko pysh krsktay hain ، bshmwl: mnasb alghwrthm ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary: dyiay gaye msilay kay liye mnasb myta haywrystk aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 13 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔kmpywtyshnl laght main azuafha: myta haywrystk aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt ki kmpywtyshnl laght main azuafha krskta hay ، khasa tawr par braay daytasyts aur pychydha madalza kay liay۔ un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye ، mhakkyn myta haywrystk asalahay alghwrthm kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، jn main haaibrda alghwrthm ، mtwazay shaml hayn۔، aur haaiprprmytrza 13 ki asalaha۔an tknykwn ka mksad ghhary sykhnay ki ayply kyshnza 13 main myta haywrystk asalaha alghwrthm ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، myta haywrystk aaptymaizayshn alghwrthm ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hain jo madal kay pyramytrza ko zayada mwsar andaza main bhatr bna kar ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hayn۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main ghair ykyny sawrthaal kay tkhmynay kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghair ykyny sawrthaal ka tkhmynha ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay zaryaha ki janay wali pysh ghwiwn main aatmad ya ghair ykyny sawrthaal ki mkdar ki mkdar ko drst karnay ka aml haay۔yha khasa tawr par un ayply kyshnza main aham hay jahan ghalat pysh ghwiwn kay ntaij shdyd hawsktay hain ، jesay taby tshkhysa ya khud mkhtar daraiywngh myn۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main ghair ykyny sawrthaal kay tkhmynay kay liye astamal hony wali kuch tknykwn main shaml hayn: mwnty karlw darap aaؤt: is tknyk main pysh ghwiyan pyda karty wkt tsaadfy tawr par madal fn tamyr kay andr nwdas ka tnasb chhwrana shaml hay ، js kay ntyjay main hr un pt kay liye mtadd pysh ghwiyan hawty hayn۔madal aaؤt pt kay tghyr ya antrwpy ko ghair ykyny sawrthaal kay tkhmynay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔madal aaؤt pt kay tghyr ya antrwpy ko ghair ykyny sawrthaal ka tkhmynha 123 kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ bysyin aasaaby nyt wrk: is tknyk main wzan aur ntaij ko ahatmal ki tksym kay tawr par alaj karna aur pysh ghwiwn kay tghyr ka andazaha lghana shaml haay۔yha tarykha dusray aasaaby nyt wrks kay mkablay main trbyt aur astamal kay l more zayada pychydha hay ، lekin ghair ykyny sawrthaal ka tkhmynha 13۔an ki pysh ghwiwn main aatmad ya ghair ykyny sawrthaal ka fysalha krna۔ fysalha sazay: ghair ykyny sawrthaal ka tkhmynha fysalha sazawn ko madal ki pysh ghwiwn main aatmad ya ghair ykyny sawrthaal ka ayk pymanha fraham krkay mazeed bakhbr fysalay karnay main mdd fraham krskta haay۔jb madal is ki pysh ghwiwn kay baray main ghair ykyny hay tou is ka ptha lghanay kay zaryaha mkhalf hamlwn kay khlaf madal sykhna۔madal 152 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔bshmwl haaibrda tarykwn ، mtwazay ، aur haaiprprmytrza 152 ki asalaha۔an tknykwn ka mksad ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main ghair ykyny sawrthaal kay tkhmynay ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ghair ykyny sawrthaal ka tkhmynha ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo un ki pysh ghwiy main aatmad ya ghair ykyny sawrthaal ka ayk pymanha fraham krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki wshwsnyyta ، fysalha sazay aur mzubwtay ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay ki ayply kyshnza main nalj ghraf ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: nalj ghraf ayk ksm ka dayta dahanchha hay jo ghhary sykhnay ki ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay takha ghraf ki shkl main alm ki nmaindghy aur mnzam kya jaskay۔wha aadad wa shmar main syak wa sbak aur many shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، js sy saft wyir ayjntwn ko is kay baray main astdlal karnay aur mazeed bakhbr fysalay karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ghhary sykhnay ki ayply kyshnza main alm kay ghraf kay kuch mkasad yeh hayn: mshyn lrnngh ko brahana: alm kay ghraf aadad wa shmar main symntks ki ayk prt ko shaml krkay mshyn lrnngh ko braha saktay hain ، js sy saft wyir ayjntwn ko is kay baray main astdlal karnay aur mazeed bakhbr fysalay karnay ki ajazat mil sakti haay۔ghraf ko ghraf 2 ki shkl main alm ki nmaindghy krkay pychydha tsawrat ko smjhnay aur madal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔trbyt kay aadad wa shmar: alm kay ghraf ko trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ko brahanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jahan nakafy dayta mwjwd haay۔ghhary sykhnay ki ayply kyshnza main alm kay ghraf main sy yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: alm kay ghraf dayta pwaints 12 kay mabyn talkat ki bhatr tfhaym fraham krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔ fysalha sazay: alm kay ghraf fysalha sazawn ko mazeed bakhbr bnanay main mdd krsktay hayn۔dayta pwaints 2 kay mabyn talkat ki bhatr tfhaym fraham krkay fysalay۔، bshmwl: ghraf ki tamyr main dshwary: ghraf ki tamyr mshkl hawskty hay ، khasa tawr par aysay maamlat main jahan aadad wa shmar pychydha aur ghair mnzam haynmadal 15. un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye ، mhakkyn almy ghraf kay l various mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain ، jn main haaibrda kay tarykwn ، hum aahanghy ، aur haaiprprmytr 15 ki asalaha shaml hayn۔an tknykwn ka mksad ghhary sykhnay ki ayply kyshnza main alm kay ghraf ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، alm kay ghraf ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hain jo dayta pwaints kay mabyn talkat ki bhatr tfhaym fraham krkay karkrdghy ، fysalha sazay aur ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hayn۔

Question: mtn ki trkyb kay liye jnrytw madalza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mtn ki trkyb kay liye jnrytw madal ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay ka madal hain jo dyiay gaye un pt ki bnyad par nya mtn tyar krsktay hayn۔an madalza ko mtn kay braay daytasyts par trbyt di jati hay aur nya mtn tyar karna sykhtay hain jo un pt dayta sy mlta jlta haay۔mtn ki trkyb kay liye jnrytw madalza kay liye astamal hony wali kuch tknykwn main shaml hayn: zaban kay madal: zaban kay madal ayk ksm ki jnrytw madal hain jo alfaza ki trtyb kay amkan ki pysh ghwiy krsktay hayn۔an madalza ko mtn kay braay daytasyts par trbyt di jati hay aur pysh ghwiy shuda amkany tksym 123 sy nmwnay lenay kay zaryaay nya mtn tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayk trtyb main aghla lfza۔an madalza ko mtn kay braay daytasyts par trbyt di jati hay aur pysh ghwiy shuda amkany tksym 123 sy nmwnay lenay kay zaryaha nya mtn tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ transfarmrza ayk ksm ki asaby nyt wrk hain jo un pt trtyb kay mkhtlf hasawn main shrkt krkay nya mtn tyar krsktay hayn۔an madalza ko mtn kay braay daytasyts par trbyt di jati hay aur pysh ghwiy ki hogi ahatmal ki tksym 123 sy nmwnay lenay kay zaryaha nya mtn tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔mtn ki trkyb kay liye jnrytw madalza kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: mtn ki trkyb kay liye jnrytw madalza un pt dayta 123 ki tarah hi nya mtn tyar krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko aam tawr par tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kr۔taham ، mtn ki trkyb kay liye jnrytw madal bhi kiy chylnjwn ko pysh krsktay hain ، bshmwl: mrbwta mtn pyda karnay main dshwary: mrbwta mtn pyda karna mshkl hawskta hay ، khasa tawr par jab un pt dayta pychydha aur ghair sakhtha 123 haay۔fn tamyr mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 123 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔ un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye ، mhakkyn mtn ki trkyb kay liye pydawary madal kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، js main haaibrda kay tarykwn ، hum aahanghy ، aur haaipr pyra mytrys 123 ki asalaha shaml hayn۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 123 main mtn ki trkyb kay liye jnrytw madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، mtn ki trkyb kay liye jnrytw madal ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hain jo niay mtn ko tyar krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hain jo un pt dayta ki tarah haay۔

Question: ghraf twjha kay nyt wrks (jy aay ty ays) kay tsawr aur ghraf dayta main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghraf twjha kay nyt wrk (jy aay ty ays) ayk ksm kay aasaaby nyt wrk fn tamyr hain jo ghraf sy sakhtha dayta 123 kay sath kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔anhawn nay ghraf kay kanwwlyshnza ya un kay kryb 3 par mbny pyshghy tarykwn ki kwtahaywn ko door karnay kay liye khud sakhtha prtwn ka faidha athaya۔jy aay ty ays kesi praws main mkhtlf nwdas ko mkhtlf wzan tfwyzu karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، baghair kesi bhi tarah kay mhanghay mytrks aapryshn ki zurwrt hawty hay ya ghraf dahanchay ko upar ki sakht ko jannay par mnhasar haay۔jy aay ty ays main twjha denay ka tarykha kar inhain hr nwda kay rabtawn ki ahamyt ka wzan karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy woh khasa tawr par braay aur pychydha ghrafs 1 sy nmtnay main mhaart rkhtay hayn۔ ghraf dayta main jy aay ty ays kay astamal main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main swshl nyt wrks ، hayatyaty nyt wrk ، aur sfarsh sstm 12 shaml hayn۔ghraf dayta main jy aay ty ays kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: jy aay ty ays braay aur pychydha ghrafs 123 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kar ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔dastry bywshn sy bahar kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123 ko snbhalyn۔mnasb madal fn tamyr ka antkhab: mnasb madal fn tamyr ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 15 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔an chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye ، mhakkyn jy aay ty ays kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain ، jn main haaibrda tarykwn ، hum aahanghy ، aur haaiprprmytr 15 ki asalaha shaml hayn۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 15 main jy aay ty ays ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، jy aay ty ays ghhary sykhnay main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo ghraf dayta main ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hay takha inhain braay aur pychydha ghraf ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhal skay۔

Question: wydayw dayta kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjza aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: wydayw dayta kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kiy chylnjwn aur thafzaat ko pysh krskty hay ، bshmwl: nakafy dayta: nakafy wydayw dayta ghhary aasaaby nyt wrks ki trbyt kay l. isy mshkl bna sakta hay ، kywnkha mwsar trbyt aur wydayw sstm ki tshkhysa sirf bray trbyt kay aadad wa shmar par mnhasar haay۔ dayta main azuafha: dayta brahaw ayk aysy tknyk hay jo wydayw dayta main tbdylywn ka atalak krkay trbyty daytasyt kay saiza ko msanway tawr par brahanay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، jesay pltna ، ghhwmna ، aur fsal 2۔taham ، mnasb aadad wa shmar ko brahanay ki tknykwn ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 2 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔ dawmyn shft aur klas adm twazan: wydayw dayta ko adm twazan bnaya jaskta hay ، js main kuch klaswn main dwsrwn kay mkablay main nmayan tawr par zayada msaalyn mwjwd hain ، jo mtasab madal 3 ka baasa bn sakti hayn۔dawmyn shft bhi is wkt hawskta hay jab trbyt kay aadad wa shmar ki tksym tyst kay aadad wa shmar ki tksym sy mkhtlf ho ، jo aam tawr par karkrdghy ki karkrdghy ka sbb bn sakti haay۔madal apni pysh ghwiyan bna raha haay۔mntkly lrnngh ، dayta brahaw ، aur bakaadha 431۔an tknykwn ka mksad wydayw dayta ayply kyshnza 431 main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، wydayw dayta kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kiy chylnjwn aur thafzaat ko pysh krskty hay ، jn main nakafy aadad wa shmar ، dayta brahaw ، dawmyn shft aur klas adm twazan ، tshryha aur pychydghy shaml hayn۔taham ، mhakkyn un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain aur wydayw dayta ayply kyshnza main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna rahay hayn۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay main jwraay hoey sykhnay aur is kay fwaid kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jwraa lrnngh ghhary sykhnay ki ayk tknyk hay js main hatmy madal ki drstghy aur amwmy ko bhatr bnanay kay l multiple mtadd madalza ko ykja karna shaml haay۔ghhary sykhnay main jwraa sykhnay kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: jwraa sykhna ayk sy zayada madalza 123 ki pysh ghwiwn ko ykja krkay ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ bytr jnrlaizayshn: jwraa sykhnay sy ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kar un ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔tksym sy bahar ka dayta aur nayab dayta 124. rwbwstns: jwraa sykhnay sy ptha lghanay kay zaryaha mkhalf hamlwn kay khlaf ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki mzubwtay ko bhatr bnaya jaskta hay jab madal is ki pysh ghwiyan 123 kay baray main ghair ykyny haay۔shaml kryn: mnasb madalza ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary: jwra main shaml karnay kay liye mnasb madalza ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 154 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔khasa tawr par braay daytasyts aur pychydha madalza 153 kay liay۔hatmy pysh ghwiy 523. byghngh haasal kryn: is tknyk main trbyt kay aadad wa shmar kay mkhtlf zayly sytwn par mtadd madalza ki trbyt shaml hay aur hatmy pysh ghwiy 523 haasal karnay kay liye un ki pysh ghwiyan jwrayn۔pchhla madal 523. astykngh: is tknyk main mtadd madalza ki trbyt aur un ki pysh ghwiwn ko myta madal main un pt kay tawr par astamal karna shaml hay jo hatmy pysh ghwiy 523 ko bnata haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، jwraa sykhna ghhary sykhnay ki ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo mtadd madalza ki pysh ghwiwn ko jwra kar ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur mzubwtay ko bhatr bnaskty haay۔taham ، yeh mtadd chylnjwn ko bhi pysh krskta hay ، bshmwl mnasb madalza ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary ، kmpywtyshnl laght main azuafha ، aur zayada sy zayada mnasb

Question: palysy tdryj kay sath kmk sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔

Question: ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ka andazaha karnay main mkhalf msaalwn ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: aydawrysyryl msaalyn mshyn lrnngh madalza kay aadanwn hain jn ko jan bwjh kar trmym kya gaya hay takha madal ko un ki ghalat tshryha ki jaskay۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ka andazaha karnay main mkhalf msaalwn ka mksad yeh hay keh hamlwn kay khlaf madal ki mzubwtay ki janch ki jaye aur mmknha kmzawrywn ki nshandhay ki jaiay۔mzahaby msaalwn ko aham nzaamwn main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay khwdmkhtar gharayan ، taby tshkhysa ، aur maly dhwkha dhay ka ptha lghanay ka۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main mmknha khtarat ki nshandhay karain aur hamlwn kay khlaf un ki slamty ko bhatr bnaiyn۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza aur un ko kis tarah bywkwf bnaya jaskta haay۔ taham ، ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ka andazaha karnay main maashy msaalwn ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur ghwr wa fkr bhi shaml hain ، bshmwl: aydawryshl msaalwn ko pyda karnay main dshwary: mkhalfyn ki msaalwn ko pyda karna mshkl hawskta hay aur madal kay alm ki zurwrt hawty haay۔fn tamyr aur trbyt ka dayta 13۔khlasaha yeh keh ، mkhalf msaalyn mshyn lrnngh madalza kay aadanwn hain jn ko hamlwn kay khlaf madal ki mzubwtay ki janch karnay aur mmknha khtarat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye jan bwjh kar trmym ki hogi haay۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ka andazaha karnay main mkhalf msaalwn ka astamal un ki slamty ، karkrdghy aur tfhaym ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔taham ، yeh chylnjwn aur thafzaat ko bhi pysh krskta hay ، js main mkhalf msaalwn ko pyda karnay main dshwary ، kmpywtyshnl laght main azuafha ، aur akhlaky thafzaat shaml hayn۔

Question: mydaykl dayta kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjwn aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: taby aadad wa shmar kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjza aur thafzaat main shaml hayn: nakafy aadad wa shmar: taby aadad wa shmar ki kami hawskty hay ، aur aadad wa shmar ka mayar mkhtlf hawskta hay ، js sy ghhary sykhnay kay madalza 123 ko trbyt dena mshkl hawjata haay۔ antrprytyblty: ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trjmany karna mshkl hawskta haay۔، yeh smjhna mshkl bnata hay keh madal apni pysh ghwiyan kis tarah bna raha haay۔ dayta praiywysy: mydaykl dayta hasas hay aur is main razadary kay skht zuwabta ki zurwrt hay ، js sy ghhary sykhnay kay madalza 123 ki trbyt kay liye ashtrak aur astamal karna mshkl hawjata haay۔aadad wa shmar ki aksam ، jesay tsaawyr ، mtn aur addy aadad wa shmar ، js sy madal tyar karna mshkl hawta hay jo hr ksm kay dayta 123 ko snbhal saktay hayn۔mhakkyn taby aadad wa shmar kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt kay l various mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، bshmwl transfr lrnngh ، dayta brahawa ، aur bakaadha 123۔an tknykwn ka mksad mydaykl dayta ayply kyshnza 123 main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔as kay alawha ، mhakkyn mydaykl dayta 12345 kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main dayta ki razadary aur tshryha ko bhatr bnanay kay tarykwn ki tlash kar rahay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، taby aadad wa shmar kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal kiy chylnjwn aur thafzaat ko pysh krsktay hain ، jn main nakafy aadad wa shmar ، tshryha ، dayta ki razadary ، azamt ، aur shaml hayn۔tshryhataham ، mhakkyn un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain aur mydaykl dayta ayply kyshnza main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna rahay hayn۔

sykhnay kay madalza ki amwmy ko bhatr tawr par tksym karnay waly aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 312 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat mil sakti haay۔kmpywtr wzen ، kdrty zaban ki prwsysngh ، aur mydaykl amyjngh 3124 ko bhi shaml kryn۔ bharhaal ، dawmyn ko aam karnay main bhi kiy chylnjza pysh kyay jasktay hain ، bshmwl: mnasb madal fn tamyr ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary: mnasb madal fn tamyr liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، bshmwl jwra sykhnay ، myta-sykhna ، aur bakaadha 354۔an tknykwn ka mksad dawmyn jnrlaizayshn ayply kyshnza 354 main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki
