hay ، bshmwl: mnasb alghwrthm ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary: kdr ki tkrar kay sath kmk sykhnay kay l the mnasb alghwrthm ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 14 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔kdr ki tkrar kay sath sykhnay sy ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt aur tshkhysa ki kmpywtyshnl laght main azuafha hawskta hay ، khasa tawr par braay daytasyts aur pychydha madalza kay liye ۔14۔ un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye ، mhakkyn kdr tkrar kay sath kmk sykhnay ki mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، js main haaibrda kay tarykay ، mtwazay ، aur asalaha shaml hayn۔haaiprprmytrza 14an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 14 main kdr ki tkrar kay sath kmk sykhnay ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، kdr ki tkrar kay sath kmk sykhna ghhary talym ki ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo ayjntwn ko mahawl main akdamat karnay kay liye zayada sy zayada palysyan sykh kar ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy shkl aur lchk ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrks ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrks (GANs) ko aam dayta tyar krkay aur is ka asal dayta sy mwazanha krkay bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ksy bhi akhtlaf ko bay zuabtaghywn kay tawr par shnakht kya jaskta haay۔GANs aadad wa shmar ki pychydha aur aaly jhaty tksym ki nkaly krsktay hain aur ghair mnkwlha bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye aam aadad wa shmar kay tarza aml kay nmwnwn ko sykhnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔jy aay ayn ka astamal karty hoey bay zuabtaghywn ka ptha lghana aam slwk ko madalngh karnay aur adm tzuadat ka ptha lghanay ka kam hay takha ayk aydawryshl trynngh prwsys 2 ka astamal karty hoey bay zuabtaghy kay askwr ki pymaish ki jaskay۔GANs jnrytrza aur amtyazay slwk ka astamal karty hoey mshtrkha lrnngh kay zaryaha ard ghrdy msanway aadad wa shmar tyar krsktay hain ، jo bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔GANs ko mkhtlf kamwn kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main dayta ko brahawa ، tsawyr ki trkyb ، mtn sy amyj ، aur amyj tw amyj translyshn 4 shaml hayn۔GANs ko mtwazan daytasyts 5 main twazan bhaal karnay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔GAN main jnrytr ko dayta tyar karnay ki trbyt di jati hay jo lybl laga hoa dayta ki tarah dkhaiy dyta hay ، aur amtyazay slwk karnay waly ko tyar krdha dayta aur lybl laga hoa dayta 6 kay darmiyan frk karnay ki trbyt di jati haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، GANs ko aam aadad wa shmar ko tyar krkay aur is ka mwazanha karnay kay liye bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، aur un kay pas aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur nsl main bohat sy dusri ayply kyshnza mwjwd hayn۔

Question: taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal mshyn lrnngh madal ki ayk ksm hay jo taim syryza ki mstkbl ki akdar ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ghharay asaby nyt wrk ka astamal krty haay۔madalza ko tarykhy aadad wa shmar par trbyt di jati hay aur mstkbl ki akdar kay baray main pysh ghwiyan karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karna sykhtay hayn۔taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy kay liye aam tawr par astamal hony waly ghhary sykhnay kay madal main sy kuch shaml hayn: bar bar nywrl nyt wrks (aar ayn ayn): aar ayn ayn ayk ksm kay asaby nyt wrk hain jo trtyb war dayta ko madal bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar۔aar ayn ayn mazuy ki malwmat ko yad rkhna sykh saktay hain aur mstkbl ki akdar 12 kay baray main pysh ghwiyan karnay kay liye is ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ tawyl mdty mymwry (ayl ays ty aym) nyt wrks: ayl ays ty aym ays aar ayn ayn ki ayk ksm hay jo aadad wa shmar main tawyl mdty anhasaar ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhal sakti haay۔LSTMs mazuy ki malwmat ko mntkhb tawr par yad rkhna ya bhwl jana sykh saktay hain ، js ki mdd sy woh mstkbl ki akdar 32 kay baray main zayada drst pysh ghwiyan krskyn۔ayk tsawyrsy ayn ayn dayta 32 par mjsmha fltrza ka atalak krkay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karna sykh saktay hayn۔ taim syryza ki pyshn ghwiy kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: ghhary sykhnay kay madal zayada pychydha sykh kar taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔dayta 314 main pytrn aur talkattaim syryza ki pysh ghwiy kay kam ، jn main mwsm ki pysh ghwiy ، astak ki kymt ki pysh ghwiy ، aur twanaiy ki talb ki pysh ghwiy ki pysh ghwiy 314 shaml haay۔ taham ، wkt ki syryza ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal astamal karnay kay wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi shaml hain ، bshmwl: mnasb madal fn tamyr ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary: mnasb:madal aarkytykchr chylnj hawskta hay aur madal 325 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔wkt ki syryza ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay l various mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، bshmwl mntkly lrnngh ، dayta brahaw ، aur bakaadha 325۔an tknykwn ka mksad taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy karnay waly ayply kyshnza 325 main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal mshyn lrnngh main ayk taaktwr tknyk hain jo taim syryza ki mstkbl ki akdar ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye ghhary asaby nyt wrks ka astamal krkay taim syryza ki pysh ghwiy ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hayn۔

Question: ghraf nywrl nyt wrks main ghraf aymbydangh tknyk kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghraf nywrl nyt wrks main ghraf aymbydangh tknyk ghraf kay dahanchay aur malwmat ki khsawsayat ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey ghrafwn ko nchlay jhaty mstkl tawr par dyrpa jghhawn main tbdyl karnay kay aml ka hawalha dytay hayn۔ghraf nywrl nyt wrks main ghraf ko srayt karnay ki tknyk ka mksad hr nwda ki kam jhaty nmaindghy sykhna hay jabky ghrafs 123456 ki sakhty malwmat ko zayada sy zayada mhafwza rkhtay hawiay۔ghraf aymbydangh tknyk ka astamal mshyn sykhnay kay kam kay liye ghrafwn ko zayada sy zayada farmyt main tbdyl karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔sykhy hui aymbydangh ko mkhtlf bhaaw kamwn main khsawsayat kay tawr par astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay nwda ki drjha bndy ، lnk ki pyshn ghwiy ، klstrngh ، sfarshat aur mazeed 4۔awykt jghha main tyar krdha nan lainr aur anthaaiy malwmaty ghraf aymbydangh (ya khsawsayat) aasany sy mkhtlf bhaaw ghraf tjzayaty kamwn jesay nwda ki drjha bndy ، lnk ki pysh ghwiy ، kmywnty ka ptha lghanay ، tsawr wghyrha wghyrha ko hal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ghraf ko srayt karnay kay tarykwn ka hadf nwdas ko ayk awykt wyktr ki jghha main ankwda karna hay ، yany ، hr nwda ki khsawsayat ko ayk chhwty jhat kay sath wyktr main pyk kryn۔bnyady tawr par ، zayada tr jdyd ghraf nwda aymbydangh tknyk ayk asalaha kay msilay ko hal krkay kam jhaty nwda ki nmaindghy sykhty hain ، jo ghair mnkwlha sykhnay kay askyma ki pyrwy krty hay aur bhaaw ki pysh ghwiy kay kamwn sy aazaad haay۔ghraf aymbydangh tknykwn ko ghraf nywrl nyt wrks main astamal kya jaskta hay takha madalza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay takha woh ghraf sy tshkyl shuda dayta 12123.1research ghyt 2towardatacience3arxiv4raechsumit5academic-accelerator6towardatacience ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kar inhain bhatr bnaiyn

Question: jab sytlait amyjry kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty ho tou chylnjza aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: chylnjwn aur thafzaat jab sytlait ki mnzar kshy kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty hain tou shaml hayn: mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta: sytlait amyjry kay l labed lybl laga hoa dayta ki mhadwd dstyaby sy ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt karna mshkl hawskta haay۔mshkl 1۔jarj daytasyt saiza: sytlait amyjry daytasyts braay hawsktay hain ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt aur tshkhysa ki kmpywtyshnl laght main azuafha krsktay hayn۔، un madalza ko tyar karna mshkl bnata hay jo hr ksm kay dayta 2 ko snbhal saktay hayn۔ btryntyblty: ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trjmany karna mshkl hawskta hay ، js sy yeh smjhna mshkl hawta hay keh madal apni pysh ghwiyan kis tarah bna raha haay۔sytlait amyjry kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt ، bshmwl mntkly lrnngh ، dayta brahaw ، aur bakaadha 152463۔an tknykwn ka mksad sytlait amyjry ayply kyshnza main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔as kay alawha ، mhakkyn trjmany ko bhatr bnanay aur sytlait amyjry 43 kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki kmpywtyshnl laght ko kam karnay kay tarykwn ki tlash kar rahay hayn۔khlasaha yeh keh ، sytlait amyjry kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal kiy chylnjwn aur thafzaat ko pysh krsktay hain ، jn main mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta ، pry prwsysngh ، braay daytasyt saiza ، mtfawt aur tshryha shaml hayn۔taham ، mhakkyn un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain aur sytlait amyjry ayply kyshnza main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna rahay hayn۔

Question: myta rynfwrsmnt lrnngh aur is ki drkhwastwn kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: myta-anfwrsmnt lrnngh ayk ksm ki mshyn lrnngh hay js main kmk sykhnay kay tnazar main sykhnay ka tarykha sykhna shaml haay۔myta rynfwrsmnt lrnngh ka hadf ayjntwn ki trky karna hay jo mazuy kay tjrbat sy sykh kar niay kamwn aur mahawl ko tyzay sy dahal saktay hayn۔myta-anfwrsmnt lrnngh main myta lrnr ki trbyt shaml hay jo kamwn kay ayk syt sy sykhnay ka tarykha sykh sakti hay ، aur phir is myta lrnr ko niay tasks 123 kay mtaabk dahalnay kay liye astamal krna۔ myta-anfwrsmnt lrnngh ki drkhwastwn main shaml hayn: myta-rynfwrsmnt lrnnghniay mahawl aur tasks 45 ko jldy sy dahalnay kay liye rwbwt ko trbyt denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔niy zaban kay kamwn aur mahawlyat ko jldy sy dahalnay kay liye tryn kay madalza 4. pywtr wzen: myta rynfwrsmnt lrnngh ko niay bsary kamwn aur mahawl ko tyzay sy dahalnay kay liye madalza ki trbyt denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ myta-anfwrsmnt lrnngh kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: myta- myta-kmk lrnngh ayjntwn ki karkrdghy ko niay kamwn aur mahawl ko jldy sy apnanay ki ajazat dy kar bhatr bna sakti haay۔: myta-anfwrsmnt lrnngh ka atalak wsya pymanay par kamwn par kya jaskta hay ، js main rwbwtks ، ghym playngh ، kdrty zaban prwsysngh ، aur kmpywtr wyzen 123 shaml hayn۔ taham ، myta anfwrsmnt lrnngh bhi mtadd chylnjza pysh krskty hay ، bshmwl: mnasb alghwrthm ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary:myta rynfwrsmnt lrnngh kay l the mnasb alghwrthm ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 123 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔an chylnjwn ka azaalha karty hoey ، mhakkyn myta anfwrsmnt lrnngh kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain ، jn main haaibrda kay tarykay ، hum aahanghy ، aur haaiprprmytrza 123 ki asalaha shaml hayn۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 123 main myta-anfwrsmnt lrnngh ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، myta rynfwrsmnt lrnngh mshyn lrnngh main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo ayjntwn ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hay takha inhain niay kamwn aur mahawl main jldy sy apnanay ki ajazat day۔

Question: jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal main mtn kay aadad wa shmar kay jzabat ka tjzayha aur drjha bndy karnay kay liye ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks ka astamal shaml haay۔jzabat kay tjzayha kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: ghhary sykhnay kay madal: ghhary sykhnay kay madal ، jesay bar bar chlnay waly aasaaby nyt wrks (aar ayn ayn ays) ، knfywil nywrl nyt wrks (sy ayn ayn ays) ، aur tawyl klyl mdty mymwry (ayl ays ty aym) nyt wrks ، hayn۔mtny aadad wa shmar 12345 kay jzabat ka tjzayha aur drjha bndy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha aksar karwbary adarwn kay zaryaha saarfyn kay tasarat main branda aur msanwaat kay jzabat ki nghrany aur saarfyn ki zurwryat ko smjhnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza 12 main un pt kay liye dayta tyar karnay kay liye twknaizayshn ، astymngh ، aur astap wrda ko hatana jesay kam shaml hayn۔yha bygh aaf wrdaza ، wrda aymbydanghza ، aur ayn ghrams 125 jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ madal ki trbyt: jzabat kay tjzayha kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ko lybl laga hoa dayta par trbyt di jati hay ، jahan dayta kay hr tkraay ko msabt ، mnfy ، aur lybl lghaya jata haay۔ghyr janbdarmadalza niay dayta 12345 kay jzabat kay baray main pysh ghwiyan karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn aur talkat ki nshandhay karna sykhtay hayn۔ jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal astamal karnay kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr drstghy: ghhary sykhnay kay madal zayada pychydha sykh kar jzabat kay tjzayay ki drstghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔dayta 12345 main pytrn aur talkattjzayha kay kam ، bshmwl swshl mydaya manytrngh ، kstmr fyda byk tjzayha ، aur msanwa ka jaizaha tjzayha 12345. bharhaal ، jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، bshmwl: mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta: jzabat kay tjzayay kay lybl laga hoa aadad wa shmar ki mhadwd dstyabyghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko trbyt dena mshkl bna sakta haay۔jzabat ka tjzayha ، bshmwl mntkly lrnngh ، dayta brahaw ، aur bakaadha 125۔an tknykwn ka mksad jzabat kay tjzayha ki ayply kyshnza main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main mtny aadad wa shmar kay jzabat ka tjzayha aur drjha bndy karnay kay liye ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks ka astamal shaml hay ، aur un kay pas karwbar aur swshl mydaya tjzayha main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hayn۔

Question: ghhary bsary nmaindghy sykhnay main khud sakhtha sykhnay ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: ghhary bsary nmaindghy sykhnay main khud sakhtha sykhnay sy mrad ghhary asaby nyt wrks ki trbyt kay aml sy hawta hay takha wazuha nghrany ki zurwrt kay baghair bsary aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy sykhyn۔as kay bjaiay ، madalza ko dayta main hi mwrwsay dahanchay aur nmwnwn sy sykhnay ki trbyt di jati haay۔ghhary bsary nmaindghy sykhnay main khud sakhtha sykhnay kay kuch mkasad yeh hayn: prytrynngh: khud sakhtha sykhnay ko bray mkdar main lybl waly aadad wa shmar par ghharay asaby nyt wrk ko pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js kay bad chhwtay lybl laga hoa daytasyts par thyk twn kya jaskta haay۔mkhsawsa TASKS12.Feature nkalnay: bsary aadad wa shmar sy aysy khsawsayat ko nkalnay kay liye khud sakhtha sykhnay ka astamal kya jaskta hay jo dusray mshyn lrnngh madalza ، jesay drjha bndy karnay waly ya aabjykt ka ptha lghanay waly 123 kay tawr par astamal hawsktay hayn۔ dawmyn mwafkt: khud sakhtha sykhnay ko apnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayk dawmyn par dusray dawmyn par trbyt yaftha madal ، jesay kdrty amyjza par mydaykl amyjza par trbyt yaftha madalza 45. dayta ki karkrdghy: khud sy zayr aml sykhnay sy ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki dayta ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay js sy woh baghair lybl waly dayta sy sykh saktay hain ، aur zurwrt ko kam krsktay hayn۔bray mkdar main lybl laga hoa dayta 123۔ ghhary bsary nmaindghy sykhnay main khud nghrany sykhnay kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: khud sy zayr aml sykhnay sy ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta hay takha woh bsary dayta 123 ki mazeed pychydha aur many khyza nmaindghy sykh skyn۔bhatr amwmyizayshn: khud sakhtha sykhnay sy ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko aam tawr par tksym sy bahar tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat mil sakti haay۔، wydaywza ، aur 3D dayta 123۔ bhar haal ، ghhary bsary nmaindghy sykhnay main khud nghrany sykhnay ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، bshmwl mnasb alghwrthm ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary: khud sy chlnay wali talym kay l appropriate mnasb alghwrthm ka antkhab chylnj hawskta hay awrmadal 123 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔ghhary bsary nmaindghy sykhnay main sykhna ، bshmwl haaibrda tarykwn ، mtwazay ، aur haaiprprmytrza 123 ki asalaha۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 123 main khud sy chlnay wali talym ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، khud sakhtha sykhna ghhary talym ki ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hay js ki mdd sy woh wazuha nghrany ki zurwrt kay baghair bsary aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy sykh saktay hayn۔

Question: kdrty zaban ki nsl kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kdrty zaban ki nsl kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza main mtn tyar karnay kay liye ghharay aasaaby nyt wrks ka astamal shaml hay jo ansany tharyry mtn ki tarah haay۔kdrty zaban ki nsl kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: ghhary sykhnay kay madal: ghhary sykhnay kay madal ، jesay bar bar chlnay waly aasaaby nyt wrks (aar ayn ayn ays) ، knfywil nywrl nyt wrks (sy ayn ayn ays) ، aur tawyl klyl mdty mymwry (ayl ays ty aym) nyt wrks ،mtn tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo ansany tharyry mtn 1234 sy mlta jlta haay۔ kdrty zaban ki nsl: kdrty zaban ki nsl (ayn ayl jy) mtn tyar karnay ka aml hay jo ansany tharyry mtn ki tarah haay۔mkhtlf anwaa aur farmyts main mtn tyar karnay kay liye ayn ayl jy madal ko thyk sy tyar kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl twyts ، blagh ، aur yahan tak keh kmpywtr kwda 25۔as main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza 12 main un pt kay liye dayta tyar karnay kay liye twknaizayshn ، astymngh ، aur astap wrda ko hatana jesay kam Question: sfarshat kay nzaam kay liye ghraf nywrl nyt wrks kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghraf nywrl nyt wrks (GNNs) ko ghraf kay tawr par dayta ko madal bnanay kay liye tjwyza krdha nzaamwn main astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main saarfyn aur aaitmza nwdas aur un kay mabyn talkat ki nmaindghy karnay waly knarwn ki haysayt sy hayn۔sfarshat kay nzaam kay l G GNNs sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: ghraf ki nmaindghy: sfarshat ka dayta ، jo saarfyn aur ashyaa par mushtamil hay ، kdrty tawr par ghraf kay tawr par madalngh kya jaskta haay۔jy ayn ayn dono nwda ki malwmat (anfrady malwmat) aur ayj anfarmyshn (talkat ki malwmat) dono sy sykh saktay hain ، js sy woh sfarshat kay nzaam kay liye ayk wadha mnd hal bnatay hayn۔astamal shuda malwmat aur sfarsh kay kamwn ky۔kchh msaalwn main ghraf knwwlyshnl nyt wrks (jy sy ayn ays) ، ghraf twjha nyt wrks (jy aay ty ays) ، aur ghraf aatw ankwdarza (jy aay ay ays) shaml hayn۔talkat: sfarshat kay nzaam kay l G GNNs kay astamal sy ayk chylnj yeh hay keh msanwaat kay mabyn talkat ghair mtnasb hawsktay hayn۔taham ، hr nwda ki dwhary srayt aur nawl kay nksaan ki tkryb pysh ghwiywn kay mkablay main nmayan bhatry lanay kay kabl bna sakti haay۔ sfarshat kay nzaam main jy ayn ayn kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr drstghy: jy ayn ayn dayta 13132 ki zayada pychydha aur many khyza nmaindghy sykh kar sfarshat kay nzaam ki drstghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔.bytr amwmyizayshn: jy ayn ayn sfarshat kay nzaam ko aam karnay main bhatry lasktay hain takha un ko tksym sy bahar tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 132 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhal skyn۔mywzak ki sfarshat 132۔ bharhaal ، sfarshat kay nzaam main jy ayn ayn ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، bshmwl: mnasb alghwrthm ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary: mnasb GNN alghwrthm ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 12 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔jy ayn ayn madalza ki trbyt aur tshkhysa karnay ki kmpywtyshnl laght main azuafha krsktay hain ، khasa tawr par braay daytasyts aur pychydha madalza 12 kay liay۔ un chylnjwn ko door karnay kay liye ، mhakkyn sfarshat kay nzaam main jy ayn ayn ko astamal karnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain ، jn main haaibrda kay tarykay ، mtwazay ، aur haaiprprmytr 12 ki asalaha shaml hayn۔an tknykwn ka mksad sfarshat kay nzaam ki ayply kyshnza main GNNs ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، GNNs ko ghraf kay tawr par dayta ko madal bnanay kay liye sfarshat kay nzaam main astamal kya jaskta hay ، aur un kay pas zaaty sfarshat aur dyghr sfarshat main bohat sy ayply kyshnza mwjwd hayn۔

Question: rwbwtks kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjwn aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: rwbwtks kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal kiy chylnjwn aur thafzaat ko pysh krsktay hain ، bshmwl: mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta: rwbwtks kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal kay liye lybl laga hoa dayta bnana mhangha aur wkt talb hawskta hay ، khasa tawr par jsmany rwbwtk sstmza 1 kay liay۔bhatr tshkhysa mytrks 2 ki zurwrt ki wjha sy rwbwtks kay l learning sykhnay kay madal mshkl hawsktay hayn۔ shmwlyt: rwbwtks kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal aksar nkly ki trbyt dytay hain ، jo mnfrd chylnjza pysh krsktay hain aur hamyshha hakyky dnya ko aam nahin krsktay hayn۔rwbwtks kay liye bray mkdar main aadad wa shmar ki zurwrt hawty hay aur yeh trbyt kay liye kmpywtyshnl mhangha hawskta haay۔mahawl kay baray main astdlal karnay aur namkml ya ghair ykyny malwmat ki bnyad par fysalay karnay kay kabl hawjaiyn۔ un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye ، mhakkyn rwbwtks kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt kay l various mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، bshmwl mntkly ki talym ، dayta brahawa ، aur bakaadghy 13۔an tknykwn ka mksad rwbwtks ayply kyshnza main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔as kay alawha ، mhakkyn rwbwtks 2 kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay liye tshkhysay mytrks aur nkly mahawl ko bhatr bnanay kay tarykwn ki tlash kar rahay hayn۔khlasaha tawr par ، rwbwtks kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal kiy chylnjwn aur thafzaat ko pysh krsktay hain ، jn main mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta ، tshkhysa mytrks ، nkly ، sykhnay ، mjsmha aur astdlal shaml hayn۔taham ، mhakkyn un chylnjwn sy nmtnay aur rwbwtks ayply kyshnza main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hayn۔

Question: drjha bndy kmk sykhnay aur is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: drjha bndy sy kmk kmk lrnngh (aych aar ayl) mshyn lrnngh ki ayk ksm hay js main kmk sykhnay kay msilay ko zayly khtawn ya sab tasks kay drjha bndy main ghlna shaml haay۔aaly stahay kam nchlay drjay kay kamwn par mushtamil hain ، aur ayjnt nchlay drjay kay kamwn ko hal krkay aaly staha kay kamwn ko hal karna sykhta haay۔yhaan aych aar ayl kay kuch ayply kyshnza aur fwaid hayn: rwbwtks: rwbwtks main aych aar ayl ka astamal rwbwt ko aasan sab tasks 1 main twra kar pychydha kamwn ko anjam denay kay kabl bnanay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، rwbwt ko khanay ki myza ko saaf karnay kay liye trbyt di jaskty hay jesay kam ko khtm karna ، ghrft karna ، aur chyzayn rkhna۔khlasaha 2 ki staha۔msaal kay tawr par ، ayk ayjnt kesi khyl ko sbjymza ya sab tasks main twra kar khylna sykh sakta haay۔ krydat asainmnt: aych aar ayl ayjnt ko mnasb sab tasks 3 ko krydat tfwyzu karnay ki ajazat dy kar kmk sykhnay main krydat asainmnt kay msilay ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ayjnt ko khlasaha 4 ki mkhtlf stahawn par dryaft karnay ki ajazat dy kar kmk sykhnay main bhatry laskty haay۔shaml kryn: bhatr karkrdghy: HRL ayjntwn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna kar khlasaha ki mkhtlf stahawn par sykhnay ki ajazat dy kar aur pychydha kamwn ko aasan sab tasks 21 main twra sakta haay۔ bytr amwmy bnana: HRL ayjntwn ki amwm ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dy kar un ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhal sakta haay۔tksym ka dayta aur nayab dayta 21۔flysyblty: aych aar ayl ko wsya pymanay par kamwn par laghw kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl rwbwtks ، ghym playngh ، aur fysalha sazay kay dyghr trtyb denay waly msail۔mnasb drjha bndy ka antkhab karnay myn: mnasb drjha bndy ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 54 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔chylnjza ، mhakkyn HRL kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki khwj kar rahay hain ، jn main haaibrda kay tarykay ، hum aahanghy ، aur haaiprprmytrza 54 ki asalaha shaml hayn۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 54 main aych aar ayl ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، aych aar ayl mshyn lrnngh main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo ayjntwn ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hay takha woh tjryd ki mkhtlf stahawn par sykh skyn aur pychydha kamwn ko aasan sab tasks main twra dyn۔

Question: madal par mbny kmk sykhnay aur is ki ayply kyshnza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: madal par mbny kmk lrnngh ayk mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay jo mshynwn ko skhanay kay liye ayk pysh ghwiy karnay wala madal astamal krty hay takha woh aykshn la kar aur anaamat 12 wsawl krkay astakstk mahawl main bhatryn fysalay kryn۔madal par mbny kmk sykhnay main ، ayjnt apnay mahawl ko smjhnay ki kwshsh krta hay aur mahawlyat 3 kay sath is kay taaml ki bnyad par is kay liye ayk madal tshkyl dyta haay۔as kay bad is madal ka astamal mkhtlf aamal kay ntaij ki pysh ghwiy kay liye kya jata hay ، aur ayjnt is aml ka antkhab krta hay js ki pysh ghwiy bhatryn ntaij 4 ki taraf ki jati haay۔ yahan madal par mbny kmk sykhnay aur is ki ayply kyshnza sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat hayn: ghhary sykhnay kay madal: madalmahawlyat 43 kay pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ko sykhnay kay liye ghhary aasaaby nyt wrks kay sath bysda kmk lrnngh ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔ tkhrwpn sy sykhna: madal par mbny kmk sykhnay ko msanway mahawl sy sykhnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jahan ayjnt msanway tawr par bat chyt krkay pysh ghwiy karnay wala madal sykhta haay۔mahawlyat 4. rwbwtks: rwbwtks main madal par mbny kmk lrnngh ka astamal rwbwt ko msanway mahawl sy sykhnay aur pychydha kamwn ko anjam denay kay kabl bnanay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ghym mahawlyat 4 ki nkaly krkay akdamat۔ madal par mbny kmk lrnngh lrnngh kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr drstghy: madal par mbny kmk sykhnay sy dayta 43 ki zayada pychydha aur many khyza nmaindghy sykh kar mshyn lrnngh madal ki drstghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ bytr jnrlaizayshn: madal-pr mbny kmk lrnngh mshyn lrnngh madalza ko aam tawr par tksym sy bahar tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 43 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy sakti haay۔awr khwdmkhtar gharayan 43. bhar haal ، madal par mbny kmk sykhnay ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، bshmwl: mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta: madal par mbny kmk sykhnay kay lybl laga hoa dayta ki mhadwd dstyaby is ko mshyn lrnngh madalza 3.completity ko trbyt denay kay liye mshkl bna sakti haay۔: madal par mbny kmk lrnngh madal sy pak kmk lrnngh sy kahain zayada pychydha hawskty hay ، js ki wjha sy is ko nafza karna aur bhatr bnana mshkl hawskta haay۔ham aahanghy ، aur haaiprprmytrza 43 ki asalaha۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 43 main madal par mbny kmk sykhnay ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، madal par mbny kmk lrnngh mshyn lrnngh main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo astakstk mahawl main bhatryn fysalay karnay kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ka astamal krkay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrks kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrks (GANs) ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay ka fn tamyr hay js main do aasaaby nyt wrks ، ayk jnrytr aur ayk amtyazay slwk hawta hay ، jo safr kay khyl kay frym wrk 123456 main ayk dusray kay khlaf mkablha krta haay۔jnrytr nyt wrk nya ، msanway aadad wa shmar tyar karna sykhta hay jo kuch marwf aadad wa shmar ki tksym sy mshabhat rkhta hay ، jabky amtyazay slwk karnay wala nyt wrk asaly aur jaly dayta 123456 kay darmiyan frk karna sykhta haay۔dwnwn nyt wrks ko ayk sath mil kar trbyt di jati hay ، jnrytr nay aadad wa shmar tyar karnay ki kwshsh ki hay jo amtyazay slwk ko bay wkwf bnaskty hay ، aur amtyazay slwk karnay waly ko sahayha tawr par yeh shnakht karnay ki kwshsh ki hogi hay keh aya dayta asaly hay ya jaly 123456۔ yahan kuch aham tsawrat hain jn kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat hain jn kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat hayn۔GANs: ghhary sykhnay kay madal: GANs ko ghhary asaby nyt wrks kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay knwwlyshnl nywrl nyt wrks (CNNs) aur bar bar nywrl nyt wrks (RNNS) ، niay aadad wa shmar ko tyar karnay kay liye jo kuch marwf dayta ki tksym sy mshabhat rkhtay hayn۔amyj jnryshn ، tykst jnryshn ، aur mywzak jnryshn 123456. pryprwsysngh: pry prwsysngh dayta GANs main ayk aham kdm haay۔as main ghhary sykhnay waly madalza 123456 main un pt kay liye dayta tyar karnay kay liye mamwl kay mtaabk ، aadad wa shmar ko brahana ، aur khsawsayt nkalnay jesay kam shaml hayn۔amtyazay slwk karnay wala asaly aur jaly dayta 123456 kay darmiyan frk karna sykhta haay۔ GANs kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr drstghy: ghhary sykhnay kay madal dayta 123456 ki zayada pychydha aur many khyza nmaindghy sykh kar GAN ki drstghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔GANs kay amwm ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dy kar un ko bhatr tawr par tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123456 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy sakta haay۔، GANs kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjwn aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، bshmwl: mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta: GANs kay lybl laga hoa dayta ki mhadwd dstyaby ghhary sykhnay kay madalza 123456 ko trbyt denay kay liye mshkl bna sakti haay۔jhaan jnrytr aaؤt pts ka ayk mhadwd syt tyar krta hay jo hakyky aadad wa shmar ki tksym 123456 ki mkml nmaindghy nahin krta haay۔ un chylnjwn ko door karnay kay liye ، mhakkyn GAN kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal astamal karnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، jn main haaibrda tarykwn ، mtwazay ، aur haaipr pyra mytrystrs 123456 ki asalaha shaml haay۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main GAN ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، GANs ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay ka fn tamyr hay js main do aasaaby nyt wrks ، ayk jnrytr aur ayk amtyazay slwk hawta hay ، jo ayk dusray kay khlaf safr kay khyl kay frym wrk main mkablha krta hay ، aur un kay pas tsawyry jnryshn jesay mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sy ayply kyshnza hain ،tykst jnryshn ، aur mywzak jnryshn

Question: madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk sykhnay ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk lrnngh ayk mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay js main aysay fysalay karnay kay liye mahawl kay pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ka astamal shaml hay jo anaam kay asharay ko zayada sy zayada bnaiay۔madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk sykhnay kay kuch mkasad yeh hayn: mwsar lrnngh: madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk sykhnay sy mkhtlf mnzarnamwn ki nkaly karnay aur ntaij ka andazaha karnay kay liye mahawl kay pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ka astamal krkay kuch aazamaishwn sy mwsar sykhnay ko kabl bnaya jaskta haay۔mkhtlf aykshnza۔ jnrlaizayshn: madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk lrnngh mkhtlf mnzarnamwn ki nkaly karnay aur mkhtlf aamal 2 kay ntaij ka andazaha karnay kay liye mahawl kay pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ka astamal krkay niay mahawl ko aam karnay kay kabl bna sakti haay۔mahawl kay pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ka astamal karty hoey wyrl anaamat kay sath sykhna mkhtlf mnzarnamwn ki tklyd karnay aur mkhtlf aamal 3 kay ntaij ka andazaha karnay kay liay۔ghym play 145۔ madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk lrnngh kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr drstghy: madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk sykhnay sy dayta 21345 ki zayada pychydha aur many khyza nmaindghy sykh kar mshyn lrnngh madal ki drstghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy sy mshyn lrnngh madalza ko aam karnay main bhatry laskty hay takha un ko tksym sy bahar kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 21345 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhal skay۔، khwdmkhtar gharayan ، aur ghym plyngh 145۔ taham ، madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk lrnngh ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، bshmwl: mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta: madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk sykhnay kay lybl laga hoa dayta ki mhadwd dstyaby isy bna sakti haay۔mshyn lrnngh madalza ko trbyt denay kay liye chylnj krna۔madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath sykhna ، bshmwl haaibrda tarykwn ، mtwazay ، aur haaiprprmytrza 14 ki asalaha۔an tknykwn ka mksad mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk sykhnay ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، madal par mbny mnsawbha bndy kay sath kmk sykhna mshyn lrnngh main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo mahawl kay pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ka astamal krkay madalza ki karkrdghy ، amwmy aur lchk ko bhatr bnaskty hay jo anaam sghnl ko zayada sy zayada krty haay۔

Question: jzabat ki phachan kay l deep ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jzabat ki phachan kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal main aasaaby nyt wrks ka astamal shaml hawta hay takha mkhtlf ksm kay aadad wa shmar ، jesay mtn ، tkryr aur bsary aadad wa shmar main jzabat ko phachanyn aur drjha bndy ki jaskyn۔jzabat ki shnakht kay l deep ghhary sykhnay kay madal sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: mtn par mbny jzabat ki shnakht: ghhary sykhnay kay madal tykst dayta main jzabat ko phachannay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔madalza ko tkryr sghnl ki sawty khsawsayat ، jesay pch ، sr ، aur tal 34. kay sawty khsawsayat ka tjzayha krkay tkryr kay aadad wa shmar main jzabat ko phachannay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ wyzawil par mbny jzabat ki phachan: ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko bsary aadad wa shmar main jzabat ko phachannay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔chharay kay tasarat aur afrad kay jsmany zaban۔as main dayp lrnngh madalza 136524 main un pt kay liye dayta tyar karnay kay liye khsawsayt ko nkalnay ، mamwl par lanay ، aur aadad wa shmar main azuafha jesay kam shaml hayn۔madalza jzabat 136524 ko phachannay kay liye aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn aur talkat ki nshandhay karna sykhtay hayn۔ jzabat ki shnakht kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr drstghy: ghhary sykhnay kay madal dayta 13136524 ki zayada pychydha aur many khyza nmaindghy sykh kar jzabat ki phachan ki drstghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔.bytr amwmyizayshn: ghhary sykhnay kay madal jzabat ki phachan ko aam karnay main bhatry lasktay hain takha un ko tksym sy bahar tksym kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 136524 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhal skyn۔mtn ، aur bsary aadad wa shmar 136524. taham ، jzabat ki shnakht kay l deep ghhary sykhnay kay madal ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi shaml hain ، bshmwl: mhadwd lybl laga hoa dayta: jzabat ki shnakht kay l labed lybl laga hoa dayta ki mhadwd dstyaby ghhary sykhnay kay madalza 136524 ki trbyt karna mshkl bna sakti haay۔awr tghyr: jzabat ki shnakht kay madalza ko un pt dayta main shwr aur tghyrat ko snbhalnay kay kabl hona chahaiay ، jesay ps mnzar kay shwr ، lhajay ، aur chharay kay tasarat jn ki trjmany karna mshkl hay ۔136524۔ un chylnjwn sy nmtnay kay liye ، mhakkyn ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hayn۔jzabat ki phachan kay l transfer ، transfr lrnngh ، dayta brahaw ، aur bakaadha 136524۔an tknykwn ka mksad jzabat ki shnakht kay astamal main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، jzabat ki phachan kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal main aasaaby nyt wrks ka astamal mkhtlf ksm kay aadad wa shmar main jzabat ko phachannay aur drjha bndy karnay kay liye shaml hawta hay ، aur un kay pas nfsyat ، ansany kmpywtr ki bat chyt ، aur markytngh jesay mkhtlf shabwn main bohat sari ayply kyshnza mwjwd hayn۔

Question: nwda ki drjha bndy kay liye ghraf nywrl nyt wrks kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghraf nywrl nyt wrks (jy ayn ayn) nwda ki drjha bndy kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo is ki khsawsayat aur is kay prawsywn ki khsawsayat par mbny ghraf main nwda kay lybl ki pysh ghwiy karnay ka kam haay۔nwda ki drjha bndy kay liye jy ayn ayn sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: ghhary sykhnay kay madal: jy ayn ayn ka astamal ghraf main nwdas aur knarwn ki nmaindghy sykhnay aur nwdas 123456 kay lybl ki pyshn ghwiy kay liye kya jata haay۔ghraf ، jahan nwdas adarwn aur knarwn ki nmaindghy karty hain un kay mabyn talkat ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔as main GNS123456 main un pt kay liye dayta tyar karnay kay liye nwda ki khsawsayt nkalnay ، ghraf ko mamwl par lanay ، aur dayta brahaw jesay kam shaml hayn۔nwdas 123456 kay lyblwn ki pysh ghwiy kay liye madalza aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn aur talkat ki nshandhay karna sykhtay hayn۔ nwda ki drjha bndy kay liye jy ayn ayn kay astamal kay fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr drstghy: jy ayn ayn dayta 123456 ki zayada pychydha aur many khyza nmaindghy sykh kar nwda ki drjha bndy ki drstghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔.bytr amwmyizayshn: jy ayn ayn nwda ki drjha bndy ko bhatr bnanay kay aadad wa shmar aur nayab dayta 123456 ko bhatr tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dy kar un ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔awr sfarsh kay nzaam 123456۔ bharhaal ، nwda ki drjha bndy kay liye jy ayn ayn ka astamal karty wkt kuch chylnjza aur thafzaat bhi mwjwd hain ، bshmwl: mnasb alghwrthm ko mntkhb karnay main dshwary: mnasb GNN alghwrthm ka antkhab mshkl hawskta hay aur madal 123456 ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par mtasar krskta haay۔: GNNs madalza ki trbyt aur tshkhysa karnay ki kmpywtyshnl laght main azuafha krsktay hain ، khasa tawr par braay daytasyts aur pychydha madalza 123456 kay liay۔ un chylnjwn ka azaalha karnay kay liye ، mhakkyn nwda ki drjha bndy kay liye GNNs kay astamal kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ki tlash kar rahay hain ، js main haaibrda tarykwn ، mtwazay tawr par ، aur haaipr pyramytrys 123456 ki asalaha shaml haay۔an tknykwn ka mksad nwda drjha bndy ki ayply kyshnza main GNNs ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، jy ayn ayn ko nwda ki drjha bndy kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo is ki khsawsayat aur is kay prawsywn ki khsawsayat par mbny ghraf main nwda kay lybl ki pysh ghwiy karnay ka kam hay ، aur un kay pas swshl nyt wrk tjzayha ، baiyw anfarmytks ، aur sfarsh main bohat sy drkhwastyn hayn۔sstmza

Question: jab fnans kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty ho tou chylnjwn aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: fnans kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt apnay chylnjwn aur thafzaat kay apnay syt kay sath aaty haay۔tlash kay ntaij main kuch aham chylnjwn aur thafzaat ki nshandhay ki hogi hay jn ki nshandhay ki hogi haay: chylnjza: madal ki pychydghy aur shfafyt ki kmy: ghhary sykhnay kay madal pychydha aur kam shfaf hain ، jo rsk mynjmnt aur madal ki twsayk main chylnjwn ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔ dayta chylnjza۔: agarcha fnans main bohat sary aadad wa shmar dstyab hain ، fnans main taim syryza ka dayta (jysay astak ki kymtyn) dayta sy bhwk lagi ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay l often aksar kam saiza main hawta haay۔mhadwd taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar par bnaiay gaye madal kdrty tawr par kam trbyt yaftha aur ghalat tarykay sy dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js ki wjha sy zayly bhatr karkrdghy ka mzaaharha hawta haay۔ryghwlytry tkazuwn kay liye jn par twjha di jany chahaiay۔madalza aaly karkrdghy kay hasawl kay liye aaly mayar kay hayn۔ madal ki nghrany: madal kay bhaaؤ ka ptha lghanay aur is ka ptha lghanay kay liye mnasb madal manytrngh sstm mwjwd hona chahaiay ، jo is wkt hawskta hay jab dayta ya mahawlyat 4.in main tbdylywn ki wjha sy madal ki karkrdghy wkt kay sath khrab hawjaty haay۔khlasaha ، jab fnans kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt karty hain tou kuch aham chylnjwn aur thafzaat main madal ki pychydghy aur shfafyt ki kami ، dayta chylnjza ، had sy zayada mnasb ، ryghwlytry tkazuay ، madal ki wzuahat ، dayta ka mayar ، aur madal manytrngh shaml haay۔achhy karkrdghy kay hasawl aur is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh un chylnjwn aur thafzaat sy nmtna bohat zurwry hay keh madal maly fysalha sazay kay liye karaamd hayn۔

Question: mlty ayjnt kmk sykhnay aur is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mlty ayjnt kmk lrnngh lrnngh (marl) kmk lrnngh ka ayk zayly fylda hay jo mshtrkha mahawl 1 main ayk sath rhanay waly mtadd sykhnay waly ayjntwn kay tarza aml ka mtaalaha karnay par mrkwza haay۔har ayjnt apnay apnay anaamat sy mtasar hawta hay aur apnay mfadat ko aaghay brahanay kay liye akdamat krta hay ، jo bazu awkat dusray ayjntwn kay mfadat kay khlaf bhi hawskta hay ، js kay ntyjay main pychydha ghrwp harkyat hawtay hayn۔marl ka ghym thywry aur khasa tawr par bar bar khylwn kay sath sath mlty ayjnt sstm 1 sy bhi ghhara talk haay۔as kay mtaalaay main msaaly alghwrthm ki tlash kay hasawl ko ykja kya gaya hay jo tsawrat kay zayada maashrty syt kay sath anaamat ko zayada sy zayada karty hayn۔ marl main bohat sari ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main shaml hain lekin un tak mhadwd nhayn: mstkbl kay antrnyt: aaindha antrnyt main abhrtay hoey amwr ko hal karnay kay liye is tarah ka atalak kya gaya haay۔jysa keh nyt wrk tak rsaiy aur transmyshn 2 rwbwtks: marl ko rwbwtk tymwn main astamal kya gaya hay aur tksym shuda kntrwl 3۔mart fyktrywn: marl ko smart fyktrywn kay andr fysalha sazay kay msail par laghw kya gaya hay ، jahan ghair ykyny sawrthaal aur mtadd fysalha sazay kay ajzaaa sy nmtnay kay liye zurwry haay۔tryfk kntrwl: marl ko tryfk kay bhaaؤ ko bhatr bnanay aur bhyra ko kam karnay kay liye astamal kya gaya haay۔as main mstkbl main antrnyt ، rwbwtks ، smart fyktrywn ، tryfk kntrwl ، aur fnans shaml hayn۔

Question: tarza ki mntkly kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: astail ki mntkly kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ayk ksm kay asaby nyt wrk hain jo ayk tsawyr kay mwad ko dusray amyj 12 kay andaza kay sath jwra kar niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔yha madal ayk pehlay sy trbyt yaftha knwwlyshnl nywrl nyt wrk (sy ayn ayn) ko ayk shbyhaha sy dusri tsawyr main astail ki mntkly kay l additional aur ayk niy tyar krdha shbyhaha ki trkyb kay sath shaml karty hain js main hum 13 shaml karna chahti hayn۔astail ki mntkly kay aml main drj zayl mrahal 4 shaml hayn: un pt amyjza: ayk mwad ki shbyhaha aur ayk astail ryfrns amyj mntkhb kya gaya haay۔ fychr nkalnay: sy ayn ayn mwad aur astail amyjza sy khsawsayat ko nkalnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mwad ki shbyhaha ، astail amyj ، aur tyar krdha amyj kay mabyn akhtlafat ko kam sy kam kryn۔ aaptymaizayshn: pyda hony wali shbyhaha ko nksaan kay fnkshn ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye bhatr bnaya gaya haay۔ is kay ntyjay main shbyhaha ayk niy shbyhaha hay jo asal shbyha kay mwad ko is andaza kay sath jwraty haay۔hawalha tsawyrastail ki mntkly kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko niy aart wrk bnanay ، tsaawyr ko astailaiza karnay ، ya mkhsawsa astail 12 kay sath niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔an madalza ka atalak wsya pymanay par ayply kyshnza par kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl lekin is tak mhadwd nhayn: msanway aart wrk: astail transfr kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko saarf ki fraham krdha tsaawyr 2 main mshhawr pyntnghza ki zaahary shkl mntkl krkay niy aart wrk bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔astail ki mntkly: un madalza ko ayk tsawyr kay andaza ko dusri tsawyr main mntkl karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy niy astailaizada tsaawyr 2۔ ryil taim astailaizayshn: astail transfr kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ko tsaawyr aur wydaywza ki asal wkt kay astailaizayshn ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔: un madalza ko mwbail ayply kyshnza main astamal kya jaskta hay takha saarfyn ko ryil taim 2 main astailaizada amyjza aur wydaywza bnanay ki ajazat di jaskay۔ khlasaha main ، tarza ki mntkly kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ayk ksm kay asaby nyt wrk hain jo mwad ko ykja krkay niy tsaawyr tyar karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ayk shbyhaha ki dusri tsawyr kay andaza kay sath۔an madalza main ayply kyshnza ki ayk wsya rynj hay ، js main msanway aart wrk ، fwtw ghrafy kay andaza ki mntkly ، ryil taim astailaizayshn ، aur mwbail ayply kyshnza shaml hayn۔

Question: Q-lrnngh kay sath kmk sykhnay ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kyw lrnngh kay sath kmk lrnngh sykhna ayk ksm ki mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm hay jo mwjwdha astyt 12 ko dyiay janay kay liye bhatryn akdam tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔kyw lrnngh kay sath kmk sykhnay ka mksad ayk aysy palysy sykhna hay jo kal anaam ko zayada sy zayada bnaiay۔kyw lrnngh alghwrthm ayk madal fry ، aaf palysy kmk sykhnay waly alghwrthm hay js kay liye mahawlyat 13 kay madal ki zurwrt nahin haay۔alghwrthm un akdamat sy sykhta hay jo mwjwdha palysy sy bahar hain ، jesay bay trtyb akdamat athana ، aur isi wjha sy palysy ki zurwrt nahin haay۔kyw tybl hr ryast kay liye bhatryn karrwaiy tlash karnay main mdd krta hay ، aur is sy hr mmknha akdamat 2 ka antkhab krkay mtwka anaam ko zayada sy zayada karnay main mdd mlty haay۔kyw lrnngh main kyw sy mrad is fnkshn sy mrad hay jo alghwrthm ghnty krta hay ، jo dyiay gaye ryast 3 main ki janay wali karrwaiy kay mtwka anaamat hayn۔kyw lrnngh kay sath kmk sykhnay main bohat sari ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main rwbwtks ، ghymngh ، fnans ، aur haylth kyir 456 tak mhadwd nahin haay۔alghwrthm ko pychydha mahawl main fysalha sazay ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jahan zayada sy zayada aml hamyshha wazuha nahin hawta hay ، aur yeh tjrbha sy sykh kar wkt kay sath nzaam ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd fraham krskta haay۔

Question: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madalza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ayk ksm kay aasaaby nyt wrk hain jo aadad wa shmar main ghair mamwly nmwnwn ya bahar janay walon ki shnakht kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔yha madal kesi nzaam kay mamwl kay tarza aml ko sykhnay aur phir is tarza aml sy kesi bhi anharaf ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: khsawsayt nkalnay: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal un pt dayta sy khsawsayat ko nkalnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal karty hayn۔an tknykwn main knwwlyshnl nywrl nyt wrks (sy ayn aynza) ، aatw ankwdarza ، aur bar bar hony waly aasaaby nyt wrks (aar ayn ayn ays) shaml hayn۔ayk sstm 32 ka slwk۔ aaؤt lyir ki nmaish: aaؤt lyir ki nmaish ayk aysy tknyk hay js main mamwly aur aaؤt lyir dono aadad wa shmar par ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ki trbyt shaml hawty hay takha un ki tshkhysa ki salahayt ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔bnyad par bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay ، dhwkha dhay ka ptha lghanay ، dkhl andazay ka ptha lghanay ، aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali bhaaly 5. khlasaha main ، bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ayk ksm kay aasaaby nyt wrk hain jo aadad wa shmar main ghair mamwly nmwnwn ya bahar janay walon ki shnakht kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔yha madal khsawsayt ko nkalnay kay l various mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal karty hain aur aksar ghair mnzam andaza main trbyt haasal karty hayn۔an kay pas mkhtlf shabwn main wsya pymanay par ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main lagh par mbny bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay ، dhwkha dhay ka ptha lghanay ، dkhl andazay ka ptha lghanay ، aur pysh ghwiy ki dykh bhal shaml haay۔

Question: ghraf jnryshn kay liye ghraf nywrl nyt wrks kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghraf jnryshn kay liye ghraf nywrl nyt wrks (jy ayn ayn) ayk ksm ka ghhara sykhnay ka madal hay jsay niay ghraf tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ghraf jnryshn kay liye GNNs sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: amkany madal: ghraf jnryshn kay liye GNNs niay ghrafs 12. klask ghraf jnrytw madal tyar karnay kay liye ghraf par amkany madal bnatay hayn۔madal 23.mwdarn ghraf jnrytw madal: jdyd ghraf jnrytw madalza ghhary sykhnay ki tknyk jesay jy ayn ayn ، mtghyr aatw ankwdarza ، ghhary aatw ryghrysy madalza ، aur jnrytw aydawrsyiryl nyt wrks 3 ka faidha athatay hayn۔mytrks ، nwda aymbydanghza ، aur ghraf aymbydangh 4. ayply kyshnza: ghraf jnryshn kay liye jy ayn aynza main bohat sari ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main mnshyat ki dryaft ، swshl nyt wrk tjzayha ، aur sfarshat kay nzaam 45. khlasaha main ، ghraf jnryshn kay liye jy ayn ayn ayk ksm ki ghhary sykhnay ka madal hain jo kar saktay hayn۔niay ghraf tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaiay۔yha madal ghraf par amkany madal tyar karty hain aur ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal karty hayn۔an kay pas mkhtlf shabwn main wsya pymanay par ayply kyshnza hain ، jn main mnshyat ki dryaft ، swshl nyt wrk tjzayha ، aur sfarsh kay nzaam shaml hain ۔1 ghraf nywrl nyt wrks 2 asprynjr 3 ghraf nywrl-nyt wrks 4 dastyl 5 wanda by۔

Question: sahat ki dykh bhal kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt karty wkt chylnjwn aur thafzaat kya hayn؟
Answer: sahat ki dykh bhal kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt apnay chylnjwn aur thafzaat kay apnay syt kay sath aaty haay۔tlash kay ntaij main kuch aham chylnjwn aur thafzaat ki nshandhay ki hogi hay jn ki nshandhay ki hogi haay: chylnjza: dayta ka mayar aur dstyaby: sahat ki dykh bhal ka dayta aksar pychydha ، mtzuad aur namkml hawta hay ، jo ghhary sykhnay kay madalza 1234. dayta ki razadary aur sykywrty ki trbyt kay l challenges chylnjza bn sakta haay۔: sahat ki dykh bhal kay aadad wa shmar skht razadary aur sykywrty kay zuwabta kay taba hain ، jo aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy ko mhadwd krsktay hain aur adarwn 4 main dayta ko bantna mshkl bna saktay hayn۔maaljyn aur mryzuwn kay liye un kay fysalay 53.mwdal aam krnay: ayk daytasyt par trbyt yaftha ghhary lrnngh madal dusray daytasyts ya aabady ko achhy tarah sy aam nahin krsktay hain ، jo klynykl prykts 3 main un ki afadyt ko mhadwd krsktay hayn۔ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ko trbyt denay kay liye astamal hony wala dayta aaly mayar ka hay aur haynda 12 main kam kay l appropriate mnasb haay۔ byn alzuabtaha taawn: maaljyn ، dayta sainsdanwn aur dyghr astyk hawldarza kay mabyn bahamy taawn ko ykyny bnanay kay liye aham hay keh ghhary sykhnay kay madal ko hakyky dnya kay taby msail sy nmtnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay awrtabyr aur kabl wzuahat 53. akhlaky aur kanwny thafzaat: sahat ki dykh bhal kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ko akhlaky aur kanwny kwaad wa zuwabta ki tamyl main tyar karna chahaiay aur un ko taynat kya jana chahaiay ، bshmwl aadad wa shmar ki razadary aur sykywrty 4 sy mtalk۔ madal ki twsayk: is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye mnasb madal ki twsayk zurwry haay۔madal drst ، kabl aatmad aur niay dayta 3 kay liye amwmy hayn۔ khlasaha main ، kuch aham chylnjwn aur thafzaat main sy kuch jab sahat ki dykh bhal kay liye ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki trbyt main dayta ka mayar aur dstyaby ، dayta ki razadary aur slamty ، tshryha aur wzuahat ، aur madal amwmy kary shaml hayn۔an chylnjwn aur thafzaat sy nmtna is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye bohat zurwry hay keh ghhary sykhnay kay madal klynykl fysalha sazay kay liye karaamd hain aur mryzuwn kay ntaij ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔

Question: tynsrf flw ka astamal karty hoey ayk sadha fydafwrwrda nywrl nyt wrk ki wzuahat kay liye kwda ka tkraa lkhyn۔
Answer: tynswr flw ka astamal karty hoey ayk sadha fydafwrwrda nywrl nyt wrk ki wzuahat karnay kay liye yahan ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: Pythonimport Tensorflow kay tawr par TF# madal madal = tf.keras.sebent ki wzuahat kryn۔784 ،)) ، tf.keras.layers.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn = 'saft myks')])# madal madal ko mrtb kryn۔yha kwda tynswr flw ka astamal karty hoey do prtwn kay sath ayk sadha fydafwrwrda nywrl nyt wrk ki wzuahat krta haay۔phaly prt main 64 ywnt hawtay hain aur rylw ayktywyshn fnkshn astamal karty hain ، jabky dusri prt main 10 ywnt hawtay hain aur saft myks ayktywyshn fnkshn astamal karty hayn۔phaly prt ki un pt shkl (784 ،) hay ، jo chpty hui 28x28 pksl amyj kay msawy haay۔as kay bad madal ko aydam aaptaizar ، zamrha dar krastrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy mytrk kay sath mrtb kya gaya haay۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha madalza ki wzuahat azuafy prtwn ko shaml krkay aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay ki jaskty haay۔

Question: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey tsawyry drjha bndy kay liye mjaza asaby nyt wrk (CNN) ki trbyt kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey tsawyry drjha bndy kay liye ayk kwda snypyt: paiythwnym pwrt tarchym pwrt tarch daat ayn ayn kay tawr par nynm pwrt tarch wyzen am pwrt tarch wyzen ka astamal karty hawiay۔: spr (nyt ، khwd)) sylf۔aam5 * 5) x = nn.functional.relu (self.fc1 (x)) x = nn.functional.relu (self.fc2 (x)) x = self.fc3 (x) wapsy x# Cifar-10 daytasyt transfarmaamtryn = sch ، daaؤn lwda = sch ، transfarm = transfarm) tryn lwdar = mshal.= tarch.a aaptym.sgh day (nyt.paramytrza () ، ayl aar = 0.001 ، rftar = 0.9) # sy ayn ayn ayf aw aar ko rynj (2) main trbyt dyn (2): # daytasyt par mtadd bar rnngh_lws = 0.0 par lwp ، I kay liye dayta (tryn lwda (tryn lwdar)، 0): # un pt haasal karain ؛dayta [an pt ، lybl] ki fharst haay] un pt ، lybl = dayta # safr pyramytr ghrydaynts aaptymaizar۔ zarw_ghrada () # farwrda + bykwrda + ko bhatr bnaiynaaptymaizar.aysp () # prnt kay aadadwshmar chl raha haay_lws += nksaan۔ aaitm () agar i ٪ 2000 == 1999: # hr 2000 mny bych prnt ('[٪ d ، ٪ 5d] nksaan: ٪ .3f' ٪+ 1 ، i + 1 ، rnngh_lws / 2000)) rnngh_lws = 0.0 prnt ('tyar trbyt') yeh kwda ayk sy ayn ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat krta hay js main do knwwlwshnl prtyn ، do mkml tawr par mnslk prtyn ، aur ayk saft myks aaؤt pt prt haay۔CIFAR-10 daytasyt ko bhry hui aur mamwl par laya jata hay ، aur nksaan ki tkryb aur aaptymaizar ki wzuahat ki jati haay۔as kay bad sy ayn ayn ko daytasyt par do ahadwn kay liye trbyt di jati hay ، js main nksaan hr 2000 mny bychwn par chhpa jata haay۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha madalza ki wzuahat azuafy prtwn ko shaml krkay aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay ki jaskty haay۔

Question: tynswr flw main rjat psndy kay kam kay liye awsta askwairda ghltay (aym ays ay) kay nksaan ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsr flw main rjat psndy kay kam kay liye wsta askwairda ghltay (aym ays ay) kay nksaan ka hasab lghanay kay l we ، hum Tf.keras.losses.meansquarederror () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal ka fnkshn hay jo pysh ghwiy ki hogi akdar aur hakyky akdar ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur aym ays ay kay nksaan ko lwtata haay: paiytwnympwrt tynswr flw kay tawr par Tfdef hasab ktab_msy_lws (Y_PRED ، Y_TRUE): mse_loss = tf.keras.loss.loss.meansquarederror (Ye_loss = mse_loss (Ye_loss ())Y_PRED) wapsy ka nksaan۔ NUMPY () is fnkshn main ، hum pehlay TF.KERAS.LOSSES.MEANSQUAREDERROR () klas ki ayk msaal tyar karty hayn۔as kay bad hum aym ays ay kay nksaan ka hasab lghanay kay liye hakyky akdar aur pysh ghwiy ki akdar ko klas ki msaal kay tawr par pysh karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum nmy () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk nmy srny kay tawr par nksaan ki kymt lwtatay hayn۔as fnkshn ka astamal tynsr flw main kesi bhi rjat psndy kay kam kay liye aym ays ay nksaan ka hasab ktab karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tynswr flw ka astamal karty hoey ghhary sykhnay kay madal main bych ko mamwl par lanay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: tynsr flw ka astamal karty hoey ghhary lrnngh madal main bych ko mamwl par lanay kay liye yahan ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: Pythonimport Tensorflow kay tawr par TF# madal madal = tf.keras.sectiven ki wzuahat karain ([tf.keras.layers.conv2d (32 ، 32 ، 3) ، ayktywyshn= 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (28 ، 28 ، 1)) ، tf.keras.layers.batchnormalization () ، tf.keras.layers.maxpooling2d ((2 ، 2)) ، tf.keras.layers.flatten ()، tf.keras.layers.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn = 'saft myks')]])# is kwda main madal mwdal daat kampail (aaptymaizar = 'aydam' ، nksaan = 'zamrha dar_krasyntrwpy' ، mytrks = ['drstghy'] mrtb karain ،ham ayk sadha sy ayn ayn fn tamyr ki wzuahat karty hain js main ayk mjazay prt ، bych narmlaizayshn prt ، zayada sy zayada pwlngh prt ، flytn prt ، aur ghhnay aaؤt pt prt hawty haay۔tf.keras.layers.batchnormalization () fnkshn ko knwwlyshnl prt kay bad madal main bych ko mamwl par lanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔bych ko mamwl par lanay sy sykhnay kay aml ko msthakm karnay aur ghhary sykhnay kay madal ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔as kay bad madal ko aydam aaptaizar ، zamrha dar krastrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy mytrk kay sath mrtb kya gaya haay۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur bych ko mamwl par lanay waly TF.Keras.layers.batchnormalization () prtwn ko knfywzenl ya ghhnay prtwn kay bad zayada pychydha madalza main shaml kya jaskta haay۔

Question: paitwrch main apni mrzuy kay mtaabk daytasyt aur dayta lwdar bnanay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: paitwrch main kstm daytasyt aur dayta lwdar bnanay kay liye yahan ayk msaal ka fnkshn haay: paiythwnym pwrt tarchfrm tarch.tyls daat dayta ampwrt daytasyt ، daytalwdarklas kstm daytasyt (daytasyt): dayf __INIT __ (khwd ، dayta ، ahadaf ، tbdyly = koi bhi nhayn): sylf daat dayta =dayta sylf۔ tarjts = ahadaf khwd۔ transfarm = transfarm dayf __len __ (khwd).Transform: x = self.transform (x) wapsy x ، y# ayk kstm daytasyt dayta bnaiyn = tarch.ryndan (100 ، 3 ، 32 ، 32) ahadaf = mshal. ryndaynt (0 ، 10 ، (100 ،)) kstm_daytasyt =kstm daytasyt (dayta ، ahadaf)# apni mrzuy kay mtaabk daytasyt bych_saiza = 10custom_dataloader = dataloader (kstm_daytasyt ، bych_saiza = bych_saiza ، shfl = sch) kay liye kstm daytasyt bych_saiza kay liye dayta lwdar bnaiyn ، is msaal main ، hum kstm daytasyt ki wzuahat karty hain js ko kstm daytasyt kehty hain jo aadad wa shmar ، ahadaf aur hadfwn main hawta hay jo lyta hay js main dayta ، hadf aur hadfwn main hawta hay jo lyta hay js main dayta ، hadf aur hadfwn main hawta hay js main kstm daytasyt hawta haay۔akhtyary tbdyly un pt kay tawr pr۔__len__ tarykha daytasyt ki lmbaiy lwtata hay ، aur __getItem__ tarykha kesi dyiay gaye andayks main dayta aur hadf ka ayk tpl lwtata haay۔aghr koi transfarm fraham kya jata hay tou ، waps aanay sy pehlay dayta par is ka atalak hawta haay۔as kay bad hum tsaadfy tawr par tyar krdha dayta aur ahadaf kay sath kstm daytasyt klas ki ayk msaal bnatay hayn۔aakhr main ، hum daytalwdar klas ka astamal karty hoey kstm daytasyt kay liye ayk dayta lwdar bnatay hain ، jo kstm daytasyt ، bych saiza ، aur un pt kay btawr shfl prchm lyta haay۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha daytasyts aur dayta lwdarza ki wzuahat azuafy tarykwn ko shaml krkay aur un pt pyramytrza ko aydajst krkay ki jaskty haay۔

Question: zaawyr ya is ki abtdaa ka astamal karty hoey aasaaby nyt wrk kay wzan ko shrwa karnay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: pyiwrch main zaawyr ya is ki abtdaa ka astamal karty hoey aasaaby nyt wrk kay wzan ko shrwa karnay kay l we ، hum mshal daat ayn ayn daat madaywl astamal krsktay hayn۔zaawyr abtdaa ka astamal karty hoey aasaaby nyt wrk kay wzan ko shrwa karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay: paiythwnympwrt tarchympwrt tarch daat ayn ayn kay btawr ayn ayn# ayk sadha nywrl nyt wrk ki wzuahat karain js main 2 lyirsklas nyt (nn.module) haay: Def __init __ (khwd): spr (nyt (nyt)، khwd) .__ init __ () sylf۔nn.init.xavier_uniform_ (self.fc2.weight) Def farwrda (khwd ، x): x = mshal۔flatn (x ، 1) x = nn.functional.relu (self.fc1 (x)) x = self.fc2(x) wapsy x# is kwda main nyt wrk nyt = nyt () ki ayk msaal bnaiyn ، hum do mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum zaawyr anyshlaizayshn ka astamal karty hoey do prtwn kay wzan ko shrwa karnay kay liye nn.init.xavier_uniform_ () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔xavier_uniform_ () fnkshn ayk mkhsawsa rynj kay sath yksan tksym sy tyar krdha akdar kay sath wzan ka aaghaza krta hay ، js ka hasab is prt kay un pt aur aaؤt pt ywntwn ki tadad ki bnyad par kya jata haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh hr prt kay ntaij ka tghyr is kay aadanwn kay tghyr kay brabr hay ، jo trbyt kay doran ghaib hony waly tdryjy msilay ko rwknay main mdd krskta haay۔yha zaawyr anyshlaizayshn ko astamal karnay ki sirf ayk msaal hay ، aur is ki abtda nn.init.xavier_uniform_ () ko nn.init.kaiming_uniform _ () kay sath isi tarah astamal ki jaskty haay۔

Question: tynswr flw ka astamal karty hoey ghhary sykhnay kay madal main darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ko nafza karnay kay liye kwda ka tkraa lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsr flw ka astamal karty hoey ghhary sykhnay kay madal main darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum TF.Keras.layers.dropout () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔aasaaby nyt wrk main darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ko shaml karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: TF# kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt tynsrflw madal madal = tf.keras.sective ([tf.keras.layers.dense (64 ، ayktywyshn = 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (784 ،)) ، tf.keras.layers.dropout (0.2) ، tf.keras.layers.dense.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn = 'saft myks')])# madal mwdal daat kampail (aaptymaizar = 'aydam' ، nksaan = 'mrtb krynzamrha dar_krasyntrwpy '، mytrks = [' drstghy ']) is kwda main ، hum do mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum pehli prt kay bad madal main darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ko shaml karnay kay liye tf.keras.layers.dropout () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔darap aaؤt () fnkshn ayk hi dlyl main lyta hay ، jo darap aaؤt ryt hay ، ya ghrnay kay liye un pt ywntwn ka hasaha haay۔as kay bad madal ko aydam aaptaizar ، zamrha dar krastrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy mytrk kay sath mrtb kya gaya haay۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ko TF.Keras.layers.layers.dropout () prtwn kay bad zayada pychydha madalza main shaml kya jaskta haay۔

Question: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey trbyt yaftha ghhary sykhnay kay madal ko bchanay aur lwda karnay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey trbyt yaftha ghhary sykhnay kay madal ko bchanay aur lwda karnay kay l we ، hum mshal daat syw () aur mshal daat lwda () afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔trbyt yaftha madal ko bchanay aur lwda karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: paiytwnympwrt tarch tarch tarch. ayn ayn kay btawr nynmpwrt mshal.nyt ، khwd)x = nn.functional.relu (self.fc1 (x)) x = self.fc2 (x) x# nyt wrk nyt = nyt ()# nyt wrk ki ayk msaal bnaiyn# nyt wrk# ...# trbyt yaftha madal path = ko mhafwza karain = 'model.pt'torch.save (net.state_dict () ، rastha)# mhafwza krdha madal madal = nyt () madal.lwda_styt_dakt (mshal. lwda (rastha)) madal۔ aywl () is kwda main ، hum ayk sadha nywrl ki wzuahat karty hayndw mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn wala nyt wrk۔as kay bad hum nyt wrk ko trbyt dytay hain aur mshal daat syw () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey trbyt yaftha madal ko mhafwza karty hayn۔astyt_ dakt () ka tarykha madal kay sirf sykhay hoey pyramytrza ko bchanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo bad main mshal daat lwda () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey lwda kya jaskta haay۔as kay bad hum nyt wrk ki ayk msaal bnatay hain aur lwda_styt_dakt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey mhafwza krdha madal ko lwda karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum madal ko aywl () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tshkhysa kay mwda par mrtb karty hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha madal ko isi tarah sy mhafwza aur bhry jaskty haay۔

Question: tynsrf flw main aydam aaptaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: tynswr flw main aydam aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: pythwnympwrt tynsrflw kay tawr par TF# madal madal = tf.keras.sectiven ki wzuahat karain ([tf.keras.layers.dense (64 ، ayktywyshn = 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (784 ، ، 784 ،)) ، tf.keras.layers.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn = 'saft myks')]])# aaptymaizarptymaizar = tf.keras.optimizers.adam (lrnngh_ryt = 0.001) ki wzuahat kryn# madal madal daat kampail (aaptymaizar = aaptymaizar ، nksaan= 'zamrha dar_krasyntrwpy' ، mytrks = ['drstghy']) is kwda main ، hum do mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum Tf.keras.optimizers.adam () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey aydam aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karty hain aur sykhnay ki shrha ko 0.001 par syt karty hayn۔as kay bad aaptymaizar ko nksaan ki tkryb aur drstghy mytrk kay sath sath madal kay mrtb () tarykha kar main mntkl kya jata haay۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur sykhnay ki shrha aur dyghr haaiprpymytrza ko aydajst krkay aydam aaptaizar ka astamal karty hoey zayada pychydha madal ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔

Question: Pytorch ka astamal karty hoey CNN main knwwlwshnl prt kay zaryaha sykhay gaye fltrza ko tsawr karnay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: Pytorch ka astamal karty hoey CNN main ayk mjazay prt kay zaryaha sykhay gaye fltrza ko dykhnay kay l we ، hum tarch wyzen.utils.make_grid () aur matplotlib.pyplot.imshow () afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan sy ayn ayn ki pehli knfywil prt kay zaryaha sykhay gaye fltrza ko dykhnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay: paiythwnym pwrt tarchym pwrt tarch daat ayn ayn ayn aym pwrt tarch wyzen kay tawr pr۔ madalzam pwrt tarch wyzen kay tawr par madal۔lyirsklas nyt (nn.module): def __init __ (khwd): spr (nyt ، khwd)Conv2 = nn.conv2d (16 ، 32 ، dana_saiza = 3 ، straida = 1 ، pydangh = 1) sylf۔ pwl = nn.maxpool2d (danaiy_saiza = 2 ، straida = 2) sylf۔ ayf sy 1 = nn.linear (32 * 8 *8 ، 10) dayf farwrda (khwd ، x): x = nn.functional.relu (self.conv1 (x)) x = self.pool (nn.functional.relu (self.conv2 (x))) x = x.View (-1 ، 32 * 8 * 8) x = self.fc1 (x) wapsy x# nyt wrk nyt = nyt () ki ayk msaal bnaiyn ()# pehlay knwwlyshnl lyir fltrza kay zaryaha sykhay gaye fltrza ka tsawr karain = nyt.kwn wy 1. wyt.dayta.CLONE () fltrza - fltrza.myn () fltrza = fltrza / fltrza۔ myks () img = utils.make_grid (fltrza ، nrow = 4) plt.imshow (img.permute (1 ، 2 ، 0)) plt. () is kwda main ، hum ayk sadha sy ayn ayn ki wzuahat karty hain js main do mjaza thawn aur mkml tawr par mnslk aaؤt pt prt haay۔as kay bad hum nyt wrk ki ayk msaal bnatay hain aur nyt.kwn wy 1. wyt.dayta wsaf ka astamal karty hoey pehli knfywil prt kay wzan ko nkaltay hayn۔as kay bad hum kam sy kam () aur zayada sy zayada () tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey 0 aur 1 kay darmiyan wzan ko mamwl par latay hain ، aur myk_ghryda () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fltrza ka ayk ghrda bnatay hayn۔aakhr main ، hum fltrza kay ghrda ko zaahar karnay kay liye Matplotlib.pyplot madaywl sy IMSHOW () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha madalza ko prt aur fltr andayks ko aydajst krkay tsawr kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tynsr flw ki tsawyry pry prwsysngh afaal ka astamal karty hoey daytasyt par dayta ko brahawa denay kay liye kwda ka tkraa lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsrf flw ki tsawyry pry prwsysngh afaal ka astamal karty hoey daytasyt par dayta ko brahawa denay kay l we ، hum tf.keras.preprocessing.image.imagedatagenerator () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔daytasyt par dayta ko brahawa denay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay: paiytwnympwrt tynsrflw kay tawr par TF# daytasyt ko lwda karain (tryn_mjza ، tryn_ lyblza) ، (tyst_aymjza ، tyst_lybl)tryn_aymjza۔ ryshyp ((60000 ، 28 ، 28 ، 1)) tyst_aymjza = tyst_mjza۔ ryshp ((10000 ، 28 ، 28 ، 1))# amyjstryn_aymjza ko mamwl bnaiyn ، tyst_aymyjza = tryn_mjza / 255.0 ، tyst_aymjza / 255.0= tf.keras.preprocessing.image.imagedatagenerator (ghrdsh_raynj = 20 ، chwraaiy_shft_rynj = 0.1 ، awnchaiy_shft_rynj = 0.1 ، shyir_rynj = 10 ، zawm_rynj = 0.1 ، afky_flap = sch ، fl_mwda = 'kryb trien =' kryb trien ')datadatagen.fit (tryn_mjza)# braha hoa imagedighted_dataset = datagen.flow (tryn_mjza ، tryn_ lyblza ، bych_saiza = 32) kay sath ayk nya daytasyt bnaiyn۔)) is kwda main ، hum pehlay MNIST daytasyt ko lwda karty hain aur tsaawyr ko 28x28x1 main tbdyl karty hayn۔as kay bad hum tsaawyr ko 0 aur 1 kay darmiyan mamwl bnatay hayn۔mwndanay ، zawmngh ، aur pltna۔ham ft () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey trynngh dayta main dayta brahanay waly jnrytr ko ft bythtay hain ، aur phir bhaaؤ () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey braha hoa tsaawyr kay sath ayk nya daytasyt bnatay hayn۔aakhr main ، hum ft () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey madal ko braha hoa daytasyt par trbyt dytay hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur amyjdatajynrytr () fnkshn kay un pt pyramytrza ko aydajst krkay zayada pychydha aadad wa shmar ko brahawa denay wali paip lainwn ki wzuahat ki jaskty haay۔

Question: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey ghhary lrnngh madal ki trbyt kay doran abtdaiy astapngh ko nafza karnay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey ghhary lrnngh madal ki trbyt kay doran abtdaiy astap ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum Pytorch_lighting.callbacks madaywl sy abtdaiy astapngh kal byk ka astamal krsktay hayn۔abtdaiy astapngh ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: paiytwnym pwrt tarchympwrt tarch. ayn ayn kay btawr nnimport mshal. optim as opmimport pytorch_lighting as pytorch_lighting.callback.calbacks.arely_stopping abtdaiy tawr par draamd# 2 lyirzaklas nyt kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karain (pl.lytningmodule)__init __ (khwd): spr (nyt ، khwd).flatten (x ، 1) x = nn.functional.relu (self.fc1 (x)) x = self.fc2 (x) wapsy x Def trynngh_stp (sylf ، bych ، bych_dayks): x ، y = bych y_hat = khwd(x) nksaan = nn.functional.cross_entropy (Y_HAT ، y) sylf.lagh ('tryn_lws' ، nksaan) wapsy lws daf ki twsayk_ astp (sylf ، bych ، bych_ aai day ayks): x ، y = bych y_hat = khud (x) nksaan =nn.functional.cross_entropy (Y_HAT ، y) self.log ('val_loss' ، nksaan)# nyt wrk nyt = nyt ()# aaptymaizar aaptymaizar = aaptym.adaym (nyt.pyramytrza () ، ayl aar = 0.001) ki wzuahat kryn# abtdaiy rwknay ki wzuahat karain kal byk bykar_astwp_kal byk byk = abtdaiy astapngh (manytr = 'wyl_lws' ، sabr = 3)# ayk paitwrch laitngh trynr trainr = pl.trainer bnaiyn (myks_pwchza = 10 ، kal byks = [abtdaiy_astp_kal byk] ، prwghrys_bar_ryfrsh_ryfrsh_ryfrsh_ryfrsh_ryfrsh_ryfrsh_ryfryn۔۔as kay bad hum Pytorch_lighting.callbacks madaywl sy abtdaiy astapngh klas ka astamal karty hoey aaptymaizar aur abtdaiy rwknay waly kal byk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham zayada sy zayada 10 ahadwn aur abtdaiy astapngh kal byk kay sath ayk paitwrch laitngh trynr bnatay hayn۔as kay bad hum trynr kay ft () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey madal ko trbyt dytay hayn۔abtdaiy tawr par kal byk twsayk kay nksaan ki nghrany krta hay aur trbyt ko rwkta hay agar twsayk kay nksaan main mslsl 3 ahadwn main bhatry nahin aaty haay۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur abtdaiy astapngh klas kay un pt pyramytrza ko aydajst krkay abtdaiy astap kay sath zayada pychydha madalza ki trbyt ki jaskty haay۔

Question: tynsr flw main drjha bndy kay kam kay liye kras ayntrwpy nksaan ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: tynswr flw main drjha bndy kay kam kay liye kras ayntrwpy nksaan ka hasab lghanay kay l we ، hum tf.keras.loss.loss.categoricalcrossentropy () ya tf.keras.losses.binarycrossentropy () afaal astamal krsktay hain ، klaswn ki tadad par mnhasar haay۔، hum tf.keras.losses.binarycrossentropy () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yha fnkshn bainry drjha bndy kay msail kay l true hakyky lyblwn aur pysh ghwiy waly lybl kay mabyn kras antrwpy kay nksaan ki ghnty krta haay۔fnkshn kay liye hakyky lyblwn ko ya tou 0 ya 1 hony ki zurwrt hawty hay ، aur pysh ghwiy shuda lybl ayk wahad flwtngh pwaint wylyw hony ki zurwrt hawty hay jo lagh un ya amkan ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as fnkshn ko mndrjha zayl astamal kya jaskta haay: pythwnympwrt tynsrflw kay tawr par TF# hakyky lybl ki wzuahat karain aur pysh ghwiy ki hogi lybl_tryw = tf.constant ([0 ، 1 ، 0 ، 1]) y_pred = tf.constant ([0.1 ، 0.9 ، 0.2 ، 0.8])# bainry kras ayntrwpy laslws = tf.keras.losses.binarycrossentropy () (y_true ، y_pred) mlty klas ki drjha bndy kay kamwn kay liye hasab lghaiyn ، hum tf.keras.loss.categoricalcrossentropy () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yha fnkshn mlty klas ki drjha bndy kay msail kay l true hakyky lyblwn aur pysh ghwiy waly lybl kay mabyn kras ayntrwpy nksaan ki ghnty krta haay۔fnkshn kay liye hakyky lyblwn ko ayk ghrm ankwda hony ki zurwrt hawty hay ، aur pysh ghwiy shuda lybl klaswn main amkany tksym hony ki zurwrt hawty haay۔as fnkshn ko mndrjha zayl astamal kya jaskta haay: paiytwnympwrt tynsrflw kay tawr par TF# hakyky lyblwn ki wzuahat karain aur pysh ghwiy ki hogi lybl_tryw = tf.constant ([[0 ، 1 ، 0] ، [1 ، 0 ، 0] ، [0 ، 0 ، 1]]) y_pred = tf.constant ([[0.2 ، 0.7 ، 0.1] ، [0.8 ، 0.1 ، 0.1] ، [0.1 ، 0.2 ، 0.7]])# zamrha jat kras-antrwpy laslws = tf.keras.loss.categoricalcrossentropy ((0.1 ، 0.2 ، 0.7]]) ka hasab lghaiyn۔) (Y_TRUE ، Y_PRED) dono hi maamlat main ، zamrha dar krasyntrwpy () ya bainry krasyntrwpy () fnkshn ayk askylr tynsr waps krta hay jo nksaan ki nmaindghy krta haay۔

Question: paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (RNN) ki trbyt kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (aar ayn ayn) ki trbyt kay liye ayk kwda ka tkraa yeh haay: paiythwnym pwrt tarchympwrt tarch daat ayn ayn aym pwrt tarch kay tawr pr، pwshydha_ saiza ، aaؤt pt_ saiza): spr (aar ayn ayn ، khwd).softmax = nn.logsoftmax (dim = 1) dayf farwrda (khwd ، un pt ، pwshydha): mshtrkha = mshal daat kyt ((an pt ، pwshydha) ، 1) pwshydha = khwd۔ ii2h (mshtrkha) aaؤt pt = khwd۔ ii2o (mshtrkha) aaؤt pt = sylf.swft myks (aaؤt pt) rytrn aaؤt pt ، pwshydha dayf un init_hidden (khwd): rytrn tarch.zarws (1 ، sylf. haaidada_saiza)# trynngh daytayn pt_dayta = ['haylw' ، 'dnya' ، 'kysay' ، 'kysay' ، 'ky wzuahat kryn۔'،' aap '] aaؤt pt_dayta = [' aylwha '،' dalrw '،' wwha '،' ayra '،' ywiay ']# un pt aur aaؤt pt saizays un pt_saiza = lyn (an pt_dayta [0]) aaؤt pt_saiza = lyn (aaؤt pt_dayta (aaؤt pt_dayta ki wzuahat kryn.() ، ayl aar = 0.1) # rynj (100) main mwdaylfwr kay ahad ko trbyt dyn: rynj (lyn (an pt_dayta)) main kay liay: pwshydha = rnn.init_hidden () # un pt aur aaؤt pt dayta ko tynsrza main tbdyl karain un pt_tynsr = mshal۔ tynsr۔([ord (c) C kay liye un pt_dayta [i]] ، dtype = mshal. flwt).nksaan aur psmandha pas nksaan = mayar (aaؤt pt ، aaؤt pt_tynsr) nksaan۔ bykwrda () # pyramytrza ko ap dayt karain aaptymaizar۔ astp () # nksaan prnt ('aypwch [{}/{}] ، mrhalha [{}/{}]، nksaan: {: .4f} '.saft myks aaؤt pt prt۔as kay bad hum trbyty aadad wa shmar ki wzuahat karty hain ، js main un pt trtyb aur isi tarah kay aaؤt pt trtyb par mushtamil hawta haay۔ham RNN madal ki ayk msaal bnatay hain aur nksaan kay fnkshn aur aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum un pt aur aaؤt pt dayta par ghhwnslay waly lwp ka astamal karty hoey 100 aypchwn kay liye madal ki trbyt karty hayn۔har tkrar main ، hum un pt aur aaؤt pt dayta ko tynsrza main tbdyl karty hain ، pwshydha ryast ko shrwa karty hain ، aar ayn ayn kay zaryaay farwrda pas anjam dytay hain ، nksaan ka hasab lghatay hain ، psmandha pas anjam dytay hain aur pyramytrza ko ap dayt karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum hr tkrar kay liye nksaan prnt karty hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur aar ayn ayn kay zayada pychydha madalza ko fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay trbyt di jaskty haay۔

Question: tynswr flw ka astamal karty hoey ghhary sykhnay kay madal main L1 ya L2 ryghwlraizayshn ko nafza karnay kay liye kwda ka tkraa lkhyn۔
Answer: tynswr flw ka astamal karty hoey dayp lrnngh madal main L1 ya L2 ryghwlraizayshn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tf.keras.regularizers.l1 () ya tf.keras.regularizers.l2 () afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔aasaaby nyt wrk main L2 bakaadghy ko shaml karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: Pythonimport Tensorflow kay tawr par TF# madal madal = tf.keras.sective ([tf.keras.layers.dense.dense (64 ، ayktywyshn = 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = ((an pt_shp = (an pt_shp =784 ،) ، dana_jyrylaizar = tf.keras.regularizers.l2 (0.01)) ، tf.keras.layers.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn = 'saft myks')])# madal madal daat kampail (aaptymaizar = 'aydam' ، nksaan= 'zamrha dar_krasyntrwpy' ، mytrks = ['drstghy']) is kwda main ، hum do mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum pehli prt main L2 bakaadghy ko shaml karnay kay liye tf.keras.regularizers.l2 () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔L2 () fnkshn ayk hi dlyl main lyta hay ، jo bakaadghy ki taakt haay۔as kay bad madal ko aydam aaptaizar ، zamrha dar krastrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy mytrk kay sath mrtb kya gaya haay۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur L1 bakaadghy ko tf.keras.regularizers.l1 () ya tf.keras.regularizers.l1l2 () prtwn main bakaadha bnanay kay zaryaay mazeed pychydha madalza main shaml kya jaskta haay۔darap aaؤt ryghwlraizayshn ko TF.Keras.layers.dropout () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey madal main bhi shaml kya jaskta haay۔

Answer: paitwrch main pehlay sy trbyt yaftha sy ayn ayn ko thyk twn krkay mntkly ki talym ko anjam denay kay l we ، hum mshal wyzan daat madal madaywl 1 kay zaryaha fraham krdha pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madal aur wzan astamal krsktay hayn۔ayk niay daytasyt par pehlay sy trbyt yaftha ryzanyt 18 madal ko thyk karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay: paiythwnym pwrt tarchympwrt tarch daat ayn ayn aym .4f}'.format (Epoch+1 ، 10 ، i+1 ، lyn (tryn_daytalwdar) ، nksaan. aaitm ()))# tyst syt krykt = 0total = 0 kay sath mshal. no_grad () par madal ka andazaha kryn: un pt kay liye ، tyst_daytylwdar main ki drstghy: ٪ d ٪٪ '٪ (100 * drst / kl)) is kwda main ، hum pehlay trbyt aur tyst kay sytwn kay liye dayta main tbdyly ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum amyj fwldar klas ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko lwda karty hain aur trbyt aur tyst syt kay l data dayta lwdar tyar karty hayn۔ham madalza.rysnyt 18 (pretrained = True) fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey pehlay sy trbyt yaftha ryzanyt 18 madal ko lwda
