daytasyt main do klaswn kay mtaabk hayn۔ham nksaan kay fnkshn aur aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karty hain ، aur dayta par ghhwnslay waly lwp ka astamal karty hoey 10 aypwch kay liye madal ki trbyt karty hayn۔har tkrar main ، hum ayk farwrda pas anjam dytay hain ، nksaan ka hasab lghatay hain ، psmandha pas anjam dytay hain ، aur pyramytrza ko ap dayt karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum tyst syt par madal ka jaizaha lytay hain aur drstghy prnt karty hayn۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay zayada pychydha madalza ko thyk kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tynswr flw main rftar kay sath astakstk tdryjy nzawl (ays jy day) aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsr flw main rftar kay sath astakstk mylandaynt nzawl (ays jy day) aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tf.keras.optimizers.optimizers.sgd () fnkshn ko rftar pyramytr kay sath astamal krsktay hain js ki kymt 0 sy zayada ki kymt par mkrr ki hogi haay۔rftar kay sath ays jy day aaptymaizar: paiytwnympwrt tynswrflw btawr TF# madal madal = tf.keras.sective ([tf.keras.layers.dense (64 ، ayktywyshn = 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (784 ،)) ، tf.keras.layers ki wzuahat kryn۔.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn = 'saft myks')]])# lmhaha bha lmhaha ki wzuahat krynzamrha dar_krasyntrwpy '، mytrks = [' drstghy ']) is kwda main ، hum do mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum SGD aaptymaizar ki wzuahat 0.01 ki sykhnay ki shrha aur 0.9 ki rftar kay sath tf.keras.optimizers.sgd () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey karty hayn۔rftar pyramytr tdryjy ap dayts par laghw hony kay liye rftar ki mkdar ko kntrwl krta haay۔0 ki kymt mayary ays jy day sy mmasal hay ، jabky 1 ki kymt pori rftar kay msawy haay۔as kay bad hum madal ko ays jy day aaptymaizar ، zamrha dar krasyntrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy mytrk kay sath mrtb karty hayn۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay zayada pychydha madalza ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔

Question: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey CNN kay ayktywyshn nkshwn ko dykhnay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey sy ayn ayn kay ayktywyshn nkshwn ko dykhnay kay l we ، hum tarch wyzan.tyls.myk_ghryda () aur mytplwtlyb.pyplwt.mshw () afaal astamal krsktay hayn۔ham farwrda pas kay doran ayk mkhsawsa prt kay ayktywyshn nkshwn ko nkalnay kay liye Pytorch nn.module klas kay rjstr_fwrda_hak () ka tarykha bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk sy ayn ayn kay ayktywyshn nkshwn ko dykhnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: paiytwnym pwrt tarch tarch tarch daat ayn ayn aym pwrt mshal.madaywl): dayf __init __ (khwd): spr (nyt ، khwd).farwrda (khwd ، x): x = nn.functional.relu (self.conv1 (x)) x = self.pool (nn.functional.relu (self.conv2 (x))) x = x.view (-1.phalay knwwlyshnl lyir ayktywyshn = {} dayf get_activation (nam) kay ayktywyshn kay nkshay nkalyn: dayf hak (madal ، un pt ، aaؤt pt): ayktywyshn [nam] = aaؤt pt.daytach () waps hak nyt۔))# farwrda un pt amyj ko nyt wrk aaؤt pt = nyt (amyj) kay zaryaay pas kryn# pehlay knwwlyshnl lyir ayktywyshn = ayktywyshn ['Conv1'] ayktywyshnza = ywtyls.myk_ghryda (ayktywyshnza ، ayn aar aw = 4) plt.imshow (ayktywyshnza.permute (1 ، 2 ، 0)) plt.show () is kwda main ، hum ayk sadha sy ayn ayn ki wzuahat karty hain js main do knwwlwshnl prtyn aur ayk mkml tawr par mnslk aaؤt pt prt haay۔as kay bad hum nyt wrk ki ayk msaal bnatay hain aur un pt amyj ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham rjstr_fwrwrda_hak () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey farwrda pas kay doran pehli knwwlwshnl prt kay ayktywyshn nkshwn ko nkalnay kay liye ayk hak ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum un pt amyj ko nyt wrk kay zaryaay aaghay brahatay hain aur hak ka astamal karty hoey ayktywyshn kay nkshay nkaltay hayn۔aakhr main ، hum myk_ghryda () aur IMSHOW () afaal ka astamal karty hoey ayktywyshn nkshwn ka tsawr karty hayn۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha madalza ko prt aur fltr andayks ko aydajst krkay tsawr kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "tyst syt par madal ki tshkhysa karnay kay liye ayk kwda ka tkraa lkhyn aur tynsrf flw ka astamal karty hoey drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، aur yad ko yad rkhyn۔"
Answer: tyst syt par madal ki tshkhysa karnay kay l and aur tynsrf flw ka astamal karty hoey drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، aur yad karnay ka hasab lghaiyn ، hum TF.KERAS.Metrics madaywl astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan tyst syt par kesi madal ka andazaha karnay aur drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، aur yad karnay kay liye kesi madal ka andazaha karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: Pythonimport tensorflow kay tawr par TF# madal madal = tf.keras.section ki wzuahat karain ([tf.keras.layers.dense (64 ، ayktywyshn)= 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (784 ،))) ، tf.keras.layers.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn = 'saft myks')])# drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، aur yad karnay waly mytrks mwdal daat kam kay sath madal mrtb karain (aaptymaizar = 'aydam'، nksaan =' zamrha dar_krasyntrwpy '، mytrks = [' drstghy '، tf.keras.metrics.precision () ، tf.keras.metrics.recall ()])# tyst sytlas ، drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، yad karnay waly madal ka andazaha kryn= madal.awlyt (x_test ، Y_Test ، verbose = 1)# tshkhysa mytrks prnt ('tyst nksaan:' ، nksaan) prnt ('tyst ki drstghy:' ، drstghy) prnt ('tyst ki sahat sy mtalk:' ، sahat sy mtalk) prnt ('prnt (' prnt ('tyst ki yad: '، yad kryn) is kwda main ، hum do mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum madal ko aydam aaptaizar ، zamrha dar krastrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، aur TF.Keras.Metrics madaywl ka astamal karty hoey mytrks ko yad karty hayn۔ham tshkhysa () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tyst syt par madal ka jaizaha lytay hain aur nksaan ، drstghy ، sahat sy mtalk ، aur yaddasht ki pymaish ko nkaltay hayn۔aakhr main ، hum tshkhysay mytrks prnt karty hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay zayada pychydha madalza ka andazaha kya jaskta haay۔

Answer: paitwrch main ghytda bar bar aanay waly ywnt (GRU) syl ko nafza karnay kay liye ، hum mshal daat ayn ayn ayn jy ghrwsyl () ya mshal daat ayn ayn.ghrw () afaal astamal krsktay hain jo paiwrch kay zaryaha fraham krdha afaal hayn۔tarch daat ayn ayn ayn ayn ayn ayn ayn ayn ayn ayn ayn aar ays kay astamal kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay۔= mshal. ryndan (3 ، 10)# abtdaiy pwshydha astyt haaidayn_styt = mshal. zarws (3 ، 20) ki wzuahat kryn# farwrda un pt tynsr ko GRU syl aaؤt pt_tynsr = [] kay zaryaay pas karain (an pt_tynsr.saiza () [0]): pwshydha_astyt = gru_cell (an pt_tynsr [i] ، pwshydha_styt) aaؤt pt_tynsr.aypynda (pwshydha_styt) aaؤt pt_tynsr = mshal۔ astyk (aaؤt pt_tynsr)# is kwda main aaؤt pt tynswr prnt (aaؤt pt_tynsr) prnt karain ، hum 10 kay sath ayk ghrw syl ki wzuahat karty hayn۔awr nn.grucell () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey 20 ka pwshydha saiza۔as kay bad hum saiza 3x10 kay un pt tynsr aur saiza 3x20 ki abtdaiy pwshydha haalt ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham GRU syl kay zaryaha un pt tynsr ka farwrda pas ayk far lwp ka astamal karty hoey anjam dytay hain aur aaؤt pt tynsr ko kesi fharst main shaml karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum aaؤt pt tynsr ko astyk karty hain aur isy prnt karty hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha GRU madalza ko fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay nafza kya jaskta haay۔tarch daat ayn aar yw () ka astamal karty hoey GRU madal ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay: Pythonimport Turchimport Turch.nn as nn# gru modelgru = nn.gru ki wzuahat karain (an pt_saiza = 10 ، pwshydha_saiza = 20 ، num_layers = 2)#an pt tynswr un pt_tynswr = mshal. ryndan (5 ، 3 ، 10) ki wzuahat kryn# abtdaiy pwshydha astyt haaidada_styt = tarch.zarws (2 ، 3 ، 20) ki wzuahat kryn# farwrda un pt tynsr ko GRU madal aaؤt pt_tynsr kay zaryaay mntkl kryn)# is kwda main aaؤt pt tynsr aur pwshydha astyt prnt (aaؤt pt_tynsr) prnt (pwshydha_ astyt) prnt karain ، hum ayk mlty lyir ghrw madal ki wzuahat karty hain js main 10 kay un pt saiza ، 20 kay pwshydha saiza ، aur 2 prtwn ka astamal karty hayn۔) fnkshn.as kay bad hum saiza 5x3x10 kay un pt tynsr aur saiza 2x3x20 ki abtdaiy pwshydha haalt ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham GRU () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey GRU madal kay zaryaha un pt tynsr ka farwrda pas anjam dytay hain aur aaؤt pt tynsr aur pwshydha haalt ko nkaltay hayn۔aakhr main ، hum aaؤt pt tynsr aur pwshydha haalt prnt karty hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha GRU madalza ko fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay nafza kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tynsrf flw main sykhnay ki shrha kay nzaam alawkat ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsrf flw main sykhnay ki shrha kay nzaam alawkat ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum Tf.keras.calbacks.callbacks.learningratescheduler () fnkshn astamal krsktay hain jo tynswr flw kay zaryaha fraham krdha fnkshn haay۔sykhnay ki shrha kay nzaam alawkat ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: TF# kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt tynsrflw sykhnay ki shrha kay shydawl fnkshn dayf LR_SCHEDULE (EPOCH ، LR) ki wzuahat kryn: agar EPOCH <10: waps LR * TF.MATH.EXP (wapsy LR * TF.MATH.EXP (----0.1)# madal madal = tf.keras.section ([tf.keras.layers.dense (64 ، ayktywyshn = 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (784 ،)) ، tf.keras.layers.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn ='saft myks')]]# sykhnay ki shrha kay shydawlrptymaizar = tf.keras.optimizers.sgd (lrnngh_ryt = 0.01) lr_scheduler = tf.keras.callbacks.legratesceduler (lr_schedule) kal bykza = [Lr_schedule) kay sath aaptymaizar ki wzuahat kryn۔mrtb karain (aaptymaizar = aaptymaizar ، nksaan = 'zamrha dar_krasyntrwpy' ، mytrks = ['drstghy'])# sykhnay ki shrha kay shydawlrmwdayl.ft (x_train ، y_train ، aypwch = 100 ، kal byks) kay sath madal ko trbyt dyn ، hum is ki wzuahat karty hayn۔sykhnay ki shrha ka shydawl fnkshn jo ahad nmbr aur mwjwdha sykhnay ki shrha ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay aur sykhnay ki niy shrha ko waps krta haay۔as kay bad hum do mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham abtdaiy sykhnay ki shrha aur sykhnay ki shrha kay shydawlr kay sath TF.Keras.calbacks.learningratescheduler () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham ays jy day aaptymaizar ، zamrha dar krastrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy mytrk kay sath madal mrtb karty hayn۔ham ft () kay tarykha kar aur sykhnay ki shrha kay nzaam alawkat ka astamal karty hoey 100 ahadwn kay liye madal ki trbyt karty hayn۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha madalza ko fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔

Question: paitwrch main pehlay sy trbyt yaftha lfza aymbydangh madal ko lwda karnay aur is sy pehlay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paitwrch main pehlay sy trbyt yaftha lfza aymbydangh madal ko lwda aur pehlay sy tyar karnay kay l we ، hum paitrch kay zaryaha fraham krdha mshal daat ayn ayn daat aym bydangh () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔phalay sy trbyt yaftha lfza aymbydangh madal ko lwda karnay aur pehlay sy tyar karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay۔DIM = 100)# alfaza ki wzuahat karain aur wrda tw andayks mypngh wwkab = wrda_mbydangh۔ stoiword_to_idx = {lfza: IDX kay liye IDX ، lfza (Vocab) main lfza}# un pt jmlha ki wzuahat karain = "tyza bhwry rngh kay lwmray ko lsy ktay kay upar chhlangh lghaty haay۔"# un pt jmlha ko andayssaindas ki fharst main tbdyl karain = [wrda_tw_dayks [wrda] jmlay main lfza kay liay۔ asplt ()]# pehlay sy trbyt yaftha wyt sysdangh_laiyr = nn.embedding.from_pretreaded (mshal۔lwatynsr (wrda_mbydangh) kay sath srayt karnay wali prt ki wzuahat kryn۔wyktr))# un pt jmlha jmlha_syntyns = aymbydangh_lyir (mshal۔lnghtynsr (andayks))# aymbydada jmlay kay prnt (aymbydada_syntyns) prnt karain ، is kwda main ، hum wwkab.ghlw () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ayk pehlay sy trbyt yaftha lfza aymbydangh madal lwda karty hayn۔ham lfza aymbydangh madal kay astwiy wsaf ka astamal karty hoey alfaza aur lfza sy andayks mypngh ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham ayk un pt jmlha ki wzuahat karty hain aur lfza sy andayks mypngh ka astamal karty hoey andayks ki fharst main tbdyl karty hayn۔ham NN.embedding.from_pretrained () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey pehlay sy trbyt yaftha wzan kay sath ayk aymbydangh prt ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham aymbydangh prt ka astamal karty hoey un pt jmlay ko srayt karty hain aur aymbydada jmlay ko prnt karty hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha madalza ko fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay nafza kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tynsr flw ka astamal karty hoey trbyt kay doran twsayk kay nksaan ki bnyad par abtdaiy astapngh ko nafza karnay kay liye kwda ka tkraa lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsr flw ka astamal karty hoey trbyt kay doran twsayk kay nksaan ki bnyad par abtdaiy astapngh ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tf.keras.calbacks.callbacks.earlystoping () tynswr flw kay zaryaha fraham krdha fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔abtdaiy astapngh ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: Pythonimport tynsrflw AS TF# madal madal = tf.keras.sectiven ki wzuahat karain ([tf.keras.layers.dense (64 ، ayktywyshn = 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (784 ،))).= tf.keras.calbacks.callbacks.arellystoping (manytr = 'wyl_lws' ، sabr = 3) kal byks = [abtdaiy_stapngh]# madal ko abtdaiy astapngh mwdal.ft kay sath trbyt dyn۔kal byks = kal byks) is kwda main ، hum do mkml tawr par mnslk prtwn kay sath ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham madal ko aydam aaptymaizar ، zamrha dar krasyntrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy mytrk kay sath mrtb karty hayn۔ham abtdaiy tawr par Tf.keras.callbacks.earlystoping () fnkshn kay sath rknay ki wzuahat karty hain ، jo twsayk kay nksaan ki nghrany krta hay aur agar kesi khasa tadad main ahadwn (sabr) main bhatry nahin aata hay tou trbyt band krdyty haay۔ham ft () kay tarykha kar aur abtdaiy astapngh kal byk ka astamal karty hoey 100 ahadwn kay liye madal ki trbyt karty hayn۔twsayk kay nksaan ki nghrany kay liye hum twsayk kay aadad wa shmar ko ft () kay tarykha kar main bhi mntkl karty hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur zayada pychydha madalza ko fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔

Question: paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey symntk syghmnttyshn kay liye ywnyn (MIOU) mytrk kay awsta chwrahaay ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey symntk syghmnttyshn kay liye ywnyn (MIOU) mytrk kay wstay chwrahaay ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، hum tarch mytrks pykyj 1 kay zaryaha fraham krdha tarch mytrks۔ IOU () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔myiw mytrk ka hasab lghanay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kay kwda ka tkraa haay: paiythwnympwrt tarch tarch tarch daat ayn ayn ayn۔ fynkshnl kay tawr par fympwrt tarch mytks# madal klas madal (mshal daat ayn ayn aym aw daywl) ki wzuahat kryn: dayf __INIT __ (khwd): spr (madal ، khwd)) sell.conv1 = mshal. nn.conv2d (3 ، 64 ، dana_saiza = 3 ، straida = 1 ، pydangh = 1) sylf۔ kwkwnw 2 = mshal. ayn ayn ayn wy 2 day (64 ، 64 ، dyhay_saiza = 3 ، straida = 1 ، pydangh= 1) sell.conv3 = mshal. nn.conv2d (64 ، 2 ، dana_saiza = 3 ، straida = 1 ، pydangh = 1) dayf farwrda (khwd ، x): x = f.relu (self.conv1 (x))x = f.relu (self.conv2 (x)) x = self.conv3 (x) wapsy x# un pt tynsr ki wzuahat karain aur tynswr un pt_tynswr = mshal. ryndan (1 ، 3 ، 32 ، 32) targht_tynsr = mshal (0.iou metriciou_metric.update (aaؤt pt_tynsr.argh myks (DIM = 1) ، targht_tynsr) miou = iou_metric.compute ()# is kwda main myؤ mytrk prnt (MIOU) prnt karain ، hum ayk sadha sywnwlwil nywrl nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hain js main manwy tabkay kay liye tyn kaflay ki prtyn hayn۔ham saiza 1x3x32x32 kay un pt tynsr aur saiza 1x32x32 kay ayk hadf tynsr ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham mshal mtrks daat () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey madal aur IOU mytrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham madal kay zaryaha un pt tynsr ka ayk farwrda pas anjam dytay hain aur IOU mytrk kay ap dayt () aur kmpywt () tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey IOU mytrk ka hasab lghatay hayn۔aakhr main ، hum MIOU mytrk prnt karty hayn۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay zayada pychydha madalza ka andazaha kya jaskta hay ۔1 astyk awwr flw

Question: tynsr flw main RMSPROP aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔

Answer: tynsr flw main aydam dablyw aaptaizar ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tf.keras.optimizers.adamw () fnkshn astamal krsktay hain jo tynsr flw 1 kay zaryaha fraham krdha fnkshn haay۔aydam dablyw aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay: pythwnympwrt tynsrflw kay tawr par TF# madal madal = tf.keras.sectiven ki wzuahat karain ([tf.keras.layers.dense (64 ، ayktywyshn = 'rylw' ، un pt_shp = (784 ،)) ، tf.keras.layers.dense (10 ، ayktywyshn = 'saft myks'))]))# aydam dablyw aaptymaizar awptymaizar = tf.keras.optimizers.adamw (lrnngh_ryt = 0.001 ، wyt_daykay = 0.004)# madal madal daat kam ko mrtb karain (aaptymaizar (aaptymaizar= aaptymaizar ، nksaan = 'zamrha dar_krasyntrwpy' ، mytrks = ['drstghy'])# is kwda main aydam dablyw aaptymrmwdal daat ayf aai ty (x_train ، y_train ، Epochs = 100) kay sath madal ko trbyt dyn ، hum do mkml tawr par mnslk ayk sadha aasaaby nyt wrk ki wzuahat karty hayn۔prtynham abtdaiy sykhnay ki shrha aur wzan main kami kay sath TF.Keras.optimizers.adamw () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ADAMW aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham madal ko aydam dablyw aaptaizar ، zamrha dar krastrwpy nksaan ki tkryb ، aur drstghy mytrk kay sath mrtb karty hayn۔ham FIT () tarykha kar aur ADAMW aaptymaizar ka astamal karty hoey 100 ahadwn kay liye madal ki trbyt karty hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay zayada pychydha madalza ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ aaptymaizarza ki dusri ksmwn main astakstk mylan nzawl ، adaghrada ، aur aar aym ays py aar aw py 234 shaml hayn۔an asatalahaat ko kesi aysay fnkshn ki wzuahat krkay nafza kya jaskta hay jo madal pyramytrza aur tdryjywn ko dlail kay tawr par lytay hain aur mylan ka astamal karty hoey pyramytrza ko ap dayt karty hayn۔as kay bad is Answer: mtghyr aatw ankwdarza (VAEs) ayk ksm ki jnrytw madal hain jo un pt dayta ki bnyady amkany tksym ki madalngh krkay nya dayta tyar karna sykh saktay hayn۔as hasaay main ، hum paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey jnrytw madalngh kay liye mtghyr aatw aynkwdar (VAE) ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk kwda ka tkraa fraham karain ghay۔ VAE ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk msaal kwda ka tkraa haay: pythonimport Turchimport mshal..aaptym kay tawr par APTFROM mshal ki draamd daytasyts ، tbdyly# VAE madal klas VAE (nn.module) ki wzuahat kryn: DEF __INIT __ (khwd): spr (VAE ، khwd).fc21 = nn.linear (400 ، 20) self.fc22 = nn.linear (400 ، 20) sellkhwd ، x): h1 = f.relu (self.fc1 (x)) wapsy sylf۔ ayf sy 21 (h1) ، sylf. ayf sy 22 (h1) dayf rypyramytraiza (sylf ، aym yw ، laghwr): std = mshal. exp (0.5*lwghwr) ay py ays = tarch۔ ryndan_ laik (ays ty day) rytrn mw + ay py ays*ays ty day dayf daykwda (khwd ، zayda): h3 = f.relu (self.fc3 (z)) rytrn tarch.sghmaida (sylf. ayf sy 4 (h3)) dayffarwrda (khwd ، x): Mu ، logvar = self.encode (x.View (-1 ، 784)) z = self.repameterize (Mu ، laghwar) waps lwtaiyn۔ daykwda (z) ، Mu ، Logvar# nksaan ki wzuahat krynfnkshn dayf nksaan_fkshn (recon_x ، x ، Mu ، laghwar): bce = f.binary_cross_entropy (recon_x ، x.view (-1 ، 784) ، kami = 'swm') kld = -0.5 * mshal. Sum (1 + laghwr -Mu.pow (2) - logvar.exp ()) wapsy bce + kld# hyperparametersbatch_size = 128 lrnngh_ryt = 1e -3num_epochs = 10device = mshal.mnist datasettrain_loader = turns.utils.data.dataloader (datasets.mnist ('../ dayta' '، tryn = sch ، daaؤn lwda = sch ، transfarm = transfarmza۔ twtynsr ()) ، bych_saiza = shfl = sch)# lwda krynVAE madal aur Optimizermodel = Vae (). to (aalha) aaptymaizar = aaptym.adaym (madal.pyramytrza () ، lr = lrnngh_ryt) ki wzuahat kryn# Vae Modeflor Epoch rynj (num_epochs) main trbyt kryn: bych_dayks kay liye ، (dayta ، _) anwmryt (tryn_lwdar) myn: dayta = dayta wzan main kami ko bhatr bnaiyn agar wzan_daykay> 0.0: aaptymaizar = tf.keras.optimizers.adamweightdecay (lrnngh_ryt = lr_schedule ، wyt_dayt_t_day kway ، wyt_dayt_day kway ، wyt_dayt_day kway ، wyt_dayt_day kway ، wyt_dayt_day kwbyta_2 = 0.999 ، aypsylwn = 1 ay -8) wapsy aaptymaizaryn is fnkshn ko ، hum pehlay kwsain anylngh lrnngh ryt kay shydawl ki wzuahat karty hain jo tynsr flw kay zaryaha fraham krdha kwsydayn kyirstarts () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔ham ays jy day () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey bys aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karty hain js main tynswr flw kay zaryaha kwsain anylngh lrnngh ryt kay shydawl ، rftar aur nystrwf ki rftar kay sath fraham kya gaya haay۔ham bys aaptymaizar ، alfa ، aur kay kay sath tynsr flw aydawnza kay zaryaha fraham krdha lwkahayda () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey lwk hayda aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham tynsr flw kay zaryaha fraham krdha aydam wyt daykay () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey aaptymaizar main wzan main kami ka azuafha karty hain agar wzan ka khatmha 0.0 sy zayada haay۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay mazeed pychydha madalza ko nafza kya jaskta haay۔ asalahaat ki dusri ksmwn main aydam ، adaghrada ، aur aar aym ays py aar aw py 12 shaml hayn۔an asatalahaat ko ayk mkhtlf aaptymaizar fnkshn aur haaiprprmytrza ki wzuahat krkay nafza kya jaskta haay۔TF/KERAS/Optisizers/Scirdeles/cosinedecayrestarts5https: //www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/ceras/optimizers/optimizer1htps: //www.tensorflow.org/api_ptps ty py ays://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/optimizers/adagradhtps://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/pytensorflow3tensorflow3tensorflow3tensorflow3tensorflow3tensoptensorflow2tensrflow2tensorflow2tensorflow2tensorflow2tensorflow2tensorflow3

Question: paitwrch main ghhary lrnngh madal ka astamal karty hoey tsawyry rngh bndy karnay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: pytwrch main ghhary lrnngh madal ka astamal karty hoey amyj klraizayshn ko anjam denay kay l several ، bohat sary wsail dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: CNN-image-colorization-pytorch1: ghray askyl amyjza ko rnghyn karnay kay liye yeh ayk mjazay ghhary asaby nyt wrk ka ayk paitwrch aml haay۔as main trbyt ، tkhmynha ، aur rnghyn drjha harart par kabw panay kay liye ayk nmwnha daytasyt aur kwda shaml haay۔ U-NET aur mshrwta GAN kay sath blyk aynda wait amyjza ko rnghyn krna-ayk tywtwryl 2: yeh U-nets ka astamal karty hoey ghhary sykhnay kay sath syaha aur sfyd tsaawyr ko rnghnay ka ayk sbk haay۔awr mshrwta ghan۔tywtwryl ayk aaly drjay ki paiytwrch nfaza aur kwda kay sath ayk jwpytr nwt bk fraham krta haay۔ aaiymj rnghyn rnghynytwil nywrl nyt wrks kay sath - lywk mylas -kyryazay 3: yeh mshyn lrnngh madal bnanay ka ayk tywtwryl hay jo khud bkhwd ghray askyl amyjza ko rnghyn amyjwn main paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey tbdyl karnay kay liye haay۔tywtwryl main kwda kay sath ayk jptr nwt bk shaml hay aur astamal shuda twlza aur tknyk ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔ tsawyry rnghynyan dayp karain |pytrk ywsf 4: yeh ayk aysa prwjykt hay jo ghhary kwalaraizayshn main tfsayl sy byan krdha madal ko nafza krta haay: CNNs aur Insciption-resnet-V2 ka astamal karty hoey tsawyry rngh bndy۔prwjykt tsaawyr ko rnghyn karnay kay liye ayk paitwrch par aml draamd aur ayk daymw wyb sait fraham krta haay۔ Introtoaipython5: yeh ayk ght hab zakhyrha hay jo tsawyry drjha bndy kay liye paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey mshk fraham krta haay۔as zakhyray main tsaawyr ko lwda karnay aur pry prwsysngh ، madal ki tamyr aur trbyt denay aur pysh ghwiyan karnay ka kwda shaml haay۔ yeh wsail paitwrch main ghhary sykhnay kay madalza ka astamal karty hoey tsawyry rngh kay liye mkhtlf nktaha nzar fraham karty hayn۔prwjykt ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur rkawtwn par mnhasar hay ، un wsail main sy ayk ko nktaha aaghaza kay tawr par astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tynswr flw main aydaabylyf aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye kwda ka tkraa lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsr flw main adaabylyf aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk kwda asnypt haay: pythwnympwrt tynsr flw kay tawr par tfmpwrt tynswrflw_adadanza kay tawr par ty ayf aay# haaiprprmytrsrnngh_ryt = 0.001beta_1 = 0.9beta_2 = 0.99epsilon = 0.99EPSILON = 0.999Epsilon = 0.999EPSILON = 0.99EPSILEN = 0.99Epsilon = 0.99epsilon = 0.9bettay_1 = 0. _ astps = 0warmup_proportion = 0.1min_lr= 0.0name = 'adaabylyf'# aaptymaizarptymaizar = tfa.optimizers.adabelief (lrnngh_ryt = lrnngh_ryt ، byta_1 ، byta_1 = byta_2 = aapyl_2 ، aypsylwn ، wyt_daykay = wyt daykay ، asalahay ، ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay ays aym aay۔warmp_prwpwrtyshn = warmp_prwpwrtyshn ، MIN_LR = MIN_LR ، nam = nam) is kwda main ، hum sab sy pehlay sykhnay ki shrha ، byta_1 ، byta_2 ، aypsyln ، wzan kshy ، asalaha ، SMA_Threshold ، twtl_stps ، WARMUP_PROPRITION ، MIN_LR ، aur nam smyt haaiprprmytrza ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham haaiprprmytrza kay sath tynsrf flw aydawnza kay zaryaha fraham krdha aydaabylyf () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔yha sirf ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay zayada pychydha madalza ko nafza kya jaskta haay۔ asalahaat ki dusri aksam main adaghrada ، adaadylta ، aur aydaabaؤnda 123 shaml hayn۔an asatalahaat ko ayk mkhtlf aaptymaizar fnkshn aur haaiprprmytrza ki wzuahat krkay nafza kya jaskta haay۔tf/keras/optisizers/tjrbaty/adagrad2https: //www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/compat/v1/train/adadeltaoptimisizer5https: //www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/apidocs/api_docs/api_docs/api_docs/api_docs/api_docs/api_docs/api_docs/api_docs/api_docs/apidocdAdadelta3https: //github.com/tramac/adabound-tensorflow1tensorflow2tensorflow3github4tensorflow5tensorflow

Question: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey amyj tw amyj translyshn kay liye dawilghn ko nafza karnay kay liye kwda kay asnypt ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey amyj tw amyj translyshn kay liye dawilghn ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum ght hab rypwzatry 1 kay zaryaha fraham krdha aml ko astamal krsktay hayn۔paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey amyj tw amyj translyshn kay liye dawilghn ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal kwda asnypt haay: paiytwnympwrt twrchyn pwrt tarch daat ayn ayn aym pwrt tarch kay tawr pr۔hyperparametersbatch_size = 64epochs = 100lr = 0.0002beta1 = 0.5beta2 = 0.999lambda_cycle = 10lambda_identity = 5# devisedevice = mshal ki wzuahat kryn۔() .to (daywais)# aaptymaizar aur nksaan ki wzuahat kryntransforms.compose ([transforms.resize (256) ، transforms.randomcrop (256) ، transforms.randomhorizontalflip () ، transforms.totensor () ، transforms.normalize ((0.5 ، 0.5 ، 0.5) ، (0.5 ، 0.5 ، 0.5))]) tryn_daytasyt = daytasyts۔ aaiymyj fwldar ('dayta' ، transfarm = transfarm) tryn_lwdar = daytalwdar (tryn_daytasyt ، bych_saiza = bych_saiza ، shfl = sch ، nmbr_ wrkrza = 4)# dawylghn mwdafwr aypwch ko rynj (aypsch) main tryn karain (aypwchza) kay liye ، aai ، kay liye ، aai ، kay liye ،(real_a ، real_b) enumerate (tryn_lwdar) myn: real_a = real_a.to (aalha) asaly_b = ryil_b.tw (daywais) # jnrytr aaptaizar ko trbyt dyn۔ryil_ by) saiykl_a = madal۔ jynrytr_btwa (jaly_by) saiykl_b = madal۔ jynrytr_twb (jaly_a) shnakht_a = madal۔ jynrytr_btwa (asaly_a) shnakht_by = madal۔ madal۔lymbdaa_ saikl * (kswty (saiykl_a ، ryil_a) + kswty (saiykl_b ، ryil_b)) + lymbdaa_dayity * (mayar (shnakht_a ، ryil_ aay) + mayar (shnakht_by ، ryil_b)) nksaan_bykwrda () aaptymaizar۔ astp () # amtyazay slwk ko trbyt dyn۔mshal.mrhalha () # nksaan ko prnt karain agar i ٪ 100 == 0: prnt ('[٪ d/٪ d] [٪ d/٪ d] nksaan_gh: ٪ .4f nksaan_day: ٪ .4f' ٪ (aypwch+1 ، aypchza، i+1 ، lyn (tryn_lwdar) ، nksaan_gh.aywtym () ، nksaan_day.aywtym ())) is kwda main ، hum pehlay bych kay saiza ، aypwch ki tadad ، sykhnay ki shrha ، byta 1 ، byta 2 ، lymbdaa_saikl ، smyt haaiprprmytrza ki wzuahat karty hayn۔awr lymbdaa_dayity۔ham ght hab rypwzatry kay zaryaha fraham krdha dawilghn () klas ka astamal karty hoey dawilghn madal ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham baltrtyb paitwrch kay zaryaha fraham krdha aadm () fnkshn aur L1LOSS () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey aaptymaizar aur nksaan ki tkryb ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham paiytwrch kay zaryaha fraham krdha amyj fwldar () aur daytalwdar () klaswn ka astamal karty hoey dayta lwdar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ham tdryjy jrmanay kay sath dawilghn alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey dawilghn madal ko trbyt dytay hayn۔yha mhazu ayk sadha msaal hay ، aur fn tamyr aur haaiprprmytrza ko aydajst krkay zayada pychydha madalza ko nafza kya jaskta haay۔ tsawyr sy amyj sy amyj translyshn madal ki dusri aksam main saiyklghn ، pks 2 pks ، aur ywnt 123 shaml hayn۔an madalza ko ayk mkhtlf madal fnkshn aur haaiprprmytrza ki wzuahat krkay nafza kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "sabr ، sykhnay ki shrha main kami ، wzan main kami ، tdryjy trashnay ، aur tynswr flw main warm ap kay sath twsayk kay nksaan ، drstghy ، aur kstm mytrks ki bnyad par abtdaiy astapngh ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk kwda ka tkraa lkhyn۔"
Answer: sabr ، sykhnay ki shrha main kami ، wzan main kami ، tdryjy trashpngh ، aur tynswr flw main warm ap kay sath twsayk kay nksaan ، drstghy ، aur kstm mytrks ki bnyad par abtdaiy astapngh ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk kwda ka tkraa haay۔tynsrflw kay tawr par TF # abtdaiy astapngh kal byk bykar_astwp = tf.kersas.callbacks.earlystoping (manytr = 'wyl_lws' ، # manytr ki twsayk kay nksaan ka sabr = 5 ، # bhatry waly ahadwn ki tadad js kay bad trbyt band krdy jaye gi = 'mnt' ،# kam sy kam twsayk kay nksaan ko kam sy kam kryn، Y_VAL) ، EPOCHS = 100 ، bych_saiza = 32 ، kal byks = [abtdaiy_ astap]) is msaal main ، TF.KERAS.CALLBACKS.CALLBACK.Arellystoping kal byk ko twsayk kay nksaan ki nghrany kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur agar 5 dwrwn main koi bhatry nahin hay tou trbyt ko rwknay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔twsayk kay nksaan ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye mwda pyramytr 'mnt' par syt haay۔jb abtdaiy tawr par rknay ki wjha sy trbyt rk jati hay tou kesi pygham ko prnt karnay kay liye wrbwza pyramytr 1 par syt kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، bhaaly_byst_ waits pyramytr ko bhatryn twsayk kay nksaan kay sath ahad sy wzan ko bhaal karnay kay liye drst karnay kay liye drst haay۔ dusray pyramytrza jo tf.keras.calbacks.callackback.callbacks kay sath astamal hawsktay hayn۔nghrany shuda mytrk main bhatry kay tawr par kwalyfaiy karnay kay liay) ، bys lain (manytrda mytrk ki abtdaiy kymt) ، aur mwda (chahaay nghrany shuda mytrk ko kam sy kam ya zayada sy zayada karna chahaay)۔ dyghr kal byks jo tynsrf flw main jld rknay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hain un main kstm kal byks shaml hain aur un main astamal kya jaskta haay۔kstm trynngh lwp 2345.1 tynsr flw 2 tynswr flw 3 aymchyn lylrnngh mastrty 4towardsDatacience5gcptutorials main kstm abtdaiy rwknay ka kaadha lkhna

Question: paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey mlty lybl ki drjha bndy kay sath aabjykt ka ptha lghanay kay liye mkhtlf IOU had par awsta awsta sahat sy mtalk ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey mlty lybl ki drjha bndy kay sath aabjykt ka ptha lghanay kay liye mkhtlf IOU dhalyza par awsta awsta sahat sy mtalk (nkshha) ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: paiytwnympwrt mshal mshal sy mshal sazay ki ampwrt myyny ayryjpysyshn# ki wzuahat karain mytrk myp_mytrk = myny sywrj prysyza = INAVERAGEPRESSES = INAVERAGEPRESSES = INAVERAGEPRESSES = MANAVEVERAGEPRESSES =tyst syt wِt tarch.nw_ghrada () par madal ka andazaha kryn: tsaawyr kay liye ، tyst_lwdar main ahadaf: # farwrda pas aaؤt pt = madal (tsaawyr) # kmpywt myp_mytrk۔ ap dayt (aaؤt pt ، ahadaf) # mkhtlf IOU thryshwldaza nkshha jat = myp_mytrk daat kam par nkshha haasal kryn۔() is msaal main ، tarch mytrks pykyj sy mynanywrj prysyzayshn klas ka astamal nkshha ko mkhtlf IOU dhalyza par hasab karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔NUM_CLASSES pyramytr daytasyt main klaswn ki tadad par syt kya gaya hay ، aur IOU_thresholds pyramytr nkshha par andazaha karnay kay liye IOU thryshwldaza ki ayk fharst par syt kya gaya haay۔ ap dayt kay tarykha kar ko tyst syt main tsaawyr aur ahadaf kay hr bych kay liye talb kya gaya hay ، awrkmpywt kay tarykha kar ko aakhr main mkhtlf IOU thryshwldaza par nkshha haasal karnay kay liye blaya jata haay۔ dusray pyramytrza jo myny wyryj prysyzayshn kay sath astamal hawsktay hain un main BOX_FORMAT (pysh ghwiy shuda aur hadf waly khanwn ki shkl) ، IOU_TYPE (IOU ki ksm (IOU ki ksm) ، REC_THRESHOLDS (REC_THRESHOLDS (REC_THERSHOLD) shaml hayn۔yad rkhnay wali dhalyza astamal karnay kay liay) ، aur myks_daytykshn_thrshwldas (astamal karnay kay liye zayada sy zayada tadad)daiyn ، ymax-bottom daiyn) 1.1torchmetrics

Question: tynsr flw main aaitakar sykhnay ki shrha kay shydawl kay sath lwk hayda aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsr flw main aaitakar lrnngh ryt kay shydawl kay sath lwkahayda aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk fnkshn haay: paiythwnympwrt tynsr flw kay tawr par tfrwwm tynswrflw_adadanza ۔aaptymaizarza draamd lwkahayda dayf lrnngh astailda_ptymaizar (LR_SCHEDULE ، bys_ptymaizar ، K = 5 ، alfa = 0.5).kras.aptymaizarza۔ shydawls۔ ryktnghls shydawl (ayl aar_schydawl) # dayfain bys aaptymaizar aaptymaizar = bys_ptymaizar (lrnngh_aaryt = ayl aar_sydawl) # dayfain lyw hayda aaptymaizar lwk hayda (aaptymaizar ، kay ، kay ، alfa = alfa) rytrn is msaaltyn dlail: LR_SCHEDULE (sykhnay ki shrha ka nzaam alawkat) ، bys_ptymaizar (astamal karnay kay liye bys aaptymaizar) ، aur kay aur alfa (lwk hayda haaiprpymytrza)shrha ka shydawl۔bys aaptymaizar ka lrnngh_ryt pyramytr LR_SCHEDULE par syt kya gaya haay۔tynsr flw_adadanza ki nzar wali klas۔ aaptymaizarza madaywl ka astamal mkhsawsa haaiprprmytrza kay sath lwk hayda aaptaizar ki wzuahat kay liye kya jata haay۔ lwk ayda_ptymaizar fnkshn lwk hayda aaptymaizar ko lwtata hay ، jo tynswr flw main ayk madal ko trbyt denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔Sync_period (sst wzan aur tyza wzan kay hum aahanghy kay mabyn akdamat ki tadad) ، Slow_step_size (sst wzan kay liye kdm saiza) ، aur nam (aaptymaizar ka nam) shaml kryn۔ nwt karain keh lwk hayda aaptymaizar dusray asalaha karwn ki twsya haay۔، jesay ays jy day ، aydam ، aur aar aym ays prp ، aur kesi bhi aaptymaizar kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay jo tf.keras.optimizers.optimizer class1.1tensorflow sy wrasat main haay۔

Question: paitwrch main ghhary sykhnay kay madal ka astamal karty hoey tykst jnryshn ko anjam denay kay liye kwda ka tkraa nafza kryn۔
Answer: pytwrch main dayp lrnngh madal ka astamal karty hoey tykst jnryshn ko anjam denay kay l we ، hum trtyb sy trtyb fn tamyr kay sath bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (RNN) astamal krsktay hayn۔paitwrch main aar ayn ayn ka astamal karty hoey tykst jnryshn ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: paiythwnympwrt twrchyn pwrt tarch daat ayn ayn kay tawr par ayn ayn# dayfyn aar ayn ayn madal klas aar ayn (ayn ayn aym aw daywl): dayf __init __ (khwd ، un pt_saiza ، pwshydha_saiza ، aaؤt pt_saiza): spr (aar ayn ayn ، sylf ، khwd)) .__ init __ () self.hided_size = pwshydha_saiza sylf۔ i2h = nn.linear (an pt_saiza + pwshydha_saiza ، pwshydha_saiza) sylf۔ i2o = nn.linear (an pt_saiza + head_size ، aaؤt pt_saiza) syl۔dayf farwrda (sylf ، un pt ، pwshydha): mshtrkha = mshal daat ((an pt ، pwshydha) ، 1) pwshydha = khwd۔ ii2h (mshtrkha) aaؤt pt = sylf۔ aai 2 aw (mshtrkha) aaؤt pt = sylf۔ swft myks (aaؤt pt) rytrn aaؤt pt.init_hidden () # astart kryktr ko tynsr un pt = tarch.tynsr main tbdyl kryn۔an pt ، pwshydha) # nmwnha aghla kryktr tap wy ، twpaiy = aaؤt pt.twpk (1) char_ aai day ayks = tap aaiy۔ aaitm () # kryktr andayks ko kryktr main tbdyl krynaghlay tkrar un pt kay liye tynsr = mshal۔ tynsr ([[char_ aai day ayks]] ، day taip = mshal۔lngh) is ki msaal kay tawr par ، aar ayn ayn klas un pt saiza ، pwshydha saiza aur aaؤt pt saiza kay sath aar ayn ayn madal ki wzuahat krty haay۔farwrda tarykha ayk un pt tynsr aur ayk pwshydha ryast tynsr lyta hay ، un ko jwrata hay ، aur un ko lkyry prtwn aur ayk saft myks ayktywyshn fnkshn kay zaryaay aaؤt pt tynsr aur ayk nya pwshydha ryast tynsr pyda karnay kay liye mntkl krta haay۔init_hidid tarykha tamam zayrw ko pwshydha ryast kay tynsr ki abtda krta haay۔ jnryt_tykst fnkshn ayk trbyt yaftha aar ayn ayn madal ، ayk astart kryktr ، ayk lmbaiy ، asharywn (char_tw_aaiday) main ayk lght ki nkshha sazay kay harwf ، aur krdarwn (IDX_TO_CHAR) kay liye ayk lght ki nkshha sazay kay asharay lyta haay۔yha pwshydha ryast ka aaghaza krta hay ، astart krdar ko tynsr main tbdyl krta hay ، aur aar ayn ayn madal kay zaryaha un pt tynsr aur pwshydha astyt tynsr ko bar bar pas krkay mtn tyar krta hay ، aghlay krdar ko aaؤt pt tynsr sy nmwnay dyta hay ، aur mtn main krdar ko shaml krta haay۔fnkshn tyar krdha mtn ko lwtata haay۔ dyghr aar ayn ayn fn tamyrat jn ko mtn ki nsl kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay un main ayl ays ty aym aur GRU1.1.pytorch shaml hain

Question: tynsr flw main wzan kay khatmay kay sath aydaabaؤnda aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye kwda ka tkraa lkhyn۔
Answer: tynsr flw main wzan kay khatmay kay sath aydaabaؤnda aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tynswr flw aydawnza laibryry 1 sy TFA.Optimizers.extend_with_decoupled_weight_decay fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔tynsr flw main wzan kay khatmay kay sath aydaabaؤnda aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye yahan ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: paiytwnympwrt tynsr flw kay tawr par tfm pwrt tynswrflw_adadanza kay tawr par ty ayf aay # aydaabaؤnda aaptymaizar ki wzuahat wzan dayk daydaf aydaabaؤnda_ptymaizar (ayl aar_schydaaizar ، wyttymaizar) # dayfain bys awptymaizar). yeh msaal، aydaabaؤnda_aaptymaizar fnkshn do dlail lyta haay: LR_SCHEDULE (sykhnay ki shrha ka shydawl) aur wyt_daykay (wzan main kami ki shrha)tfa.optimizers.extend_with_decoupled_weight_decay fnkshn ko wzan kay khatmay kay sath bys aaptymaizar ko brahanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tfa.optimizers.adabound klas ko mkhsawsa sykhnay ki shrha kay shydawl aur hatmy sykhnay ki shrha kay sath aydaabaؤnda aaptymaizar ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ aydaabaؤnda_wptymaizar fnkshn aydaabaؤnda aaptymaizar ko wzan main kami kay sath lwtata hay ، jo tynswr flw main ayk madal ki trbyt kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔aydaabaؤnda aaptymaizar kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay byta 1 (phalay lmhaay kay tkhmynay kay liye kfayt shaary kshy ki shrha) ، byta 2 (dwsray lmhaay kay tkhmynay kay liye kfayt shaary kshy ki shrha) ، aypsyln (addy asthakam kay liye ayk chhwta mstkl) ، amsghryda (chahaay woh astamal kryn۔aaptaizar ka AMSGRAD mkhtlf shkl) ، aur nam (aaptymaizar ka nam)

tynsr aur mnfy lagh un amkanat ko haasal karnay kay l the tsaawyr aur lybl madal kay zaryaay mnzawr kyay jatay hain ، js ka mwazanha mnfy lagh un amkanat kay nksaan ki tkryb ka astamal karty hoey hadf kami kal byks ko hr door kay bad blaya jata haay۔aghr abtdaiy rknay ko mthark kya jata hay tou ، trbyt band krdy jati haay۔

Question: paiytwrch ka astamal karty hoey symntk syghmnttyshn kay sath aabjykt ki khwj kay l different mkhtlf IOU had par awsta awsta sahat sy mtalk ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey symntk syghmnttyshn kay sath aabjykt ki khwj kay l dease mkhtlf IOU had par awsta awsta sahat sy mtalk (MAP) ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، hum mshal mtrks laibryry 1 sy tarch mytks.daytykshn.daytykshn.ymyn_p۔paitwrch ka astamal karty hoey symntk syghmnttyshn kay sath aabjykt ki khwj kay liye mkhtlf IOU dhalyza par nkshha ka hasab lghanay kay liye yahan ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: paiythwnym pwrt twrchympwrt tarch mytks# dayfain madal madal = tkhlyk_mwdal ()# dayfain daytasyt daytasyt = tkhlyk_daytasyt ()# dayfain dayta lwdardayta_lwdar = dayfain dayta lwdardayta۔mytrkyw_thryshwldaza = [0.5 ، 0.75] mtalb_ap = tarch mytrks.daytykshn.daytykshn۔ myna aywryj prysyzen (iou_thresholds = iou_thresholds)# Mapwith.no_grad (): tsaawyr kay liye ، aadad wa shmar kay liye ، aadad wa shmar kay liye ، aadad wa shmar kay liye ، amyjza = tsaawyr (aalha) (aalha) hadf = ahadaf = ahadaf = ahadaf = ahadaf = ahadaf = ahadaf۔) aaؤt pts = madal (tsaawyr) mtalb_apdayt (aaؤt pt ، ahadaf) nkshha = mtalb_ap.kyt () prnt (f'map: {nkshha: .4f} ') is msaal main ، tkhlyk_mwdal fnkshn madal fn tamyr ki wzuahat krta haay۔tkhlyk_daytasyt fnkshn daytasyt ki wzuahat krta haay۔tkhlyk_dayta_lwdar fnkshn dayta lwdar ki wzuahat krta haay۔ myny wyryj prysyzayshn klas myp mytrk ko mkhsawsa IOU had kay sath byan krty haay۔ap dayt ka tarykha kar mytrk ko madal aaؤt pt aur ahadaf kay sath ap dayt krta haay۔kmpywt ka tarykha nkshha ki ghnty krta haay۔ madal dayta lwdar ka astamal karty hoey daytasyt main tsaawyr kay aaؤt pt ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔nkshha ki pysh ghwiy shuda ntaij aur ahadaf ka astamal karty hoey hasab kya jata haay۔nkshha prnt kya gaya hay

Question: tynsr flw main awstaa stoch astwkstk wzan kay sath lwk hayda aaptaizar ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: tynswr flw main awstaa st astakstk wzan kay sath lwk hayda aaptymaizar ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum tynswr flw aydawnza laibryry 12 sy TFA.Optimizers.lockahead klas aur TFA.Optimizers.swa klas astamal krsktay hayn۔tynsr flw main awstaa st astakstk wzan kay sath lwk hayda aaptymaizar ko amly jamha phananay kay liye ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: pythwnympwrt tynsr flw kay tawr par tfympwrt tynswrflw_adadanza kay tawr par ty ayf aay # dayfain lyw hayda aaptymaizar kay sath swydayf lwkyida_ptymaizar ، ays dablyw aay aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay aay ays aay ays aay ays aay ays aay aay ays aay aay ays aay ayf ay aay ays aw aay ayf ay aay ayf ay aay ayf ay aay day ays aw aay aay day۔aaptymaizar aaptymaizar = tfa.optimizers.lookahead (base_optimizer ، k = 5 ، alfa = 0.5) # SWA aaptymaizar SWA = tfa.optimizers.swa ki wzuahat krynaghr swa_lr koi nahin haay: swa_lr = base_optimizer.learning_rate lr_schedule = tf.keras.optimizers.schedules.exponentialidecay (swa_lr ، decay_steps = 10000 ، deay_rate = 0.1 ، syrahy ki asalaha)lrnngh_ryt = LR_SCHEDULE ، rftar = 0.9) # rytrn fainl aaptymaizar rytrn fainl_wptymaizaryn is msaal kay tawr par ، lookahead_optimizer_swa fnkshn ayk dlyl kay tawr par ayk bys aaptymaizar lyta hay ، mkhsawsa haaiprprmytrza kay sath lwk hayda aaptymaizar ki wzuahat krta hay ، mkhsawsa haaiprprmytrza kay sath ays dablyw aay aaptymaizar ki wzuahat krta hay ، is ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔SWA kay liye shydawl ، aur SWA lrnngh ryt kay shydawl aur rftar kay sath ays jy day ki haysayt sy hatmy aaptymaizar ki wzuahat krta haay۔ lookahead_optimizer_swa fnkshn hatmy aaptymaizar ko lwtata hay ، jsay tynswr flw main ayk madal ki trbyt kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔SWA aaptymaizar main Sync_period (sst wzan aur tyza wzan kay hum aahanghy kay darmiyan akdamat ki tadad) ، sst_stp_ saiza (sst wzan kay liye mrhalha saiza) ، nam (aaptymaizar ka nam) ، astart_awryjngh (astwkstk wzan ka awsta shrwa karnay ka dwr) shaml haay۔، awsta_pyda (awsta wzan main tazaha karywn kay mabyn ahadwn ki tadad) ، aur awsta_ daky (awsta wzan kay liye kshy ki shrha)۔ nwt karain keh tfa.optimizers.lookeaead klas ko dusray asalaha karwn kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay SGD aur RMSProp main ، INADAM1.1Tensorflow2tensorflow kay alawha

Question: paitwrch main ghhary lrnngh madal ka astamal karty hoey tsawyry daynwzangh ko anjam denay kay liye kwda kay tkraay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: paitwrch main ghhary sykhnay kay madal ka astamal karty hoey amyj daynwzangh ko anjam denay kay l we ، hum mkhtlf fn tamyrat jesay DNCNN ، U-NET ، aur transfarmr ankwdar aur knfywil daykwdar nyt wrk 12 astamal krsktay hayn۔paitwrch main ghhary sykhnay kay madal ka astamal karty hoey amyj daynwaizangh karnay kay liye yahan ayk kwda ka tkraa haay: paiytwnympwrt tarchympwrt tarch. nnimport mshal kay tawr pr۔mshal daat daywais ('cuda' if Turk.cuda.is_available () aur 'CPU')# Datasettransform = transforms.compose ([transforms.totensor ()]] tryn_daytasyt = amyj fwldar (jra = './dayta/tryn' ،transfarm = transfarm) wyl_daytasyt = amyj fwldar (jra = './dayta/wyl' ، transfarm = transfarm)# dayta lwdar tryn_lwdar = dayta laؤdar (tryn_daytasyt ، bych_saiza = 64 ، shffl = sch) wal_lwdar = daytalwdar (BAL_DATASET ، BATCH_SISE= ghlta)# madal haaiprprmytrzanm_chynlza = 3num_filters = 64num_layers = 20batch_size = 64num_epochs = 10 lrnngh_ryt = 1e-4# dayfain madal klaskyn (nnn.module): Def __ __Init __ )__init __conv_layers = nn.sectivent (*[nn.conv2d (num_filters ، num_filters ، kernel_size = 3 ، straida = 1 ، pydangh = 1 ، tasab = ghlta) _ kay liye _ kay liye (num_layers - 2)]) syl .kwnw_last = nn.conv2d.(aaؤt) aaؤt = self.conv_last (aaؤt) rytrn aaؤt madal = dncnn (num_channels ، num_filters ، num_layers) .to (daywais)# ki wzuahat nksaan fnkshn krytrywn = nn.mseloss ()# define OptionizereOptimizer = optm.adam (madal. pyramytrza ()).aaؤt pt = madal (dayta) nksaan = kswty (aaؤt pt ، hadf) nksaan۔ bykwrda () aaptymaizar۔ astp () agar bych_dayks ٪ 100 == 0: prnt (f'epoch {Epoch + 1} ، bych {bych_dayks}: nksaan ={nksaan.aywm () :. 4 ayf} ') is msaal main ، day ayn sy ayn ayn klas amyj daylwzangh kay liye day ayn sy ayn ayn madal ki wzuahat krty haay۔farwrda tarykha ayk un pt tynsr lyta hay ، DNCNN madal kay farwrda pas ka atalak krta hay ، aur aaؤt pt tynsr waps krta haay۔ daywais mtghyr trbyt kay liye astamal karnay kay liye aalha ki wzuahat krta haay۔transfarm mtghyr tsawyry daytasyt par laghw hony kay liye tbdyly ki wzuahat krta haay۔tryn_daytasyt aur wyl_daytasyt mtghyrat trbyt aur twsayk kay daytasyts ko amyj fwldar daytasyts kay tawr par byan karty hayn۔tryn_lwdar aur wyl_lwdar mtghyrat nay trbyt aur twsayk kay dayta lwdarza ki wzuahat ki hay ، jo tsaawyr kay bychwn ko lwda karty hayn۔ NUM_CHANNELS ، NUM_FILTERS ، NUM_LAYERS ، BATCH_SIZE ، aur lrnngh_ryt mtghyrat madal haaiprprmytrza kay sath madal ki wzuahat karty hayn۔kswty mtghyr ki wjha sy mrba askwairda ghltay kay nksaan ki tkryb ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔ aaptymaizar mtghyr aydam aaptaizar ko mkhsawsa lrnngh ryt kay sath byan krta haay۔ yeh madal trynngh dayta lwdar ka astamal karty hoey aypwch ki mkhsawsa tadad kay liye trbyt yaftha haay۔aaؤt pt tynsr haasal karnay kay liye tsaawyr ko madal kay zaryaay mntkl kya jata hay ، js ka mwazanha askwairda ghltay sy hony wali khraby ki tkryb ka astamal karty hoey targht tynsr sy kya jata haay۔tdryj ka hasab lghaya jata hay aur nksaan ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye aaptymaizar ko ap dayt kya jata haay۔nksaan hr 100 bychwn kay bad chhpa hoa hay
